chinese: 老耿端起枪，眯缝起一只三角眼，一搂扳机响了枪，冰雹般的金麻雀劈哩啪啦往下落，铁砂子在柳枝间飞迸着，嚓嚓有声。
english: Old Geng picked up his shotgun, squinted, and pulled the trigger. Two sparrows crashed to the ground like hailstones as shotgun pellets tore noisily through the branches.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Old Tang held his gun, squinting his eyes with a triangular eye, and then fired it as if he was holding a revolver. A rain of gold irises fell from the sky, followed by a thunderous boom of gunfire that echoed through the trees.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng lifted his rifle and narrowed his eyes, as if preparing to fire.砰—一声闷响, 并一颗颗僵梆梆的豌豆般的小子弹射到远处, 引来一阵豌豆般激烈的喧啸,嚓—一声, 一枚铁钉从枝条间掉了。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Old Geng took up his gun, squinted one of its triangular eyes, and pulled the trigger. A hail of gold finches came down from the sky, pattering on the willows, with sand whistling through the branches.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng raised the rifle, squeezed one tiny trigger, and let ice-cold bullets rain down on the sparrows, cracking擎起的一串火花在柳条间爆裂,发出当当的响声。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Old Aigang raised his rifle, squinting one of his triangular eyes, and pulled the trigger once. Golden sparrows rained down like hail, shattering amidst the willow branches with a crisp sound.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng raised his rifle and squinted into the night. When he pulled the trigger, a flurry of golden sparrows raining down from the sky. Tiny grains of iron flew amid the twisting willows, sizzling silently as they settled to the ground.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Old Geng raised his gun, squinted through one eye, and pulled the trigger. The bullets flew down like hailstones, striking the iron sand in the willow branches with a clattering sound.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Old Geng raised his rifle, squinted through one eye, and fired. A sparrow the colour of ice fell from the sky, its wings beating noisily as it hit the ground among the willows.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Geng Da initiates firing, squinting to form a triangular eye, a rattle is heard from the lever gun, ice hail-like goldfinches fall sharply, iron pellets fly sporadically among the willow branches, with a zzzip sound.
Old Geng aimed, blinked once, and fired. His shotgun roared, and a flurry of leaden sparrows fell to the ground, making a series of crisp noises as they collided with the branches above.

chinese: 次日天未明时，刘老老便起来梳洗了， 又将板儿教了几句话； 五六岁的孩子，听见带了他进城逛去，喜欢的无不应承。
english: Next day Grannie Liu was up before dawn. As soon as she had washed and done her hair, she set about teaching Ban-er a few words to say to the ladies at the great house – an exercise to which he submitted cheerfully enough, as would any little boy of four or five who had been promised an outing to the great city.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The next morning when it was still dark, Liu Geogao got up and began to wash his face. He then taught several words to his son, who was five years old. Everyone in the village liked to listen to him as he went through the city.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was still not light when this little update took place. Grannie Liu起了个早，到锅台上梳妆，又把翠枝道人给吴芸讲了几套话。等到天亮些时候，才叫他进城去逛。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: By the time the next day dawned, Liu Lao got up and washed himself; he also taught him a few words of boarder speech. The five or six year old boy was delighted when he heard that he would be taken to the city to visit.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Having been woken just before daybreak, Grannie Liu rose up and began to prepare for her visit. She dressed little Ban-er in his best and then, as he sat silently while she carried him round the neighbourhood demonstrating what he knew, put him on his feet in the front of his little shop and sent him out with the other boys to 'admit' children.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The next morning, before dawn, Old Liu rose to dress and bathe, and gave Baoer a few instructions. A five or six-year-old child, hearing that they were going into the city for a stroll, was delighted and readily agreed to go along.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): First thing next morning Grannie Liu rose before daybreak, washed and dressed herself, and put little Ban-er through his paces. A trip into the city to boot! The prospect of showing off his mother's skills made the five-year-old more than willing to oblige.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The next day, when it was still dark, Liu Lao woke up, brushed himself, and gave his son a few words of advice. The son, who was around five or six years old, was excited when he heard that his father was going to town.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Next morning, long before daybreak, Grannie Liu was up and washing herself and combing her hair, and after a few words with Ban-er, their little plaything, she set off on her journey, accompanied by the six-year-old boy who acted as her escort, and by a retinue of servants and attendants. Everyone he met on the way greeted him with interest.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The next day, when it was still dark, Liu Lao Lao got up, combed and washed himself, and also taught a few words to the board. A five-to-six-year-old child, hearing that he was taken into the city for shopping, liked everything he saw.

As soon as it was daylight, Grannie Liu got up and busied herself with her ablutions and the instruction of her little charge. The five- or six-year-old boy was already wide-eyed with excitement at the prospect of this new adventure.

chinese: 钱老板道：“是，是，多谢香主。” 在一张椅上坐了，续道：“属下将小郡主藏在猪肚里带进宫来，一来是为瞒过宫门侍卫的重重搜检，二来是要瞒过沐王府众人的耳目。
english: 'Thank you, Master,' said Butcher Qian, seating himself in one of the chairs and continuing. 'There were really two reasons why I hid the Little Countessinside this pig's carcass. One was to get her past the Palace Guard: they always search everyone at the gate. But it was also to get her past any of the Mu Family spies who might be out watching for us.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Qian Shou said, “Yes, yes, thank you very much.” He sat on a chair, and continued, “I am bringing my lady to the palace to hide her in the pig’s stomach. One reason is that I wanted to hide her from the guards of the court, and another is that I wanted to hide her from the people at the palace.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Yes, sir,' said Butcher Qian and sat down at the chair. 'I've been told by the Palace Servants that if you search your workshop with a patella and find nothing, you're not to be permitted to cross its gates again for some for certain period of time. Secondly, I'm told you cannot send the Little Countess abroad without my permission.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Mr. Qian said, "Yes, yes, thank you very much." He sat down on a chair and continued, "I hid the young lady under a pig's stomach and brought her into the palace. First of all, I did it to avoid being searched by the guards at the imperial gate. Secondly, I did it to avoid the ears of the沐 family members."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Please, Master, thank you,' said the butcher. He sat himself down on a of the chairs and went on: 'When I brought the Little Countess into the Palace, it was partly to avoid being searched properly by the Palace guards and partly to keep her from the ears of the Mu Family.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Mr. Qian said, "Yes, yes, thank you for your concern." He then sat down on a chair and continued, "My subordinate hid the princess in the pig's stomach and brought her into the palace. The purpose was twofold: first, to evade the thorough inspections by the palace guards; second, to keep the details from being known to everyone at the Mu王府."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Yes, Goong-goong, yes,' said Butcher Qian, sitting himself down at a table. 'I stuffed her inside a pig's belly to get her into the Palace. First of all to fool the watchmen at the gates when they were searching for contraband; but mostly to fool the people inside the Palace, the guards and everyone.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The money boss said: "Is that so? Thank you, mistress." He sat down on a chair and continued, "I brought the little princess hidden inside a pig's belly to avoid detection by the palace guards and to avoid being seen by the people of the Mo Wang Fu."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'Oh no, Master,'said Butcher Qian, sitting himself down on a chair. 'Thank you for your consideration. I can see to that,'he went on. 'What I meant was that it will be hard to get her in and out of the Palace undetected. There'll be the guards at the gate, and then the Mu people inside. They'll have to keep their eyes open.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The boss said, "Yes, yes, thank you, Madam. Sitting on a chair, he continued, "I hid the young lady in a pig's belly and brought her into the palace to deceive the heavy scrutiny of the palace guards, and also to hide her from the eyes of the Mansion of Mansion King. "

Thank you, Master,' said Butcher Qian, and he sat himself down on a stool. 'I thought it would be the best way to get her into the Palace without anyone seeing her. And it's not the sort of thing the Palace guards would expect to find when they search her luggage.

chinese: 但已经晚了，物理学家静静地躺在地上，半睁的双眼看着从他的头颅上流出的血迹，疯狂的会场瞬间陷入了一片死寂。
english: But it was already too late. The physicist lay quietly on the ground, his eyes still open as blood oozed from his head. The frenzied crowd sank into silence.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: But it was too late; the physicist lay still on his back, half opened eyes looking at the bloody trail that had dripped from his head. The entire arena was plunged into silence within a flash of chaos.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But already then he was too late. The physical scientists laid down half-opened eyes watching the blood-drip from his brain as it slitherged down over his skull. At once he became filled with a single voice: 'Die, man! Die!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: But it was too late. Physicists lay quietly on the ground, their half-opened eyes staring at the bloodstains streaming down from his head. The frenzied crowd instantly fell silent.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was too late. The physics professor lay on the ground, half-lidded eyes fixed on the blood flowing from his nose. The frenzied crowd collapsed in a moment of silence.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: But it was too late. The physicist lay quietly on the ground, his half-open eyes staring at the blood spreading out from his head, and the mad assembly fell instantly into a deathly silence.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): But it was too late. The physicist lay on the ground, his eyes half open as they stared at the pool of blood flowing from his head. The frenzied convention turned instantly into a silent void.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: But it was already too late. The physicist lay quietly on the ground, half-open eyes gazing at the bloodstains on his head as the crowd around him fell silent in a moment of madness.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: But it was too late. The physicist lay on the ground, his eyes staring at the pool of blood trickling from his skull. The once-crowded scene was now deathly still.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
The text is: "But it's too late, the physicist Jiang Si Si lay still on the ground, half-open eyes watching the blood stains flowing from his head, the chaotic stage plunged into a silence."

Translation: "But it's too late, physicist Jiang Si Si lies still on the ground, half-open eyes watching the blood stains flowing from his head. The chaotic stage is suddenly plunged into silence."

But it was already too late. The physicist lay on the ground, his eyes half-open, staring at the blood trickling down from the top of his head. The madness in the crowd died down and was replaced by a scene of utter stillness.

chinese: 但这时，绍琳却做出了一件出人意料的事，与一位受迫害的教育部高干结了婚，当时那名高干还在干校住“牛棚”劳改中。
english: But then Shao did something that no one expected. She married a persecuted high-level cadre from the Education Ministry. At that time, the cadre still lived in a 'cowshed' for reform through labor.

chinese: 湘云道：“你敢挑宝姐姐的短处，就算你是个好的。”
english: 'If you can find any shortcomings in Cousin Bao-chai', said Xiang-yun, 'you must be very good indeed.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Tang Jiang said with a smile: "You dare to pick my sister's shortcoming; even if you're good."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you'll挑过宝姐姐的缺点，也就有了做姐姐的待遇！」
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Xiang Yun said, "You dare pick out the shortcoming of a sister like Bai Jiaer, then you are good."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you say anything bad about Bao-chai, I'll make you prove yourself a good one,' said Xiang-yun.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Xiangyun said, "If you dare point out Cousin Bao's flaws, then you can consider yourself good."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): How dare you pick on Bao-chai!' said Xiang-yun. 'That doesn't count as being good.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Go ahead and challenge my sister's weaknesses, but know that you're good."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'If you dare to find fault with my Cousin Bao, I shall certainly think you a good match for her!'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Xiangyun Road: "If you dare to pick on Auntie Bao, you are still a good person."
You think you can take on Bao-chai, do you?' said Xiang-yun. 'You're very brave!'

chinese: 他知道，这都是被转化为可见光的厘米微波，每团光晕的中心就是一个发射源，由于波长的原因，不可能看清形状。
english: He realized that these were sources of radiation in the centimeter range, all now converted to visible light. At the heart of each halo was a radiation source. Because the original wavelengths were so long, it was impossible to see their shapes clearly.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He knows that this is a beam of visible light, each of the centers of each cloud of light being a source of emission. The reason for this is that wavelengths cannot be seen at all.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He knew that they'd all been converted into microwave rays, each ray's center a source of interest. Since the wavelength was such that one could not even see the shape, it would be impossible to do so.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He knew that this was the visible light version of centimeter microwaves, each emitting source being at the center of a ring of light; due to wavelength reasons, it would be impossible to see the shape.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): To him it felt like a new kind of light, formed from the converted cm-waves, which consisted of a collection of luminous disks centered at each location. Since the wavelengths were tiny, they could not reveal the shapes of the objects.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He knew that these were all centimeter microwaves converted into visible light, with each ring's center being a source of emission, and due to the wavelength, it was impossible to discern their shapes.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): He knew that this was done through the conversion of centimeter radio waves into visible light. Every ring of light had a central source of emission, but the wavelength was too long for any detail to be seen.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He knows that these are all converted into visible light, and each cluster of light is the center of an emission source. Due to the wavelength, it is impossible to see the shape.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He knew that they were fractions of a centimeter microwave radiation that had been converted into visible light. The center of each halo was the source of emission, but the wavelength was so short that he could not make out their shapes.

chinese: 海老公问起今日做了什么事，韦小宝说了到鳌拜家中抄家，至于吞没珍宝、金银、匕首等事，自然绝口不提，最后道：“太后命我到鳌拜家里拿两部《四十二章经》……”
english: When Old Hai asked what he had been doing that day, Trinket told him that he had been helping supervise the confiscation of Oboi's estate. He concluded his account—which of course omitted any mention of the dagger and various other valuables that he had pocketed for himself—by telling him about the two copies of the Sutra in Forty-Two Sections that had been discovered in Oboi's house.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Wu Peng asked him what he did today. Wen Xiubao said that he went to see鳌拜家中抄家， so he wouldn’t mention anything about swallowing or taking away treasures, weapons, or knives. Finally, he said, “The Empress decreed that I go to鳌拜家中拿两部《四十二章经》。”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After the old eunuch had finished his interview, Trinket finished with a single statement: 'The Empress Dowager gave me the task of taking two volumes of the Four Twenty-Seventh Book series from Oboi!' and the old eunuch asked if there was to be a discussion on this in the以后。

He said that he went to the home of the regent (Aba) and searched for his treasure, and naturally did not mention things like snatching precious jewels, gold, knives, etc. Finally, he said, "Empress Dowager ordered me to get two copies of the Fourty-Two Chapters of Scripture…."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Hai asked him what he had been up to of late. Trinket had told the truth when he said he'd gone to Oboi's house to search for jewels and gold and swords. Of course, he didn't mention the plunder of treasures, gold, silver, daggers, or anything else. He concluded, "Empress Dowager ordered me to fetch two copies of the 'Forty-two Chapter Sutra' from Ao Bao's house..."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Hai asked what he wanted to know about Trinket's activities that day. He obviously knew nothing about the treasure-stash or the weapons-catalogue, for when Trinket had got to the part of his story where the Empress Dowager had sent him to search for the Bibles in Oboi's house, he had left it out. chinese: 不过属下胆大妄为，事先没向韦香主请示，擅自将小郡主带进宫来，给韦香主增添不少危险，不少麻烦，实在该死之极。”
english: Of course, it was rather a nerve, taking it on myself to bring the Little Countess in here without consulting you. It means a lot of danger for you, Master. And trouble. I deserve to be hung.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: But the subordinate acted rashly without consulting his master, and brought Lady Xiaohong into the palace without informing his master beforehand, adding more danger and trouble to him. He was really that bad a man.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: But I, being reckless and presumptuous, did not ask the Lady Wei for permission before bringing the little princess into the palace, which only added danger and trouble to the Lady Wei, who was already quite troubled. It is most reprehensible.”
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): However, as I was bold enough to go冒险， I didn't ask Hervey about it first. I took the郡主进宫， which was a serious mistake because it was dangerous and inconvenient enough just for one person, let alone two!'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: But I acted recklessly, without consulting Master Wei, and brought the young princess into the palace on my own, adding considerable danger and trouble for Master Wei. I am truly deserving of death."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): But I suppose it was wrong of me not to ask Master Trinket first before bringing her in. It was very careless of me and has created a great deal of trouble for you. I am sorry.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: However, the subject was bold and reckless, without seeking permission from the Lady Weixiang first, and brought the young princess into the palace on their own accord, causing Lady Weixiang additional danger and trouble. It was truly a capital offense.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: But being a bold and headstrong fellow, I didn't think to ask your permission before bringing her in, and now you see us all in a terrible mess. I deserve to be hung for my carelessness.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: However, my audacity is excessive, I did not seek permission from Wei Xiang before arbitrarily bringing the young marquise into the palace, causing Wei Xiang additional danger and trouble, which is truly a most regrettable act."

chinese: 到潮退时我也安息，但潮兴时要乘兴而舞。

chinese: 山上有一股风，无声无息地吹下去。 天地间充满了悲惨的气氛。

chinese: 宝玉笑道：“只从那个月见了你，我叫你往书房里来，谁知接接连连许多事情，就把你忘了。”
english: 'After I invited you round to my study that day,' said Bao-yu, 'a whole lot of things seemed to happen one after the other, and I'm afraid I quite forgot about your visit.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Gao Nai said with a smile: "I just told you that I would come to your study if I saw you on that particular day, but it turned out that there were many things that kept me from doing so."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Well, I can tell you about me from the month before this when we saw each other on the moon, but all I can say is that many adventures had gone by the time I got round to telling you.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Jade said, "Since I saw you that month, I sent for you to the study room and didn't know what would happen next."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Didn't you know? When you were here the other day, my name came up so frequently that you practically forgot me!'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Bao Yu smiled and said, "It's been since that month when I asked you to come to the study room, yet I've been so busy with various things that I completely forgot about you."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Bao-yu smiled at her. 'I remember first meeting you and being so fascinated that I invited you to come and see me in my own room; but then there were all those things that needed doing in the书房, and I seem to have forgotten you.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: I only saw you once at the moon and I invited you to the library, but I didn't know that so many things happened and I forgot about you.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'I saw you at the Rong mansion, didn't I? I meant to ask you to come to my study, but then all sorts of other things happened and I forgot.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Jadeite smiled and said: "Ever since I saw you that month, I called you into the study room, and I didn't realize it, but many things happened one after another, and I forgot about you."

The last time I saw you was when you were still in the moonroom,' said Bao-yu. 'I told you then that you were to go to the library, but I seem to remember that there were a number of things we had to attend to first, and somehow I can't remember what they were.'

chinese: 萨克斯管里夹带着唱片的走针声，嘶嘶的，就有了些贴肤可感的意思。
english: The sound of the saxophone, mixed with the hissing sound of the needle against the vinyl, gave him a feeling of an almost palpable intimacy.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The saxophone is humming, like a needle on a record spinning inside it, which gives the impression of something intimate and personal.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The saxophones squawked as though twisting springs, giving the album a certain texture.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The saxophone carried the hissing sound of a record needle, giving a tactile sense of touch.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The saxophone's sound was overlaid with the scratching of the record needle, evoking a sense of touch.

chinese: 你说么，这几年不见，我就忘了。

chinese: “既然是叶老师交待的，就观测吧，反正也不费劲，百分之一的精度。 用老古董COBE就行了。”

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Since it was the instruction given by Ye, then observe; there is no need for extra effort, so use the old antique COBE telescope.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Well since it's from Professor Ye, we can observe it too. It shouldn't be too difficult, and even if the accuracy is only one percent, COBE should be able to do the job.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Since it's Professor Ye who has assigned this task, let's observe it. Anyway, it's not a demanding job; we're just looking at one percent accuracy. We can use the old COBE equipment for that."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): If that's what Professor Ye wants, then we'll observe. It's not like we'll have to put in a lot of effort. We just need to achieve one percent accuracy, which we can easily do with the old COBE satellite.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Since it's what Professor Ye instructed, let's observe it anyway. It won't take much effort and we can achieve a 1% precision rate using the old COBE."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'If Professor Ye confided in us, we might as well check on it. Besides, it's not like we don't have the old COBE instrument. It's good enough for a rough measurement.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Since it was explained by Mr. Ye, let's observe. It won't take much effort, even with a 1% accuracy. We can use the old COBE for this."
Since it's Professor Ye's confession, we should take a look. It's not like it will cost much effort. We can use the ancient COBE telescope for this.'

chinese: 夫妻二人半世只生此女，一旦失去，何等烦恼，因此昼夜啼哭，几乎不顾性命。 看看一月，士隐已先得病，夫人封氏也因思女构疾，日日请医问卦。
english: The shock of so sudden a loss to a middle-aged couple who had only ever had the one daughter can be imagined. In tears every day and most of the night, they almost lost the will to go on living, and after about a month like this first Shi-yin and then his wife fell ill, so that doctors and diviners were in daily attendance on them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Two generations ago, they had a daughter who was born only for them; if she were lost, what would be their burden? So they wept every night and did not even care about their own lives. Look at one month: Su Shi had already died of illness, and Lady Zhong also became ill because of her desire to have the daughter well. She often asked doctors for advice and consulted with the ancestors.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In their day together they had brought up the girl, but since then she has lost all capacity for them and their whole existence has been a misery-tingly one. They cry night and day, yet when their wife, Qian Xi-feng, has every opportunity of recovering, she goes straight to the doctor and gets her treated.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The husband and wife had only one daughter for half a lifetime, and now that she was gone, what kind of trouble would they have? They were crying day and night, almost ignoring their lives. Looking at the month, Mr. Xue has already got sick first, and Mrs. Fan has also been ill due to thinking about her daughter, so she is constantly asking doctors and consulting divinities every day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The parents of this illegitimate child had, throughout their married life, bred the girl with unmeasured love and devotion; now, suddenly deprived of its last bearer, was struggling with the most extreme distress. The weeping over the loss of this beloved child affected the parents so keenly that it contrived to aggravate their own ill health. Daily visits were made to the best physicians in town and to all kinds of astrologers, but without the slightest apparent effect.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The husband and wife had only this daughter for half a century, and upon losing her, what kind of distress did they feel? Therefore, they cried day and night, almost disregarding their own lives. After looking after her for one month, Shi Yin had already fallen ill, and his wife Feng Shou also fell ill from thinking about their daughter, constantly seeking doctors and consulting oracles daily.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The loss of their only child had brought the two parents to the edge of insanity and they had been wasting away for nearly a year, each other's constant companions in sorrow. By this time Shi-yin was already ill and Feng-shi, his wife, had caught her husband's infection and was getting worse. They had consulted doctors and astrologers and continued to do so from day to day, their daughter-in-law's life now a constant concern.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The couple had been married for half a lifetime and had only one daughter. Once they lost her, they were filled with immense sorrow and cried day and night, almost neglecting their own lives. After a month, the husband had fallen ill and the wife, whose name was Madame Feng, had become ill as well due to thinking of their daughter. She consulted doctors every day.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The couple had had but this one child, a girl, and her loss produced such anguish in both of them that they abandoned all interest in living and wept without ceasing. By the end of the month both husband and wife were ill, and constantly sent for doctors to treat their ailments, which were now caused by excessive grief.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
The text translates to:

The couple had only one daughter in half a lifetime, and losing her would cause immense distress. Therefore, they cried day and night, almost disregarding their lives. Looking at the situation after a month, the scholar had fallen ill first, and the madam also fell ill due to worrying about their daughter. Every day they consulted doctors and diviners.

This was the one child that O-bo and his wife were ever able to produce between them, and the loss of her was enough to drive them both to distraction. They were already beginning to worry about her health when, a month or so after her birth, Shi-yin's own illness started.

chinese: 皇帝和大官都很残忍，心里不喜欢谁，就说他犯了罪，把他放在鼎里活活煮熟。
english: Those ancient Emperors and great ministers were very cruel. If they didn't like somebody, they would pretend that they had committed some crime or other, and then they would put them in a cauldron and boil them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The emperor and officials were cruel, so they didn’t like who was right. They would say that he had committed a crime and let him die in boiling water.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The Emperor and the Ministers were all too残忍, and when they heard that someone had been acting strangely, they would say that they had been deceived and accuse him of having committed a crime and burning alive right on the pottables.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Emperors and high officials were cruel, and if they disliked someone, they would put him in a pot of boiling water to cook alive.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If a man was unliked by the rulers, they would accuse him of a fault for which there was no punishment, and he would be boiled alive in a cauldron.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Emperors and high officials were very cruel. If they did not like someone, they would claim that person had committed a crime, then have them boiled alive in a cauldron.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The Emperor and the important men can be very cruel. If they don't like someone, they say that person has done something wrong and put them in a cauldron to boil slowly.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The emperor and the high officials were cruel, and they hated anyone they didn't like. If they found anyone guilty, they would boil them alive in the cauldron.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: If an official or the Emperor didn't like a prisoner, he would put him in a cauldron and let him cook.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The emperor and high officials were cruel. If they disliked someone, they would accuse them of a crime and boil them alive in a cauldron.
The Emperor and the high-ranking officials were cruel and heartless. If they didn't like someone, they accused him of a crime and put him in the cauldron to be slowly boiled to death.

chinese: 若迟了一步，回事的人多了，就难说了。
english: If we delay a moment longer, people will start coming in with messages and we shan't have a chance to speak to her.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: If it were a person who delayed by one step, there would be more people involved.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If there were too many delays, there would be trouble.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: If we're a step behind, things might get out of hand.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Suppose something were to happen while I was delayed? Then it might be different.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: If we're too late, there will be too many people involved, making it uncertain what will happen.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): If you're even a day too late, there'll be too many people waiting outside and we'd never get rid of them all.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: If we're late, there will be many people who have already returned. It's hard to say.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: If we tarry any longer, we shall have a crowd of people coming and going; and then it will be hard to explain our absence.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: If one step is delayed, more people will be involved, and it becomes difficult to say.
If we are to be blamed for being slow, it is because there were too many of us.

chinese: 我的一边肩膀正好和陈清扬的腰等宽，记得那时她的脸红得厉害。
english: Her waist was exactly the width of my shoulder. I remember her face turning deep red then.

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: My shoulder was just as wide as Chen Qingyang's waist, and I remember her face turning extremely red at that time.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): My shoulder on one side was exactly the width of Chen Qingyang's waist, and I remember her face blushing really badly.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: My shoulder was right next to Chen Qingyang's waist, and I remember her face was bright red at the time.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: My shoulder fit right across Chen Qingyang's waist, and I remember how her face blushed.

chinese: 真正的现在的它是在废墟上建立起来的悲喜参半的忧乐园。
english: It was now a sorrowful paradise, a monument to both grief and joy, built upon ruins.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It is a joy to create here, a悲喜参半的游乐场。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The real present is built on ruins of sorrow and joy, a mixed-up paradise of sadness.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): What actual present-day Shanghai is built on top of rubble produces a mixture of joy and pain.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The true present is a bittersweet paradise of忧患 built upon the ruins.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): But the real present has built a new city of mixed joy and sorrow on the ruins.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The true present is a garden of mixed emotions built upon ruins.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The realness of the present emerges amid the ruins, where happiness and sorrow are inextricable.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The true current it is built on ruins is a half-happy, half-sorrowful pleasure garden.

chinese: 王琦瑶到家后，她母亲已炖了鸡汤和红枣桂圆汤，什么话也没有地端给她喝，也不看那孩子一眼，就当没这个人似的。
english: When Wang Qiyao came home the next day, her mother had already prepared a pot of chicken broth and the customary bowl of soup with red jujube and longan, which was supposed to be so nourishing for new mothers. She handed the bowl to her daughter in silence. She did not bother to even look at her granddaughter; it was as if the child did not exist.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: After Wang Qiyou arrived home, her mother had simmered up a chicken soup and a set of red bean and plum soup, and didn’t say anything to her when she drank it. She was just like that, not looking at the child.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): By the time Wang Qiyao got home, her mother was already making rice tea and red almond cake tea without asking. When they were both empty-handed, she tacitly assumed that she must have forgotten someone and went off to do some other errand without answering their request.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: After Wang Qi'er returned home, her mother had prepared chicken soup and jujube and lotus root soup. She just served it up for her without a word of greeting or any look at the child.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Upon her return home, Wang Qiyao found soup already prepared by her mother: chicken soup, along with a spoonful of rice wine-soaked ginger and raisins. unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: After Wang Qiaoyao returned home, her mother had already prepared a chicken soup and a decoction of red dates and longan for her, serving them without a word and ignoring the child completely, as if there was no one else in the room.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): By the time Wang Qiyao got home, Mrs. Wang had already made chicken soup and a mixture of dates, dried roses, and osmanthus buds ready for her. Without saying a word, she simply handed her the soup and did not even bother to look at the baby.

chinese: 莺儿满心委屈，见姑娘说，不敢出声，只得放下钱来，口内嘟囔说：“一个做爷的，还赖我们这几个钱，连我也瞧不起!
english: Oriole smarted with the injustice of this, but her mistress had ordered it, so she had to pay up without arguing. She could not, however, forbear a few rebellious mutterings: 'Huh! One of the masters! Cheating a maid out of a few coppers! Even I should be ashamed!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The girl was so upset that she could not say a word when her mother said this to her. She had to put down her money, muttering under her breath: "An old man would never have us paying for these things, he would just look at me with disdain!"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was with a good grace that Oriole let her out of the trap. She didn't dare make any noise, but simply put her hands where she did not want her to see her. 'I'm too low down,' she mumbled to herself as she spoke. 'I don't think we should treat one of the adults like this; the way they treated my aunt!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Ling'er was full of resentment, hearing the maid say that she dared not speak, so she only put down her money, muttering, "A man who owes us some money? I can't look down upon him!"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Willoughby saw that she was making a mistake and begged her not to do so. But courtly manners did not allow him to go any further. Oriole hung his head and took the money without making a noise, but secretly muttering to himself he felt very badly about what appeared to be a complete injustice.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Ying'er was filled with resentment, but upon hearing the young lady speak, she dared not make a sound, so she could only put down the money. She muttered to herself, "A man who is supposed to be a father is still pinching pennies from us, and even looks down on me!"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Little Yellow was full of resentment at having been made wait while Lady Wang went off to fetch her mistress; but when, on returning, she rebuked him for his temerity, he contritely put the money back and began to mutter something about the unfair way he had been treated, especially as he was only a servant.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The little bird was filled with resentment and saw the girl. She didn't dare speak out, so she put down the money and whispered in her mouth: "One who acts like a grandfather, still relies on us for money. I don't even look up to him!"
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Aiguo was mortified. The girl dared say nothing, but handed the money to her uncle with a look that could have melted stone. 'How d'you dare to imply that we don't deserve our money!
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The sparrow's heart was filled with resentment, as it saw the young lady and dared not speak out. It could only drop the money and muttered inside: "A scoundrel who owes us a few coins, not even worthy of my glance!"

Oriole, who was still smarting from Misty's silence, was mortified when the girl refused to take the money. 'After all I've done for you, the least you could do is take the money!' she said, temporarily forgetting that the girl was deaf.

chinese: 但来自附中的四位小将自有她们“无坚不摧”的革命方式，刚才动手的那个女孩儿又狠抽了叶哲泰一皮带，另外三个女孩子也都分别抡起皮带抽了一下，当同伴革命时，她们必须表现得更革命，至少要同样革命。
english: But the four junior high girls had their own revolutionary methods that they believed were invincible. The girl who had hit Ye before took out her belt and whipped Ye again. The other three girls also took off their belts to strike at Ye. With their companion displaying such revolutionary fervor, they had to display even more, or at least the same amount.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: But the four high school girls from Chaohuang have their own “no-holds-barred” revolutionary ways. The one who struck her was then, and another two also swung at her with their belts, and all of them had to be as radical as possible, at least equally so.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Of the four nearby middle-school students, three had been trained as revolutionaries from Primary School, and they brought their revolutionary methods with them when they came to attack Ye. One of them had given him a painful powerball punch earlier—she had also blown a hole in Ye's robe with her fist. The other two girls hurled their pities at Ye with just as much energy. Like the middle school students, they had to perform a heroic show, equaling the energy with which they would do anything for their cause.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: But the four girls from Affiliated High School have their own revolutionary methods, and the girl who just hit Ye Zhaotai with a belt drew it back and slapped her one more time, while the other three girls each whipped her with a belt, demonstrating their revolution even more.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But the four girls had their own revolutionary methods, and the girl who'd originally taken the chairlet had let Ye go, switching places with the last one standing. The other three girls picked up the belts, and in quick succession they struck Ye with theirs. Their fellow revolutionaries needed to feel the same fire as they attacked their enemies, and the three girls on either side had to strike with as much passion as Ye.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: But the four young warriors from the affiliated school had their own revolutionary methods of "conquering all obstacles." The girl who had just attacked lashed out at Ye Zhetai with a belt, and the other three girls also swung their belts in turn. When their comrades were in the midst of revolution, they had to demonstrate greater commitment to the cause, at least matching the intensity of their comrades' efforts.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): But the four students from the attached middle school had their own unbreakable revolutionary approach. The girl who had fought against Ye刚才 had whipped him across the back with a belt. The other three girls also took turns whipping him with the belts. When their comrades underwent revolution, they had to show that they were even more revolutionary. At least they had to be as enthusiastic.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: But the four small soldiers from the inner circle had their own ways of revolution, and the girl who had just attacked Lei Zhetai pulled his belt fiercely. The other three girls also each took a turn whipping him, and when they were together, they had to be even more revolutionary.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: But the four young Red Guards from the back row had their own way of fighting revolution. The girl who had initiated the action earlier lashed Ye with a belt, and the other three followed suit, raising their belts as though they too had to be just as revolutionary as their comrades.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The four lieutenants from Fuchun have a revolutionary style that is "unyielding and unbreakable". The girl who just acted earlier severely whipped Zhetei with a whip, and the other three girls also each took a whip and gave a few whips as well. When they are revolutionaries together, they must be more revolutionary, at least as revolutionary as each other.

But the four girl revolutionaries who were their hosts were loath to see their guest outshine them. The girl who had slapped Ye had now taken off her belt and lashed him cruelly across the face. The other three girls also took off their belts and lashed him in turn. When they had made their revolution, they had vowed to be as revolutionary as possible. At least they should match the other girls' level of revolutionarity.

They also have countless tributaries flowing out of them, like great rivers, and countless branches like a huge tree.

chinese: 忽听窗下弄堂里嘈杂声起，便推窗望去，原来是谁家在鸡窝里抓住一只黄鼠狼。
english: All of a sudden, rowdy noises broke out from the longtang outside. Opening the window to look out, Mr. Cheng saw that a crowd had gathered around a man holding up a weasel he had caught in his chicken coop.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I heard the clatter of a noisy crowd downstairs on the alley, and when I opened the window, I saw that someone had caught a fox in the chicken coop.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Then he saw some noisy commotion coming up the longtang behind the window, and opened the window to have a look. It was a member of the neighborhood popping a little yellow fox out of his chicken pen.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Suddenly, I heard the commotion in the alley below the window, so I pushed the window open to look. It turned out that someone had caught a mink in their chicken coop.

All of a sudden a commotion arose in the courtyard below. He pushed his way through the window into the gallery, and there, in a trap at the foot of the garden wall, was a man from one of the houses lying across a trap door, his arms and legs stretched out, holding a yellow weasel.

chinese: 走出深山，叶文洁充满了春天的感觉，“文革”的严冬确实结束了，一切都在复苏之中。
english: Leaving the mountains, Ye felt spring was everywhere. The cold winter of the Cultural Revolution really was over, and everything was springing back to life.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: OUT OF THE MOUNTAIN, YU Wenxia felt the spring feeling again after leaving the mountain during the Cultural Revolution. "The end of the cold winter has finally ended," she said.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They finally emerged from the mountains, and Ye could feel the spring sunshine through the snow. 'It certainly was not the winter of the Revolution that we experienced back then,' he thought. 'Everything is recovering now.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Leaving the mountains, Ye Wenjie felt spring was returning. The harsh winter of Cultural Revolution had indeed ended and everything was coming back to life.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Having left the mountains, Ye experienced a sense of spring. The end of the Cold War was indeed behind her, and everything was recovering.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Having left the deep mountains, Ye Wenjie was filled with a sense of spring. The severe winter of the Cultural Revolution had indeed come to an end, and everything was in the process of rejuvenation.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): As she left the mountains, Ye had a sense of spring. The harsh winter of the Cultural Revolution was really over, and everything was coming back to life.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Leaving the mountains, I felt a spring-like atmosphere. The severity of the Cultural Revolution was over, and everything was flourishing.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: When she left the mountains, Ye was filled with the feeling of spring. The harsh winter of the Cultural Revolution was over, and everything was reviving.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Stepping out of the deep mountains, Yè Wénjiē was filled with the feeling of spring, the harsh winter of the "Cultural Revolution" has indeed ended, everything was reviving.
Ye left the back hills filled with the feelings of a springtime resurrection. The ruthless winter of the Cultural Revolution was finally over, and everything was coming back to life.

chinese: 老子要宰了你！

chinese: 一是我在慰问团面前说出了曾经被打晕的事，叫军代表很没面子；二是争风吃醋，所以他一直修理我。
english: Firstly, I told the relief delegation that I had been beaten unconscious, which made the military deputy lose face; secondly, he and I fought over a woman, which was why he was always trying to screw me.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: One of the things I said on the battlefield was that I had been beaten up by the military representatives. His behavior was very ungrateful; two times he had been trying to ruin me.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The first thing I said during my relief delegation trip called forth someone to accuse me of getting hit up: the military deputy was sorely let down. And since he took great delight in tormenting me, the war with me continued even after that.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: One, I said what happened before the慰问团 in front of him and he was very embarrassed; two, because he wanted to get revenge on me, so he always fixed me up.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I told the relief delegation what happened to me, and that made the military deputy very angry because it gave him no face. Also, he competed with me to get to Wang Qiyao's heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct:
The translation is as follows:

"One reason was that I had exposed my past beating in front of the慰问 team, which made the military representatives lose face; the other reason was a matter of jealousy, so he constantly harassed me."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): First, I told the military relief delegation that I had fainted from pain; this made the military deputy lose face. Second, because I competed with Chen Qingyang, he has always wanted to humiliate me.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3:
1. I told the delegation that I had been knocked out in the past, which made the military representative feel embarrassed.
2. He always tries to fix me because he's jealous of our closeness.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: One was that I told the relief delegation what the military deputy had done to me, which made him lose face; the other was that he kept arguing with and beating me because of that.

1. I revealed in front of the comfort team that I had been knocked unconscious before, which made the military representative lose face.
2. He was jealous, so he kept repairing my things.

My confession before the relief delegation about being knocked out by the Red Guard was a blow to the military deputy's ego, and his constant efforts to rehabilitate me could be seen as a case of sour grapes.

chinese: 然后很多人拥了上来，把我们拥在中间要打架。
english: Then people began to gather, forming a tight ring around us and urging us to fight.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Then a line of people came towards us, carrying us all round, and finally we were gathered together and led away from them all.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Then many people rushed forward, pushing us into the middle and wanting to fight each other.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: And then a crowd surged forward, pushing us into the middle as if we were about to fight.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Then many people rushed to us, crowded us together, and wanted to fight.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Then many people came over and surrounded us, wanting to fight.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: After a while, several locals came over and formed a circle around us, holding us tightly and preparing to fight.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Then many people rushed over, intending to fight us in the middle.
Then many people came forward to surround us, intending to fight.

chinese: 我的手的确很巧，不光表现在摸女人方面。

chinese: 他说我以前的说话中有扬州腔调，恐怕…… 恐怕…… 那么他眼睛给我弄瞎这回事，他知不知道？”
english: 'I thought he said just now that I used to have a Yangzhou accent. Perhaps . . . perhaps he does know that I blinded him.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He said that I had a dialect from my past talk, perhaps… Perhaps he doesn’t know about it?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old man was about to say that I had used a Tang accent before, and I'm afraid that meant that he was going to lose theunft with me. 'I'm afraid that means that I'll lose the opportunity to tell you what really got me. '
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He said that there was a touch of Yangzhou accent in what I had said, perhaps… Perhaps he knows about the incident with my eyes?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He said he heard in my last sentence that I was a Yangzhou accent speaker, and probably... probably ... if he could see me, he'd probably think I had lost my sight.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He said that there was a Yangzhou accent in my previous speech, perhaps... perhaps... does he know about the matter of him making my eyes blind?"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): He said that there was a touch of Yangzhou accent in my speech刚才他说到我以前说话里带了扬州口音, probably because... because...' So he must have known about the blindness thing.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He said that my previous speech had a Yangzhou accent, and he may have made my eyes go blind this time. He didn't know that.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He said my speaking style sounded like it was from Yangzhou, and maybe that was why he thought I was trying to blind him.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He said that there was a Yangzhou dialect in my previous speech, I suppose... I suppose... So, did he make me blind with his eyes, does he know about it?

He said my way of speaking used to be more like the Yangzhou dialect, and he was afraid . . . afraid. . . . that my eyesight might go, and he wasn't sure . . . he wasn't sure whether he'd made me blind already.'

chinese: 它不是那种阳刚凛冽的气味，而是带有些阴柔委婉的，是女人家的气味。
english: It is not a strong masculine scent, but a soft feminine one—the scent of a woman.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: It is not that masculine and cold-smelling, but rather a softer, more feminine scent, like a woman's perfume.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It does not have that male, cold, lingfeng smell, but is flavored with a kind of feminine, faintly soft and seductive flavor.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It is not a masculine, hard, stinking smell but one that has some delicacy and gentleness, a woman's scent.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It does not have the sharpness of a masculine smell, but is instead a bit coy and subtle, fitting more like the disposition of a girl.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: It wasn't a sharp, masculine scent; rather, it carried a hint of femininity, a soft and subtle fragrance.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): It is not the smell of masculinity but of femininity, not something coarse or rude but delicate and refined.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: It is not the sharp and strong scent of a man, but rather carries a hint of softness and delicacy, the scent of a woman's home.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The odor is not at all sharp and crisp, but has a certain flexibility and weakness about it, reminding one of the smell of a woman's room.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: It is not the kind of robust and austere scent, but rather it has a hint of soft and tender fragrance, which is the scent of a woman's home.
It is not a bright and vigorous odor, but has a bit of secretiveness about it—a womanly odor.

chinese: 手上微一使劲，蕊初气为之窒，一张小脸登时胀得通红。
english: He increased the pressure on her throat so that she could no longer breathe and her face became swollen and purple.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: With a slight movement of his hand, Ruoxiu's breath was choked by her aura. Her face immediately turned red as she looked at herself.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Suddenly her body sagged; her pale, chapped hands and fingers became choked with exertion.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: A slight tug at her hand made the girl's face flush red as she gasped for breath.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Just as she tried harder to free her hand,蕊初呼吸不畅,脸涨得通红。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: With a slight increase in force, Rui Chu's breath was momentarily halted, her tiny face turning bright red immediately.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Misty began pressing her arms down a little harder, and Little Blossom began to suffocate again, turning first pink, then red.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: With a slight force on my hand, the bud swells and feels constricted, and my small face immediately turns red.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: A slight pressure on the throat produced an almost choking sensation in Blossom, and her little face began to swell.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Hand moves slightly, the qi of the lotus flower initially chokes, a small face suddenly swells to a bright red.
A slight exertion of her hand caused Blossom to faint.

chinese: 可她无怨无艾，洗脚时看见脚底走出的泡，也觉得很值得。
english: But she didn't have an ounce of regret; even when later that evening she saw the blisters on the soles of her feet from all that walking, she still felt that it was all worth it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: She did not complain about being sick, but she saw a pool of water on her feet when she washed her feet.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But she didn't mind having a clean feet, and she enjoyed the exercise of soaking her feet in the bathtub.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: But she was content with it, and when she saw the bubbles on her feet during a foot bath, she felt it worthwhile too.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She had no anger or envy, and as she washed her feet, the white lines on her calluses seemed worth while.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: And yet, she bears no grudge and shows no regret. Even when she sees blisters forming on her feet during washing, she still finds it worthwhile.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): However, she showed no sign of resentment; indeed, as she washed away the tidey, she took pleasure in the blisters on her feet.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: She didn't mind it. When she washed her feet and saw the bubbles that emerged from her toes, she thought it was worth it.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: But she didn't mind; as she washed her feet she even thought it was a good omen.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: She has no complaints, no itch, even the bubbles that come out from her feet when washing them are worth seeing.
But she made no complaints; on the contrary, she was grateful to be able to bathe her feet in the hot water and see the pores opening up.

chinese: 理发师正整理她的鬓发，手指触在脸颊，是最悉心的呵护。 她微微侧过脸，躲着吹风机的热风，这略带娇憨的姿态也是昨天的。
english: As the stylist gave her hair a last-minute adjustment with a hand blower, the expression on Wang Qiyao's face, turning slightly to avoid the hot air with just a soupçon of the spoiled child, belonged to yesteryear.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: A barber is梳理着她鬓角，指尖轻轻触碰脸颊，是精心的呵护。 She turns her head slightly and hides behind a fan of hot air blowers, this delicate pose also belongs to yesterday.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The stylist was combing her hair now, smoothing the strands out and gently pinning them back; when he reached her face, he touched her cheek, and abruptly turned back to shield it from the hot air generated by the electric熨斗。 This was yesterday's news—and even the steam from the iron seemed to stir something inside her.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The barber was combing her hair, his fingers touching her cheek, the most careful care. She turned her face slightly and hid from the hot wind of the hair dryer, that somewhat innocent posture was yesterday's.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The barber was carefully combing her hair and moving his fingers over her cheek. She asked him to stop, hiding her face from the hot blade as she shifted slightly away. The sleepy, delighted look on her face matched the past.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The barber is meticulously arranging her hair, her fingers touching her cheeks with the utmost care. She slightly turns her face away from the hot air of the hair dryer, a gesture that was also hers yesterday.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): As the barber was fixing her hair, her fingers gently caressing her face, she turned her head slightly away from the blow dryer's hot air, a bit of cuteness that she had already left behind.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The stylist is carefully arranging her hair, her fingers gently touching her cheek. She slightly tilts her head to avoid the hot wind from the hairdryer, and the playful expression on her face is reminiscent of yesterday.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The barber was trimming her bangs, and his fingers brushed her cheek in a gentle caress. She leaned a bit aside to avoid the hot air from the hair dryer; the gesture was one of yesterday.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The hairdresser is tidying her bangs, her fingers touch her cheek, it is the most caring protection. She slightly turns her face, avoiding the hot wind from the hairdryer, this slightly pitiful posture is also from yesterday.

As the hairdresser straightened out her bangs, her fingers strayed across Wang Qiyao's cheeks, treating her with the utmost care. She leaned her head slightly to one side, trying to avoid the hot air of the hair dryer, and this slight inclination of hers was the same one she had shown the day before—a sign, if there were any need for one, that she was growing more and more attracted to this game.

chinese: 韦小宝心想：“这肥猪肚中定是藏着什么古怪物事，莫非是兵器之类，天地会想在皇宫中杀人大闹？” 不由得心中怦怦而跳。
english: It was obvious that something very out of the ordinary must be concealed inside. Trinket could feel his heart thumping as he reflected that this might well be weapons which the Triads were smuggling in to be used in a killing spree inside the Palace.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Qian Baogang thought: “This fat pig belly must be something ancient monster’s story that he could not possibly have been hiding. Perhaps it was weapons or a heaven and earth association wanting to kill huge crowds at the palace? He dared not feel his heart beating.”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket began to get preoccupied with the possibility that this animal carcass contained all the ingredients for a big monster like the Helmsman, or perhaps one of the items he wanted was a weapon—a Triad Society item, he was thinking:天地会会在皇宫中杀害他和大闹? His heart was racing.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaohong thought, "This fat pig must be hiding something sinister inside of him. Perhaps it is a weapon or something of that sort, and the Heavenly Society wishes to stir up trouble in the palace." His heart was pounding uncontrollably.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket wondered if the huge animal's belly was full of treasures, perhaps some wonderful weapon or other. The thought made his heart beat fast.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Wei Xiaobao thought to himself, "This fat pig must be hiding some ancient monstrous thing inside it. Perhaps it's a weapon or something similar that the Heaven and Earth Society wants to use to cause chaos and murder in the palace?" He couldn't help his heart pounding.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket wondered what sort of secret treasure the pig's belly must contain, whether weapons perhaps, for the Triad Society to use in some plot for carrying out inside the Palace. At the thought, his heart began to beat faster.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The fat pig's belly must contain some strange thing, perhaps a weapon of some sort. The world will surely cause chaos in the palace if it's revealed. I feel a sudden surge of anxiety.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Trinket wondered what could be hidden under those bandages. Could it be that the eunuch had a little 'weapon' of some sort hidden under his clothing and this was his way of getting himself into the Palace in order to make a big surprise attack on a number of Triad members? The very thought made his heart beat faster.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Wei Xiaobao was thinking: "There must be some strange artifact hidden in this fat pig's belly, could it be weapons? Is the heaven and earth planning to create chaos in the palace by killing someone?" His heart pounded uncontrollably.

Whatever is in that carcass,' thought Trinket, 'must be something really extraordinary. The Triad Society obviously intends to use it for some terrible weapon in their planned assault on the Palace. They've got to be planning mass murder.' And his heart began to beat faster.

chinese: 他们在批斗会上常常进入半睡眠状态，只有一声恫吓才能使其惊醒过来，机械地重复那已说过无数遍的认罪词。
english: They often seemed to be half asleep during the sessions and would only startle awake when someone screamed in their faces to make them mechanically recite their confessions, already repeated countless times.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: They often enter a state of semi-consciousness during the mass re-education camps, only one shout of protest can wake them up from their trance-like state. They repeat the same confession over and over again without pause or interruption.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They often entered a state of partial sleep during mass rallies, where only a shout could waken them up. They recited the confession word for word.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: They often enter a state of semi-sleep at the trial, only a threat can rouse them and make them repeat the words they have said countless times.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Sometimes they entered a halfsleep during which a loud threat was all it took to awaken them, and they recited the words of confession, Repeated countless times, already.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: They often drifted into a kind of semi-sleep during the denunciation sessions, roused from it only by a threat, and went through the motions of the confession that they had repeated many times before.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): They would often drift off into a daze during struggle sessions, awakening only to mechanically repeat the same repentant words over and over.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: They often fall into a state of half-sleep during the struggle session, and only a loud shout can wake them up. They mechanically repeat the confessions they have uttered countless times.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: During struggle sessions, they often fell into a semiconscious state, and the only thing that would awaken them would be the threat of punishment, after which they would mechanically repeat the confessions they had made countless times.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: They often enter a semi-sleeping state during public criticism sessions, only a threatening tone can awaken them, mechanically repeating the confession words they have said countless times before.

They often fell into semi-sleep during the struggle sessions, and could be roused only by the shock of being hit. Then, as if programmed, they would mumble the same self-criticisms they had made before.

chinese: 韦小宝听他接连提到皇上，心念一动：“难道这里是皇宫？
english: Something was beginning to fall into place in Trinket's mind, with all these references to 'His Majesty'. 'Could this be the Palace, the Forbidden City itself!' he thought silently to himself.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Wu Baogang listened to him talking about the king one after another. He felt a twinge of curiosity: "Isn't this the imperial palace?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket was at once impressed by the significance of the place—though he wondered if it really was the Palace!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaoya heard him mention the emperor again, and his mind drifted: "Could this be a palace?"
