chinese: 薛蟠忙道：“好兄弟，我原为求你快些出来，就忘了忌讳这句话，改日你要哄我，也说我父亲，就完了。”
english: 'Now look here, old chap,' said Xue Pan, getting agitated, 'it was only because I wanted to fetch you out a bit quicker. I admit it was very wrong of me to make free with your Parent, but after all, you've only got to mention my father next time you want to fool me and we'll be quits!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Peng Bao said with a smile: "Brother! I was just trying to make you hurry up when I forgot that it was not proper to mention your name during this time, so we’ll meet again next week, and tell me about my father."

chinese: 父亲早就知道余司令的队伍连聋带哑连瘸带拐不过四十人，但这些人住在村里时，搅得鸡飞狗跳，仿佛满村是兵。
english: Father knew all along that Commander Yu's troops numbered no more than forty – deaf, mute, and crippled included. But when they were quartered in the village, they had stirred things up so much, with chickens squawking and dogs yelping, that you'd have thought it was a garrison command.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Father had known that the regiment’s squad was deaf, blind, and disabled by forty men before it was formed, but these people lived in the village and caused chaos whenever they came out of it.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Father had known that the Red Army unit led by Yu was composed of only forty men who were deaf, dumb, blind and crippled, but these people made a huge ruckus when they lived in the village, as if the whole village was full of soldiers.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Commander Yu's forty men consisted of both deaf and blind, and both lame and crippled individuals; yet when they first moved into the village, everything seemed livelier than usual, as if it was infested with soldiers.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Father had long known that the force led by Governor Yu consisted of no more than forty people who were either deaf or dumb, or lame or crippled. But when these individuals lived in the village, they caused chaos, as if the entire place was filled with soldiers.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Father had long since figured out that Commander Yu's band of no more than forty men, half blind and half lame, was the rowdiest force in the village, where they raised the chickens' feathers and the dogs' howls whenever they arrived.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Father knew that Yú Sīlìng's team had only forty people, but when they were in the village, they caused quite a commotion, as if the whole village was filled with soldiers.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Father had learned that Commander Yu's band of soldiers – four dozen men, lame, mute, and maimed – could cause more trouble for the villagers than an army of thousands.

chinese: 他一改往常在媒体上那副脏兮兮的流浪汉模样，西装革履，显得风度翩翩，“你们和我想象的差不多，都是精英人士，《三体》就是为你们这样的阶层准备的，它的内涵和意境，常人难以理解；玩它所需要的知识，其层次之高，内容之深，也是常人不可能具备的。”
english: Appearing in the media, he usually looked disheveled, like a vagrant, but today, he was dressed sharply in a suit and dress shoes. 'You're just like I imagined. Three Body is intended for people in your class because the common crowd cannot appreciate its meaning and mood. To play it well requires knowledge and understanding that ordinary people do not possess.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He has become a different man on the media scene, wearing a suit and tie, displaying a gentlemanly air, “You’re not that much like me; you’re elite types, so I’m preparing your kind for this book series, its contents and意境，common people cannot understand it; it requires you to acquire knowledge at such a high level and a deep content.”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): With newfound professionalism, he walked onto the stage in a pair of pants and shoes that smelled of torn cloth but appeared elegant as night and day with the media's usual haggard look. A true intellectual, Three Body was imagined not as an ordinary product, but with an infinite variety of meanings and depths; to be a user of this kind requires knowledge at a basic level and a deep understanding of the most fundamental concepts.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He changed his usual squalid appearance on the media, wearing a suit and tie, looking well-dressed and gentlemanly. "You guys are just like me; we are all elites. ‘The Three-body Problem’ is meant for your kind of people. Its content and意境，普通人是很难理解的。玩《三体》，需要掌握的知识层次之高，内容之深，也只有我们这些人才能具备。”
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Dressed to the nines, with a shiney suit and leather shoes, this old man in these interviews was nothing like his dirty-shoe, scruffy-hood image on TV. It speaks to the intellectual levels and profundities of human understanding that ordinary folks just can't comprehend.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He changed from his usual media persona as a disheveled street person to a well-dressed gentleman, exuding elegance. "You're about what I imagined, all elites. 'The Three-Body Problem' is for people like you, those in high society. Its profundity and poetic imagery are beyond the grasp of ordinary folks; the knowledge required to play it is of such a high level and depth that most people simply cannot possess it."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): He was nothing like the dirty, homeless man he appeared when he gave interviews. Dressed in a suit and tie, he seemed to exude elegance. chinese: 孤寂像一只巨掌压着叶文洁，她觉得自己被越压越小，最后缩到这个世界看不到的一个小角落去了……

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Loneliness is like a giant hand that has been pressing on Ye Wenjie all the way to the end, making her feel smaller and smaller until she is now confined to a corner of the world where no one can see her anymore…

chinese: 我们最后去了刘大爹那里，住在水碾背后的山洼里，陈清扬给刘大爹看病，我给刘大爹种地。
english: We finally went there for shelter, living in the valley behind the mill. Chen Qingyang treated Grandpa Liu's leprosy, and I tended the land for him.

chinese: 叶文洁推开阮雯的家门，发现抄家后混乱的房间变得整洁了，那几幅被撕的油画又贴糊好挂在墙上，歪倒的钢琴也端正地立在原位，虽然已被砸坏不能弹了，但还是擦得很干净，残存的几本精装书籍也被整齐地放回书架上……
english: Wenjie pushed open the door to Ruan's home, and she saw that the chaos left by the Red Guards had been cleaned up: The torn oil paintings had been glued back together and rehung on the walls; the toppled piano had been set upright and wiped clean, though it was broken and could no longer be played; the few books left behind had been put back neatly on the shelf....
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Yuan Wenjian opened the door of Lin Weihan's house, discovering that the mess had been tidied up after the house was plundered. The several paintings torn down were put back on the wall, while the upright piano stood straight with its original position. Although it was smashed beyond repair and no longer able to be played, it was still cleaned up well. Some of the books that had been neatly bound were also returned to their rightful place in the bookshelf...
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Ye pushed Yang Wein's door open and found a disheveled room, the two oil paintings that had been torn away hanging on the walls, the misshapen piano that had been glued up, and all the textbooks that had been smashed against their sides were still left in their places: even though it was certain that the pianos couldn't be played, the textbooks were carefully placed back on their shelves....
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Ye Wenjie pushed open the door of阮雯的家， found a tidy room after the house was ransacked, those torn paintings were rehung on the wall, the broken piano was upright and placed back where it belonged, though its frame had been smashed, it was still cleaned up and some of the hardbound books were put back on the bookshelf…
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Ye opened up the door at Wenjie's home. The place had appeared tidy upon her arrival, save for the torn paintings and the broken piano. The paintings were hung back up, and the piano stood upright, though tilted a little because of the damage. The books, which had fallen out of order after the attack, were returned to their places on the bookshelf. . . .
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Yeh Wenji pushed open Ruan Wen's door and found that the disordered room after the house search had become tidy. The few torn oil paintings were reattached and hung on the walls again, with the tipped-over piano standing upright in its original position, though it could no longer be played due to the damage, it was still cleaned very neatly, and the remaining hardcover books were neatly placed back on the shelves...
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): When Ye pushed open Ruan's door, she found that the chaotic scene after the raid had been replaced by order. The torn paintings that had been pasted over again were hung up once more on the walls; the piano, having been knocked askew, was now upright though badly damaged and unplayable. Even so, Ye wiped it down until it sparkled, and placed the few remaining精装 books back on the shelves....

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: When Ye pushed open Ruan's door, she found that the chaotic mess in Ruan's home had been straightened out. The torn paintings had been mended and hung back up on the walls. The overturned piano had been righted, though it was too damaged to play. It had been carefully cleaned. Even the few remaining luxury books had been put back on the shelves, though Ruan had probably never bothered to dust them before.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Jian Wenjie opens Ruan Wenyi's house door and finds that the disordered room after the raid is now clean. When Ye pushed open Ruan's door, she found that the room, ransacked by the Red Guards, was now neat and orderly. The torn paintings were repaired and hung back on the walls, the smashed piano was standing upright (though the strings inside were broken and the instrument was no longer playable), and the few books that had been thrown onto the floor were neatly placed back on their shelves.

chinese: 谁知狗儿利名心重，听如此说，心下便有些活动； 又听他妻子这番话，便笑道：“老老既这么说，况且当日你又见过这姑太太一次，为什么不你老人家明日就去走一遭，先试试风头儿去？”
english: Gou-er's cupidity, however, had been aroused by the words of his mother-in-law, and his reaction to them was less discouraging than his wife's. 'Well, if it's as you say, Grannie, and being as you've already seen this lady, why not go there yourself and spy out the land for us?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: How could one guess that a dog would have such great prestige, and when he heard her words, his heart began to stir; but when he heard what she said about her wife, he laughed: "Why should I go out of my way if you see this auntie again? Why don't you go out of your way and try your luck first?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Seeing what Doer had to say, it was no wonder that he began to tinker; and since his wife had preceded him so fully in talking him into coming, a smile curved his face. 'Well, of course you must all agree that it is high time we went visiting to see who she is like. Tomorrow evening your grandson will be able to tell you whether he likes it yet.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Who knew that the dog's heart was so greedy for honor? Hearing this, his heart began to beat a little more rapidly; when he heard what his wife said, he laughed and said: "If you say so, I will go tomorrow. Why not see how it goes by taking a walk first?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): At听这些话, Gou-er's competitive nature seemed to have some激活。 Then he heard his wife's new explanation, and he burst out laughing: 'Well, old lady, you're right! You know that you've met Her Ladyship before; why shouldn't I try my hand at this first by going with you only once?'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Who would have known that Goatherd, driven by his desire for fame and fortune, would be swayed upon hearing this? After listening to his wife's words, he chuckled, "Well, if you're so insistent on this, and considering you've met Auntie Ma once before, why not let you go tomorrow, as a test to see how things stand?"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Yet Jia Rui's utilitarian nature was offended by this last remark and a glimmer of interest flickered in his eyes. 'Come on, Granddad,' he said, addressing the old man, 'you say that we ought to go. You've already met this Mrs Guanyin once. Why don't you go round to her place tomorrow and see how she feels things? Find out what she thinks about all this business first, before we make up our minds what to do.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Who knows how much the dog loves fame, and when he hears these words, his heart starts to stir. Then, when he hears his wife's response, he laughs and says, "Since my old man said so, and since you've already met that lady once, why don't you go visit her tomorrow and see how it goes?"
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Hearing this somewhat vague but, to Gou-er's sensitive nature, very attractive proposal, and coupled with his wife's advice, he felt himself impelled to take some action. After a moment's reflection he said: 'If you think it's all right, Mother, and provided you think it's all right, I don't see why I shouldn't go. Why, didn't you used to work for the mistress before she married? Why shouldn't you go and pay her a visit tomorrow and see what sort of impression you make?'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Who knows that a dog's name is heavy in his heart, hearing such words, there is some activity in my heart; furthermore, hearing his wife say this, he laughed and said: "Since you say it like that, moreover, on that day you didn't see that aunt even once, why don't you go see her tomorrow, try to test the wind and see?"

Gou-er's interest was aroused by all this. When the old lady proceeded to criticize her own humble servant, he could not help smiling; and when, after a moment's reflection, he saw that she meant what she said, he laughed out loud. 'Well, if you think it's all right, I don't see why I shouldn't go myself tomorrow and have a look at this Grannie Liu and her 'wind's head',' he said.

chinese: 贾蔷翻身出来，纸笔现成，拿来叫贾瑞写。 他两个做好做歹，只写了五十两银子，画了押，贾蔷收起来。 然后撕掳贾蓉。
english: Jia Qiang at once disappeared and reappeared only a moment later with paper and a writing-brush which had evidently been made ready in advance. Writing at his dictation Jia Rui was compelled, in spite of protests, to put down fifty taels of silver as the amount on the IOU. The document, having been duly signed, was at once pocketed by Jia Qiang, who then pretended to seek the connivance of Jia Rong.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Jiā yí róu shàng, bǎ tài píng zài láo, lái zhěn jǐng jiàn zuò qù jiào. Zǒu dào ài dà hěn, hū zhī wán jì, fēi qí xióng cǐ yǐ zhěn, jiā yín chéng sòng. unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now Jia Qiang,翻身一跃，飞出窗去，在一张桌旁，拿笔随手之间，已将贾瑞所画之物即刻写完。剩下的五十九两银子原是画在一张纸上，二人订约之后，贾瑞拿了去请人来担保;而贾伯伯自己却只取了一张，剩下的一半撕了下来，并且拿了一条大红布，用火烧破。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Zhajie got up and took out the paper and pen, then asked Jare for a signature. They wrote down only fifty silver dollars and drew their signatures. Then Zhajie tore up Jure.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Just as he was saying this, Jia Qiang sprang up again and produced his writing-brush. 'Wait!' he said. 'First you! Then you! And then you! – oh, no more twitting! Just twenty taels of silver and you're done, Jia Rong. Make a bargain?'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Jia Qiang turned over and came out, with paper and brush at hand, he called on Jia Rui to write it down. They struggled and managed to write down fifty taels of silver, signed their names, and Jia Qiang took it away. Then he made a scene with Jia Rong.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Jia Qiang turned out of the bed, found a sheet of paper and a brush beside him, and told Jia Rui to write a fifty-taleng IOU for him, which Jia Rui did, with his signature at the bottom. Jia Qiang pocketed the IOU and then went on to make Jia Rong write one.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Jia Qi turned around and saw that his inkstone was ready. He picked it up and called for Jia Rui to write. He had the two men write a note for fifty taels of silver, and Jia Qi collected it. Then, he tore up Jia Rong's note.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Jia Qiang got out of bed, went to the study, took the writing-box from under the table, and calling for Jia Rui, gave him the bank-note and instructed him to make out it for fifty taels of silver. While Jia Rui was about it, he took the opportunity of ripping poor Jia Rong's clothes off the back of him.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Jia Qi flipped over and came out, the paper and pen were ready, he called Jia Rui to write. They both finished their task, only writing fifty taels of silver, and drew a seal. Jia Qi put it away. Then he seized Jia Rong.

At once Jia Qiang turned over and found that his writing-brush had miraculously materialised in his hand and began to write out the receipt for fifty taels of silver, which he read out to Jia Rui, who wrote it down for him. Then Jia Qiang snatched Jia Rong's sister by the arm and hurriedly left the room with her.

chinese: 别人热闹的时候，他大多是靠边站，有他没他都行的。
english: When everyone else was having a great time, he would be off standing in one corner as if he did not count.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: When others are having a good time, he tends to stand back; as long as it doesn't bother him, that's all right.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When other people were having a good time, he would stand aside; it would be just as well if no one was.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He is usually on the sidelines when everyone else is busy, and he doesn’t mind if he isn’t there or not.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Other people might be busy then, but most of the time his status was elevated nothing more than the level of a distant seat.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: When others are lively, he is often on the sidelines, it doesn't matter whether he's there or not.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): When others were having a good time, he would usually stand off to one side and could easily be overlooked.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: When others are having fun, he usually stands aside and is okay with not being included.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He was content to hover on the periphery, as long as everything was fine without him.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He usually stands on the side when others are noisy, whether he is there or not makes no difference.
During other people's parties, he was often left standing off to one side, but he didn't mind; as long as he was with his friends, it didn't really matter where he was.

chinese: 他隐秘之事甚多，没要小太监住在屋里服侍。
english: He had too many secrets to want a young eunuch attendant living with him in his apartment.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: His many secret affairs were numerous, so he did not want a concubine living in the house to be his wife.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He went out of his way to be secret. He didn't even have a Miss xuan in his apartment to lie with.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He had many secrets, and did not have the small eunuch stay at home to serve him.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He kept a very secret life and didn't make the boys in whom he lived live with him.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He had many secret matters, and he did not want the little eunuch to live in the room to attend to him.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): There were a great many secret things in his life that required him to keep his eunuch away at night.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He has many secrets that he keeps hidden, and he keeps a eunuch servant in his room to attend to him.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He had, in fact, very secret business of his own to transact and never kept a little eunuch in attendance with him.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He has many secret matters, and does not require the small eunuch to stay in the house to serve.
I had a lot of secrets when I was a young eunuch, and I didn't want a little one like you tagging along after me all the time.

chinese: 八月深秋，无边无际的高粱红成洸洋的血海，高粱高密辉煌，高粱凄婉可人，高粱爱情激荡。
english: In late autumn, during the eighth lunar month, vast stretches of red sorghum shimmered like a sea of blood. Tall and dense, it reeked of glory; cold and graceful, it promised enchantment; passionate and loving, it was tumultuous.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: In August, the highlands of rice fields turned crimson with a blood-red tide of red rice. Rice fields were thickly covered in the red rice, towering, bright, and tender. The rice was full of life and emotion.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Oxalis, the broad, unpolluted eyes of autumn, had turned scarlet by that time and the sorghum there was a blood-ocean where high spirits soared at their height.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: In August, the deep autumn, the tall reeds turn red as a sea of blood, the tall reeds are dense and splendid, the tall reeds are mournful but appealing, the love of the tall reeds is stirring.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In the deep autumn months, immeasurable areas of sorghum turned crimson, turning the fields into a blood sea; the catties were so dense and brilliant that they seemed mournful; and even the love stories set against this red background were exciting.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: In the deep autumn of August, the boundless sea of red sorghum stretches out like a blood ocean without end. The sorghum is splendidly tall, tenderly moving, and its passion for love is turbulent.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): It was late August, and the无boundless sea of blood-red sorghum shimmered with a glorious radiance, the glowing stalks of sorghum quivering with tenderness, the fields bathed in the agitating heat of passionate love.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: In August, the high reeds are deep and profound, forming a vast ocean of red blood. The high reeds are dense and bright, and their melancholy is moving. The high reeds love and are moved by love.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: In August and the deep autumn, the blood-red sea of sorghum sizzles brightly; it's both cheerful and poignant, brimming with the passion of love.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: In mid-August, the boundless sea of golden wheat turns into a vast ocean of crimson blood, the wheat fields are dense and dazzling, the wheat is sad and beautiful, and the love in the wheat fields is tumultuous.
In the deep autumn of August, the sorghum fields turned into a boundless ocean of blood, the stalks so dense they seemed to shine; the sorghum whispered of love and passion.

chinese: 过了一些时候，我们队的知青全调走了。 男的调到糖厂当工人，女的到农中去当老师。
english: After a while, the city students in our team were all transferred to other positions; the men landed work at the candy factory, and the women got to teach at the agricultural middle school.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: For some time we had our cadets, mostly men, go off to work at sugar factories. The women were sent to the rural schools.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After a wait, our city students were moved out of campus one batch, and the male students went to the sugar factory and the female went to a teaching station.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Some time later, all the knowledges of our team were transferred out. The men went to work at a sugar factory and the women became teachers at a agricultural school.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After some time, all of our team's sent-down youths were removed, the men transferred to the sugar factory to work as workers, and the women sent to the farm to become teachers.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: After some time had passed, all the knowledge workers from our group were reassigned. The men went to work at a sugar factory, and the women took positions as teachers at agricultural high schools.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): After a while, all the knowledge seekers from our production team were transferred away: the men to work in the sugar factory, and the women to teach at the farm school.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: After some time, our team's youth brigade members dispersed. The men went to work in a sugar factory, while the women went to teach in the countryside.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: After a while, all the city students were sent down to work or teach in the countryside. The boys went to work at the sugar factory, and the girls went to the farms to teach.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: After some time, all the young pioneers from our team were called away. The men were assigned to work at a sugar factory, while the women went to rural areas to teach.
After a while, our city students were all called back: the men to the sugar mill as workers, and the women to the countryside to teach.

chinese: “在，大叔，长得好好的，就是耳朵流血啦。”
english: 'It's there, Uncle, right where it's supposed to be. Except your ear's bleeding.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Look, my grandfather is good-looking. He has a tear in his ear."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Yes, Uncle, it's not easy having a good earlobe like that cut off.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Ah, uncle, you look fine, but you have bleeding ears."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Yes, Uncle. I'm fine. My ears are bleeding.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: In, uncle, everything's fine, it's just that my ears are bleeding."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Yes, Uncle. I'm fine, just a little bloody ear.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Uncle, you look good, but your ears are bleeding."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'Uncle, your ear's bleeding.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Here, uncle, you look good, but your ear is bleeding."
Yes, Uncle,' the boy said, 'it's all right. My ear's bleeding.'

chinese: 韦小宝道：“我想也没什么难处，我明天一定牢牢掀住他肩头。”
english: 'I didn't think it would be hard. I just get him in a good shoulder grip, then—'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Qian Baogang said, "I think I don’t have any trouble; I will definitely hold him by his shoulders tomorrow."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I think I might be able to explain it,' said Trinket, and he promised himself that he would 'hold on' until tomorrow morning when he would try again.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaohong said, "I don't think there's anything difficult about it. I'll definitely pinch his shoulders tomorrow."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I don't think there's anything particularly difficult about it,' said Trinket. 'I'll lock him out properly tomorrow.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Wei Xiaobao said, "I don't think there will be much difficulty. I'll definitely hold onto his shoulder firmly tomorrow."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): I don't see what the difficulty could be,' said Trinket. 'I'll certainly give him a good shake tomorrow!'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "I don't think it will be difficult. I'll definitely hold on tightly to him tomorrow."</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'I don't see what's hard about it,' said Trinket. 'I'll have him by the shoulder neck or bust!'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Wei Xiaobao said: "I don't think there's anything difficult. I will definitely put a firm hand on his shoulder tomorrow."
I don't think it will be any trouble,' said Trinket. 'I'll get a good grip on him tomorrow.'

chinese: 尽管村子里火光冲天，但高粱地里，还是呈现出一派安恬的宁静夜色。
english: Although battle fires still lit up the sky above the village, an aura of peace and quiet had settled over the sorghum fields.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Despite the bright lights from the village, a peaceful night was still unfolding around the low-lying fields of rice.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Even though that town was on fire, the sorghum fields remained a lullaby of peace and tranquillity in the night sky above.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Though the village was ablaze with flames, the fields of sorghum were still bathed in a serene and tranquil night.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Even though the fires in the village were flashing red, the sorghum fields were quiet and peaceful, as if resting for the night.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Despite the raging inferno in the village, the sea of red sorghum offered a tranquil, starlit scene of peace.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Even though there were flames leaping into the air all around them, the tips of the sorghum stalks glowed in the moonlight, radiating a peaceful serenity.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Despite the bright lights in the village, the countryside still exudes a peaceful and serene night atmosphere.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Even though the village was ablaze with fire, the peaceful night still reigned supreme in the sorghum field.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Despite the village being illuminated by fireworks reaching the sky, the millet fields still presented a tranquil, peaceful night scene.
Even though the lights from the village lit up the sky, the sorghum fields still appeared peaceful and quiet under the moon.

chinese: 那鱼、猪不过贵而难得，这藕和瓜亏他怎么种出来的!
english: Maybe not so much the sturgeon and the sucking-pig. They're just expensive. But where would you go to get a piece of lotus root or a melon like that? However did they get them to grow so big?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: That fish, pork, and vegetables are cheap but hard to come by; how did he cultivate those cucumbers and cucumbers?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The expensive fish and the poor pig were worth studying for their flesh, but this thatch and the melon came advantageously grown.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: That fish and pig were not dear but hard to come by, while this lotus root and watermelon were his fault for not growing them properly!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Fish and pigs cost more than other animals because they are rare. But what does her vegetable garden do? It produces fruit and vegetables cheaper than anyone else.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Those fish and pigs are just too expensive and hard to come by, how on earth did he manage to grow such lotus roots and melons?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The pork and fish cost a lot and are hard to get. But how did he grow all this藕和瓜？
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: How did he manage to grow such a precious lotus and watermelon? It's amazing!</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: To think that the poor fish and pork were only moderately priced and the lotus and melons were the ones that cost a fortune!
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: That fish and pig are expensive and rare, how can he cultivate yam and melon like that!
Now I can understand the fish and the pig being too expensive to eat every day. But what about the radishes and the gourds? How did they get there?

chinese: 那片地真肥。
english: That piece of land was really rich.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: That field is rich.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The land there was really plump.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The ground is really rich.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That area was really rich.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: That piece of land is truly fertile.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The land was sure fertile.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: That piece of land is very fertile.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: That field was really fertile.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: That piece of land is very fertile.
That bit of land was really fertile.

chinese: 左首一人又高又瘦，面目黝黑，姓顾名炎武，字亭林，江苏昆山人士。
english: The other one, a tall, thin man with a swarthy complexion, was Gu Yanwu, a native of Kunshan in Jiangsu Province.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The first one is tall with a scrawny face, with dark skin, named Guo Zhenwu, known as Tiantian Lin, from Shandong Province.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The next man to the left was also very tall and heavily built, with a patch of dark hair skin. His full name was Gu Zhirin, and he was the first chairman of the Academy.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: A tall and thin man, with a dark complexion, by the left was called Gu Zongben, also known as Huang Tinglin, a person of Jiangsu's Kunshan.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The one he addressed as 'Zongyi' was a tall and gaunt man of perhaps forty years or so, of some extraordinary culture and with a surname – Gu Yanwu – which clearly originated in a place where the Chinese language was widely spoken. He had now settled in Shanghai.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The person on the left was tall and thin, with a dark complexion. His name was Kǔ Yánwǔ, also known as Tinglín. He was from Kunshan, Jiangsu province.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The one he addressed as 'Zu' was a tall, thin man with dark, weathered features. His full name was Gu Yanwu, or, as he had been taught to be known, Xu Tinglin. He was a man of Kuanshan in Jiangsu Province.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Left, one person, tall and thin, face dark, surname Gu, name Enwu, given name Tinhlin, a gentleman from Kunshan, Jiangsu.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The one he addressed as 'Lian' was a tall, thin man with a dark complexion. His surname was Gu and his clan name Yanwu. Like his interlocutor, he was a man of Kunshan in Jiangsu Province.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The first person is tall and thin, with a dark complexion. His surname is Gu and his given name is Wen Wu. His style name is Ting Lin, and he is from Kunshan, Jiangsu.
The one he addressed as 'Old Gui' was a tall, thin man with a dark complexion. His full name was Gu Yanwu and he, like his host, was a man of Kangxiang in the province of Jiangsu.

chinese: 这些人嘴里尊称自己是香主，满口什么静候香主吩咐云云，其实各人肚里早就有了主意，只盼得到自己赞同，于是一切便推在韦香主头上，日后他们就不会担当重大干系。
english: It was all 'Master this' and 'Master that' and respectfully waiting to be told by the Master what they should do; but invariably they had already decided what they wanted to do and only wanted the Master's approval for doing it, so that if there was any question about it later, the Master would have sole responsibility for what they had done.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: These people speak of themselves as masters of the fragrance, and often talk about waiting for their master’s instructions, which is all part of a plan they have been working out all along. However, when it comes time to say “I consent” or agree with something, they tend to forget that they already know what to do, so instead of being hesitant, they simply go ahead and do whatever they want, regardless of whether or not it aligns with their own plans.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): These off-duty masters like to crow their new beloved's glory, but all they do is wait for him to order them what to make. Already long before their meetings, in fact, every one of them had a plan in mind and was waiting for its execution to be carried out. All they wanted was for someone else to agree with his that they should not take part in any important matter. In this way their roles would never grow too great.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: These people spoke of themselves as the master of incense, and constantly said things like "waiting for the will of the master of incense," but in their hearts they had already made up their minds what to do. All they needed was the approval of the master of incense, and then they would not be held responsible for any serious consequences.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): These Helmsman-songs all bowed up front and claimed their lofty title with reverent phrases like 'Waiting for my chief's instructions'. But whatever it was they had in mind, all they really wanted was the green-light from their leader. So they made him the hero: any decisions they made had only to be referred back to him for approval, and thereafter they could not take responsibility for them.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: These people, who call themselves Grand Incense Masters on their lips, and spout nonsense like waiting for the Grand Incense Master's instructions, actually have their own plans in mind. They only hope that their ideas will be approved by them, so they can shift all responsibilities onto Wei the Grand Incense Master. That way, they won't bear the weight of major consequences in the future.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): These people would stand respectfully and call him 'Elder': 'I beg to wait for your instructions, ' they would say, but all the time they would be plotting inside their heads, hoping to persuade him to agree with them so that he would have to answer for any major decisions and they would not.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: These people call themselves "incense masters" and talk about waiting for the incense master's instructions. In reality, each person has already made up their own minds, and they are just hoping to receive the incense master's approval. As a result, everything is blamed on the incense master, and they will not take responsibility for their actions in the future.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: These individuals, who all called themselves 'the Master of Fragrances', would come out with a lot of nonsense about waiting for the Master of Fragrances to give them orders; in reality they had their own opinions, but were waiting for this 'Master of Fragrances' to approve of them before they carried them out. In the future they would shift the blame for any big mistake they made onto the Master of Fragrances.

chinese: 彼此的梦里都做过无数回，那梦里的人都不大像了，还不如不梦见。

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They had replayed the scenes in their dreams countless times, but with越来越远的记忆，已经记不清谁是真谁是假了，真叫人不想梦见。

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: They had made love countless times in their dreams, and the people in their dreams were not at all like their real selves, and they both agreed that it was a relief not to dream about each other.

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Wei Xiaobao did not know what "antelope on a branch" referred to, but he had won by accident and was very pleased with himself. He said, "What is this 'antelope on a branch'? I have many more powerful techniques that I haven't used yet."

chinese: 晚村兄要是有意，咱三人结伴同去扬州，兄弟给你引见几位同道中人如何？”
english: If you'd care to join us, the three of us could travel to Yangzhou together. I have a number of contacts there I could introduce you to. What do you think?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: If late Nihon no Tsukuyomi wishes it, we would go together to Yangzhou with you, and introduce you to some of your fellow comrades whom he knows?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you like, Mr Li, I think it would be great if we could join forces and go to Yangzhou on a little trip; so that you can introduce some of our friends from the mountain?'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Brother Wan, if you are interested, we could go together to Yangzhou with three of us, and I would introduce you to some fellow travelers."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you're really interested in seeing them, why don't all of us go together? We could make a little trip to Yangzhou and introduce you to some of the fellows. What do you think?'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: If Brother Wancun has the intention, the three of us can go to Yangzhou together. How about I introduce you to a few like-minded individuals?"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): If you are serious about this, I can easily arrange a trip to Yangzhou for the three of us. Introduce me to some like-minded souls, will you?'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: If your brother is interested, we can go to Yangzhou together and introduce you to some of our colleagues.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'If you're serious about going, I'd like to invite you to come with me to Yangzhou, Lavendar. I'll introduce you to some of the like-minded individuals I know there.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Wancun Xiong wants to go to Yangzhou if he has the intention. Can I introduce you to a few acquaintances in the same field when the three of us go together?"
If you change your mind, the three of us could set off for Yangzhou together. I know some people in the Society who could help you get an introduction.'

chinese: 红色联合的红卫兵们退后一段距离，将那个挂在高处的躯体当靶子练习射击，密集的子弹对她来说已柔和如雨，不再带来任何感觉。
english: The Red Guards backed up some distance and began to use the impaled body for target practice. For her, the dense storm of bullets was now no different from a gentle rain, as she could no longer feel anything.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The Red Guards retreated a few steps away from her, aiming their rifles at that hanging body and firing them with great precision, making it feel like rain.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After a short distance, the red Guards took off their belts and fired at a target on a high pole with a rifle, dismissing all the bullets as soft like drizzle, never noticing another way to numb them out.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The Red Joint's Red Guards backed away a little and practiced shooting at the body hanging high, which was now like rain on her, no longer causing any feeling for her.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The Red Union's Red Guards withdrew some distance, practicing their shooting from a distance with the body hanging from the roof. She no longer felt the pressure of hundreds of bullets raining down on her body; it was soft like rain.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The Red Guards, now in red alliance, stepped back and aimed their rifles at the body perched high up, using it as a target for practice. The dense bullets fell upon her like gentle rain, no longer carrying any sensation.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The red troops stepped back and began firing at the hanging figure, practicing their aim. The bullets, now as gentle as rain, no longer gave her any feeling.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The red guards retreated a distance, practicing their shooting skills on the target hanging from above. The bullets, once a threat, now seemed gentle and rain-like to her.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The Red Guards ceased firing at close range and had the corpse on the pole targeted as practice for their marksmanship. The bullets flew through her body without feeling, like rain.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The red-clad Red Guards retreated a certain distance and used the body hanging high up as a target for practice shooting. A dense barrage of bullets felt soft to her, no longer bringing any sensation.
The Red Guards of the Red Union stepped back a few paces and fired at her suspended body. The barrage of bullets was now as gentle as rain, and she felt nothing.

chinese: 麝月听说，忙向镜中摆手儿。
english: Musk signalled to him agitatedly in the glass with her hand.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Mingyue heard that he had been trying to shake his head before the mirror.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Bao-yu heard this and waved his hand in front of Jia Yun to get him to shake it.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Mishao heard and hurriedly waved her hands in the mirror.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She realized with a start that the speaker was speaking through the mirror and hurriedly waved her hand in front of it.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Upon hearing this, Xian Yue hurriedly made hand gestures towards the mirror.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Patience made a beckoning motion to her from the mirror.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Mengyue heard that she should busy herself with the mirror's reflection.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Chestnut heard this, and holding up her hand before the mirror could see it, laughed at her own pretty face.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Smells like someone heard that, busy waving hands in front of the mirror.
Musk heard her and hurried to arrange himself in the mirror.

chinese: 宝玉见他星眼微饧，香腮带赤，不觉神魂早荡，一歪身坐在椅子上，笑道：“你才说什么？”
english: At the sight of those soft cheeks so adorably flushed and the starry eyes a little misted with sleep a wave of emotion passed over him. He sank into a chair and smiled back at her: 'What was that you were saying just now before I came in?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Bai saw him yawning with his eyes slightly open, and his cheeks burning red, so he was not surprised at the sudden change of his mind. He said to himself, "What did you say earlier?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The fact that Starling's eyes were open and her mouth was white caused Bao-yu to suddenly lose all sympathy for her condition, and he sat himself firmly in a chair with a gesticulation of his hands. 'What do you mean, last minute!' he said to himself, as if speaking silently to his own subconscious.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Jade saw that his eyes were slightly glazed and his cheeks were flushed, and he couldn’t help being mesmerized by her beauty. He leaned forward and sat down on the chair, smiling and asking, "What did you just say?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sight of her recent changeable state, the pinkiness of her cheeks, the faintness of her eyes, combined with the sudden liveliness of her expression, had seized Bao-yu and produced in him a momentary absorption which was brought to an end by the question: 'What was that you said?'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Seeing his eyes slightly glazed over like stars and his cheeks flushed with a hint of fragrance, Doudou's charm had already affected him deeply. Without hesitation, he leaned back and sat in a chair, chuckling as he asked, "What did you just say?"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Her cloudy eyes were suffused with excitement and her cheekbones were flushed. Bao-yu felt his heart go weak. He staggered a little as he sat down on a chair. 'What was that you said?'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Bao Yu saw him with a twinkling gaze, his cheeks flushed with excitement. Without realizing it, his spirit was already entranced. He slumped his body down in the chair, laughing and saying, "What did you say?"</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Bao-yu saw the mischievous twinkle in her eyes and the blush on her cheeks, and felt his heart skip a beat. He sank into a chair with a groan. 'What were you saying?'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Jadeite sees him with starry eyes slightly squinted, his cheeks fragrant, unconsciously his spirit wandered, leaning slightly and sitting on the chair, he said laughing: "What are you talking about?"

Bao-yu observed that her eyes had a far-away look and her cheeks had a flush of pink; and, without being aware that he was doing it, he sat down on the edge of the kang with a sudden tremor of the spirits. 'What were you saying?' he asked.

chinese: 夹竹桃也开了。 平安里也是有几棵夹竹桃的，栽在晒台上碎砖围起来的一掬泥土中，开出绚烂的花朵。
english: Before long, the oleanders, planted haphazardly in makeshift planters formed from broken bricks on balconies, put forth their dazzling flowers.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The bamboo is blooming as well. The peace village has a few bamboo trees planted in the shade of broken bricks on top of which a pebble-shaped soil was placed. The flowers bloom in great abundance.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Spider vines also flowered, forming a lush clump of contrasting green hues on the coffee table where someone had planted them in废弃砖块中; their flowers sparkled.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The magnolias are also blooming. There are a few magnolias in Peace Street as well, planted in a little patch of soil surrounded by broken bricks on the deck.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now the bamboo flowers were in bloom, too. There were nightbuses and samovars and pots of bamboo flowers planted in front of people's doors throughout Peace Lane; but only this one spot where someone had taken the time to dig a patch of flowering bamboo root into the broken bricks had made anything really beautiful.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The Jacaranda has bloomed. There are a few Jacarandas in平安里, planted in a small patch of earth surrounded by broken bricks on the rooftop, their vibrant flowers shining forth.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Fences of shattered bricks line the alleys of Peace Lane, and in them potted tropicals, including some gorgeous pink bougainvillea.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The jujube trees have also bloomed. There are a few jujube trees in Ping An Li, planted in a patch of soil surrounded by broken tiles on a drying rack, blooming with vibrant flowers.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Fragrant olives also bloomed, a few of them that had been planted by the tiles on the flat roof of Peace Lane, held in the clay soil in a patch of broken bricks.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The loquat tree has bloomed as well. There are a few loquat trees in Peaceful Village, planted on the sun-drenched terraces with a scoop of soil surrounded by broken bricks. Blooming lavishly with beautiful flowers.
The almond tree outside my grandma's gate was in bloom, and there were almond trees in bloom elsewhere on Peace Lane, where they were grown in clay beds surrounded by fragments of broken bricks.

chinese: 雨打倒了无数的高粱，雨在田野里狂欢，蛤蟆躲在高粱根下，哈达哈达地抖着颌下雪白的皮肤； 狐狸蹲在幽暗的洞里，看着从高粱上飞溅而下的细小水珠，道路很快就泥泞不堪，杂草伏地，矢车菊清醒地擎着湿漉漉的头。
english: Sorghum crumpled under the wild rain. Toads took refuge under the stalks, their white pouches popping in and out noisily; foxes hid in their darkened dens to watch tiny drops of water splashing down from the sorghum plants.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Rain fell on countless high-croped crops, danced joyfully across the fields, the hens hiding under the stalks of grain; a fox was squatting in the dark hole, watching as small drops of rain fell from the tall grain, and soon the road was wet. The grasses were lying down beneath the fallen grains; the quail was standing up straight with its wet head.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): A storm has consumed countless sorghum stalks, raining down high-leaved seeds and spores that skittered under the foxes' fur. The jackal lay dormant beneath the sorghum roots, its white paws scuffing dark patches of mud onto the ground. The path soon became muddy, with dandelions lying in its shade, zinnias stood tall with dewy heads, and the wildflowers like ox-Patals shone with sunlight as they rested on their points.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Raindrops had smashed countless ears of corn, and the rain was reveling in the fields. The frogs hid under the roots of the corn stalks, shaking their white skins as they jumped up and down. The foxes were sitting in a dark hole, watching the tiny drops that fell off the corn stalks. Soon, the roads became muddy and grass lay flat, and the columbine woke up with its wet heads held high.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Crops were trampled by the falling rain, and it sang merrily in the fields as frogs hopped around under the sorghum roots, dripping white halos around their gaunt faces; foxes crouched in dark burrows to watch the tiny drops of rain splashed above them, making the paths so sticky with mud that even the cornflowers turned down to the ground.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Rain topples countless millet stalks, rain revels in the fields, frogs hide under the roots of the millet, quivering their snow-white skin; foxes crouch in the dim caves, watching tiny water droplets splash off the millet, soon the roads become muddy, weeds lie flat, and the centaury holds its wet head aloft.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The rain beat down on countless rows of sorghum; the field was a scene of festivity. Toads hid beneath the roots of the sorghum stalks, where they shivered with fear; foxes crouched in the damp darkness of their burrows, watching as tiny drops of rain splashed down from the stalks. The mud-tracks were too muddy for a man to walk on, the weeds lay dead and heavy on the ground, the wet petals of the forget-me-nots stood up stiffly.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The rain has knocked down countless stalks of wheat, and the rain is rejoicing in the fields. The frogs hide beneath the roots, shaking their snowy-white skin. The fox is crouched in a dark hole, watching the tiny water droplets splashing down from the wheat stalks. The path soon becomes muddy and slippery, and the wild grasses bow down, while the arrowhead flowers stand erect, wet with dew.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The rain fell on countless sorghum plants, dancing in the field. Toads hid under the roots, shaking the white underbellies of their bodies; foxes crouched in the dark burrows and watched the tiny water drops jump down from the plants, until the road became a quagmire.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The rain fell on countless stalks of millet, the rain was wild in the fields, the frogs hid under the millet stalks, their snow-white skin shivering; the fox squatted in a dark hole, watching the small water droplets splashing down from the millet stalks, the road soon became muddy, the weeds lay flat, the daisies stood upright, wet and drooping.

The torrents pounded the sorghum fields, drenching the skins of the frogs hiding beneath the stalks, and the fox curled up in its dark den, watching the tiny drops fly through the air, until the roads turned into muddy quagmires and the cornfield was soaked.

chinese: 那刘老老先听见告艰苦，只当是没想头了， 又听见给他二十两银子，喜的眉开眼笑道：“我们也知道艰难的，但只俗语说的：‘瘦死的骆驼比马还大’呢。
english: When Grannie Liu heard Xi-feng talk about 'difficulties' she concluded that there was no hope. Her delight and the way in which her face lit up with pleasure when she heard that she was, after all, to be given twenty taels of silver can be imagined. 'We knew you had your troubles,' she said, 'but as the saying goes, 'A starved camel is bigger than a fat horse.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Then Liu old man heard that the hardship was hard but he did not think it would be too much trouble; then he heard that he received 20 two-cents silver coins. He said happily: "We know the difficulty well, but only as a proverb says: 'A horse so small that a camel is bigger than it'?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Grannie Liu, on the other hand, before she heard the message, had guessed that the poor bastard was in difficulties; for all the rest of her kinfolk had only admired at his boldness in declaring himself hopeless. 'We know how hard life is,' she said with a smile. 'The saying, perhaps, like that from the old saying 'A horse so heavy as a mermaid would crack its neck' , applies to this poor fellow.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Before Liu Liang heard that the situation was difficult, he thought it was just a joke. Then he heard that he would receive twenty silver dollars. He smiled and said, "We also know how hard life can be, but according to old saying: 'a thin camel is bigger than a horse.'"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Grannie Liu's reaction to the reading of the problem was one of those sudden awarenesses which, once gained, prove impossible to lose. Then she heard the part about the camel, and her eyes lit up as though she had swallowed aWhiskers pill. The money offer sounded promising, especially since the expression "the fat camel is bigger than a horse" struck her as an extraordinary proverb.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The old Mr. Liu, upon hearing his plight was acknowledged, initially thought it meant all was lost. But when he heard he would receive twenty taels of silver, he beamed with delight, saying with a smile, "We understand your struggles, but as the saying goes, 'a lean camel is still bigger than a horse.' "
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): When Grannie Liu first heard that she would have to plead her poverty, she had almost given up hope; but then she was told that she would have twenty taels of silver, and her face split with smiles: 'We know perfectly well what hard times are like. But as they say, a starved camel is still bigger than a dead horse!
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: When Liu Lao heard the news of the difficulties, he thought it was just a matter of not having any ideas. But when he heard that he was being given twenty silver coins, he was overjoyed and exclaimed, "We also know that it's difficult, but we say it in a common language, 'A skinny camel is bigger than a horse'."</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Grannie Liu, hearing that a donation of twenty taels of silver had been made, had at first thought that the Lady Wang was extremely wealthy and was simply talking about her own difficulties in order to pave the way for a request for money. Her face had lit up with pleasure when she heard about the donation, but now, as the talk turned to her own difficulties, she said with a sigh: 'We know how hard it is. But, as the saying is, 'a lean camel is bigger than a fat horse'.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Liu Lao Lao initially heard complaints, he just thought he was tired. Later, he heard that he was given twenty taels of silver, and he smiled with his eyebrows open and said: "We also know it's tough, but as the saying goes: 'A camel is bigger than a horse when it's skinny.' "

Grannie Liu, from the tone of which he appeared to have been suffering from a bad headache, said that it must be a difficult job, but when she heard that it was to be rewarded by twenty taels of silver, her face broke into a smile. 'We understand how difficult it is,' she said. 'You know what the old saying is, 'The skinny donkey carries a heavier burden than the horse.'

chinese: 奶奶胸口里，揣着一把锋利的剪刀，它可能是为单扁郎准备的，也可能是为自己准备的。
english: At home she had hidden a pair of scissors in her bodice, perhaps to use on Shan Bianlang, perhaps to use on herself.

chinese: 她有一次夜半被叫醒。 人们早已入睡，那叫声便显得格外惊动，带着些危急和恐怖。 王琦瑶的心擂鼓似的怦怦响着，她睡衣外面披上件夹袄便下楼去开门，见是两个乡下人，抬了一个担架，躺着垂危的病人，说是请王医师救命。
english: Once, awakened in the middle of the night by urgent and frightened calls for help at the door, she threw a jacket over her nightgown and rushed downstairs, her heart pounding, to find two men from the provinces carrying someone on a stretcher. The person was critically ill.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: One night, she was woken by a call from the other side of the door. The people were already asleep, and that sound seemed to be more frightening than normal. Wang Qiuyuan’s heart pounded with excitement as she descended the stairs and entered the living room to knock on the door. She found two old farmers, carrying a stretcher, lying on their backs, suffering from severe illness. They said they had been sent by Dr. Wang to save them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): One time, late at night, she awoke because someone called out her name. The people were still asleep, but the noise was too alarming and dangerous for her to scream. She bolted on her feet and went down to the courtyard, where she woke Wang Qiyao by draped herself over the door and called out: 'Dr. Wang! There's a patient who needs your help! Please come in!'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: She was woken up at midnight once. The people had already gone to sleep, so the sound of their cries sounded much more alarming and urgent than usual. Wang Qiyue's heart raced like a drum as she went downstairs in her nightgown and opened the door to see two peasants carrying a stretcher with a dying patient. They said that they were asking for Dr. Wang for help.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): One night, she was awakened by a loud call during the half moon. The shout seemed to come from another world, full of excitement and terror. Weng stole out of bed in her sleepwear, draped by a夹袄, and went down the stairs to answer the door. She saw two peasants carrying a stretcher, with a dying patient lying on it. They were requesting that Dr. Wang save their life.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Once, she was awakened in the middle of the night. gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: She was once awakened in the middle of the night. The people were already asleep, the call was particularly alarming, with a sense of urgency and fear. They said that the patient was a peasant woman who had fallen seriously ill suddenly and they had come to beg Wang Qiyao to save her life.

chinese: 认识我的人都知道，我的腰上有旧伤，而且我身高在一米九以上。
english: Anyone familiar with me knew about the injury to my lower back, not to mention that I was a tall man, over six feet.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Everyone knows that I have a lot of old injuries on my back, but I am at least one meter nine tall.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Everyone I knew called my fame. I had a injury, and I was above a foot nine feet tall.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Everyone who knows me well knows that I have old scars on my waist, and that I am over a meter tall.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): People who knew me know I had a old injury, and that I was over six feet tall.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: As everyone who knows me is aware, I have old injuries on my waist, and I am over 1.9 meters tall.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): People who knew me then remembered that I had a back injury and was over six feet tall.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: People who know me are aware that I have an old injury on my back and I am over 6 feet tall.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: People who knew me could tell that I had an old back injury, and I was over one meter nine.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Recognized by all, I have an old injury on my waist, and my height is over 1.9 meters.
People who knew me realized that with my height and the scar on my lower back, I must have gotten it in a fall.

chinese: 轿夫们停住，呆呆地看着劈腿横在路当中的劫路人。 那人身材不高，脸上涂着黑墨，头戴一顶高粱篾片编成的斗笠，身披一件大蓑衣，蓑衣敞着，露出密扣黑衣和拦腰扎着的宽腰带。 腰里别着一件用红绸布包起的鼓鼓囊囊的东西。
english: The bearers stopped in their tracks and stared dumbstruck at the highwayman of medium height who stood in the road, his legs akimbo. He had smeared his face black and was wearing a conical rain hat woven of sorghum stalks and a broad-shouldered rain cape open in front to reveal a black buttoned jacket and a wide leather belt, in which a protruding object was tucked, bundled in red satin.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The men stopped their carts, staring at a man who was standing on the side of the road with his legs broken. The man’s height is not high, but he had painted his face with black paint. He wore a large red cloth hat with a comb-like design on it, and a large red cloth shirt that was open at the chest. He was wearing a pair of trousers that were wide enough for him to reach his knees without being cut off by the waist. His pants were tightly tied around his waist, which showed how much he wanted to make sure that no one would see his underwear or the bag that he carried.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The bearers stopped for a while, staring at the pair of men, one as tall as they were, the other as thick as bush. The taller man, with darkened flesh on his cheeks and a straw hat covering most of his head, was draped in a sack that fell to the ground above his waist. His shoulders showed his red-bronze rain cape and wide belt of blackened cotton纤维交织的袋带垂下来, which he held by its narrow contents—the thing he was holding up with his other hand.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The drivers stopped and stared at the man who had fallen down on the road, his legs spread wide like a dancer's. He was not tall but looked quite strong. He wore a black mask over his face and carried a bamboo hat, which he had tied around his head with red cloth. The man wore a long dark coat that hung open, exposing a red silk pouch in the middle of his waist.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The bearers stopped, staring at the man劈腿站在路上。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The bearers stopped, gazing blankly at the highway robber who had spread his legs across the path. The man was of average height, his face painted with soot, wearing a conical hat made of reed from tallMiscanthus, and a large fisherman's coat open to reveal a tightly buttoned black shirt and a wide waistband. A bulging package wrapped in red silk cloth was slung at his waist.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The bearers stopped dead in their tracks, staring at the highwayman, whose face was covered with black soot, his head was topped by a basket-like straw hat, and he wore a rain cape over everything, except his body, which was tightly wrapped in a red silk belt. His belt buckle was stuck into something bulgingly packed inside a red silk wrap.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The men stopped and stared at the man lying on the road. He was not tall and had black ink on his face. He wore a hat made of woven straw woven into a cone-shaped hat, and a large cloak that was open, revealing his black clothes and a wide waistband tied around his waist. He had a bundle wrapped in red silk tied around his waist.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The bearers stopped and stared at the highwayman, who was average height but had covered his face with charcoal. He wore a straw conical hat made from sorghum stalks, and a loose, cotton rain cape over one shoulder, the cape opening out to reveal a black shirt and a wide sash around his waist, to which a bulging purse was tied.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Coaches stopped, staring blankly at the bandit with a split leg in the middle of the road. The man was not tall, with a face smeared with black ink, wearing a straw hat woven from high-grass mats, a large coat open revealing a black jacket and a wide belt tied around his waist. A drum-shaped object wrapped in red silk was hanging from his waist.

The bearers stopped, their faces frozen as they stared at the highwayman, who was sprawled across the road. He was neither tall nor particularly built, but his face was daubed with black ink and he wore a straw hat woven from sorghum stalks. A large rain cape covered his shoulders, the cape gaping open to reveal the dark, tightly fastened belted cloth underneath. Hanging from his belt was a pair of drums wrapped in red silk.

chinese: 对，对，郡主娘娘，咱们刻好之后，我牵了你去长安门大街，大叫：‘哪一位客官要印乌龟？ 三文钱印一张！’
english: Ah, yes, Little Countess, I know what. When the carving's ready, I'll be able to take you out into Changan Street and set up there as a print-seller. 'Roll up, roll up!' I'll say. 'Buy a nice turtle print, three cash a sheet!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Yes, yes, Lady Queen, after we've made it, I'll take you to the Market Street, and shout: "Who is this guest wanting to print a turtle?" Three cents for each print!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That's right, 'In the Old Changenhain!' I'll pull you up on the way and say who it is. Three cash lots of these for each of you to show the folks of the city where you want to print!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Right, right, Your Highness the Princess, after we have finished carving it, I will lead you to the Chang'an Gate Street, and call out: ‘Who wants to get a turtle printed? For three coppers!’
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Yes, Your Majesty. Now we shall go to the Street in Front of the City Gate and cry out: 'One of you coin-makers for hire? Three cash for a turtle!'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Yes, yes, Princess Imperial, after we've carved it, I'll lead you to the Grand Avenue of Chang'an and shout out: "Any customer who wants a tortoise stamp? Three copper coins for one!"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Yes, Goong-goong, that's what we'll do! We'll carve the pattern first, then I'll take you to the Chang-an Gate main gate, and you can stand outside and call out: 'Who wants a turtle? Three cash for a piece!
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Sure, my lady, let's go to the Chang'an Gate, and I'll shout, 'Who wants to get a stamp from the Ink Turtle? Three silver coins for a stamp!'"</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Yes. Call her 'His Excellency the Princess'. Well, all right, then. After we've carved them out, I'll take you to the South Gate of Chang-an. There I'll shout out: 'Which of the gentlemen wants to get his turtle-shell stamped? Thirty cash for a stamp!'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Yes, yes, young lady, after we carve it, I will take you to Chang'an Gate Street and shout: "Which official wants to stamp a turtle? Three coins for one stamp!"
Yes, yes, Little Countess. When we've carved it, I'll take you to the main gate of the city and shout: 'Who wants to have a turtle seal made? Three cash each.'

chinese: 有一天在山上，我正好借了罗小四的汽枪，队长家的母狗正好跑到山上叫我看见，我就射出一颗子弹打瞎了它的右眼。
english: One day as I walked on the mountain, the team leader's dog came into view. I happened to have Luo Xiaosi's air rifle with me, so I fired a bullet and blinded her right eye.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: One day I was on a mountain when I happened to borrow the gun of Li Xiaodai from his mother. The dog’s owner’s mother came running up to me on the mountain so that she could see me shoot out a bullet at her right eye.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): One day I actually borrowed the boy's shotgun from Luo Xiaosi, so when the village teacher's dog on the mountain saw a bullet going straight through the bird's eye of its right eye, the dog was his pet and it gave the lecture.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: One day, when I was on the mountain, I borrowed Xiao He’s machine gun and the mother dog of the captain ran up to me and I saw it, so I shot a bullet at its right eye.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): One day on the mountain, I borrowed Luo Xiaosi's shotgun, and seeing a mother dog running up the mountain, I shot it. It shattered the right eye of the dog instantly.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: One day on a mountain, I happened to be borrowing Luo Xiaosi's air rifle. The captain's female dog just happened to run up the mountain and I saw her. I shot a bullet that blinded her right eye.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): One time on the mountain, I borrowed Luo Xiaosi's air rifle. At that very moment the team leader's dog happened to run up the mountain and I shot a bullet, hitting the dog's right eye.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: One day, while I was on the mountain, I borrowed a gun from Lao Xiao Si and saw the team leader's mother dog running around. I shot a bullet and hit it in the right eye.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: One day on the mountain, I borrowed an air rifle from Luo Xiaosi, and his mother dog happened to run up the mountain and cry out. I shot a bullet that blinded her right eye.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: One day on the mountain, I happened to borrow Liu Xiao Si's gun. The team leader's dog happened to run up to the mountain and I saw it. I shot out one bullet and blinded its right eye.
One day on the mountain, I borrowed Luo Xiaosi's shotgun, and the team leader's dog was running up the mountain at the time. I shot it in the right eye.

chinese: 它原先是一片蛮荒地，荆榛苇茅丛生，狐狸野兔的乐园，后来有了几架牧人的草棚，后来逃来了杀人命犯、落魄酒徒、亡命赌棍…… 他们建造房屋，开垦荒地，拓扑出人的乐园，狐狸野兔迁徙他乡，临别时齐声发出控诉人类的鸣叫。
english: At one time the site had been a wasteland covered with brambles, underbrush, and reeds, a paradise for foxes and wild rabbits. Then a few huts appeared, and it became a haven for escaped murderers, drunks, gamblers, who built homes, cultivated the land, and turned it into a paradise for humans, forcing out the foxes and wild rabbits, who set up howls of protest on the eve of their departure.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: It had once been a desolate place of wild trees, shrubs, and foxes, rabbits, and deer, with their homes and abodes for the few who built straw-houses and plowed the land. They then had some men's tents, which were later abandoned by criminals, outlaws, and gamblers who had lost their way. They built houses, cultivated the soil, and laid out gardens for human habitation, and they brought back the flocks and herds of foxes and rabbits from other places, where they would have gone if they had not lost their way.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): At first it was a barren field, where foxes and tortoises lived free, when one of the temple guides built a farmer's hut, some criminals ran away to escape the murder curse, alcoholics went to the fields to escape their addiction, rowdy baw露天棚的主人们在告别时齐声高喊: 'Tortoise and fox: my home for always.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It was once a vast, wild expanse of thornbushes and reeds, a haven for foxes and rabbits, until it had a few shepherd's huts, until they fled murderers, beggars, and gamblers on the run... They built houses, cleared land, and made their world human, as the foxes and rabbits migrated to other places, making a final outcry against humanity before departing.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): A time ago, it was a desolate area, thick with thornbush and reeds, where foxes and hares delighted in their burrows. Then there were several villages built by farmers, fertile land cultivated, where bandits, drunken felons, bankrupt gamblers had once sought refuge—where, as they left to seek new homes, they cried out in protest against humanity.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: It was once a wilderness, a thicket of brambles and reeds, a haven for foxes and rabbits. Later, there were a few shepherd huts. Then, fugitives from justice, down-and-out drunkards, desperate gamblers... They built houses, cleared the land, and tamed it into a human paradise. The foxes and rabbits migrated elsewhere, leaving behind a chorus of protest against humanity.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): It began as a deserted swampy wasteland where foxes, rabbits, and ferrets roamed at will, and then a few shepherd's huts were built. Then, fugitives from the law, disheartened gamblers, and other outlaws sought refuge there. They too built houses and cultivated the wilderness, expanding the human habitat until foxes, rabbits, and ferrets had to flee to safer lands, where they mourned the cruelty of humanity.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: It was once a wilderness, with thorny bushes and reeds growing wild. It was the paradise of foxes and rabbits. However, after a few herders came and built their grass huts, people who had committed crimes, vagrants, and gamblers arrived. They cleared the land and expanded the area, forcing the foxes and rabbits to migrate elsewhere. As they left, they cried out in protest against humans.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: At first a desolate place, it was covered by an intermingling of bramble and river reed, where foxes and hares found their happiness, and where a few nomadic herdsmen built huts and began to cultivate the land. Later, it became a haven for wanted murderers, drunken brothers-in-arms, and gambling dealers on the run. They built houses, tilled the land, and turned it into an earthly paradise. Foxes and hares fled into the wilderness, and as the humans departed, the foxes and hares raised their cries in complaint.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Initially, it was a barren land with thickets of bamboo and reeds, a paradise for foxes and rabbits. Later, there were a few shepherd's shelters built. Later, murderers, vagrants, and gamblers on the run also came. They built houses, cultivated the land, and created a human paradise. Foxes and rabbits moved to other places, and as they bid farewell, they collectively let out a lamenting call towards humanity.

The place was originally a desolate wilderness of reeds and swamp weeds, a haven for foxes and hares. Then a few thatched huts were built to shelter the herdsmen, then murderers, drunkards, and gamblers moved in. They built houses and cultivated the barren land, expelling foxes and hares, who screeched mournfully as they flew away.

chinese: 海老公道：“你如出力拿他这两处穴道，他就没力气和你相斗。”
english: 'Get him on these two points,' said Hai, 'and he'll have no strength to fight with.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Huang Peng said, “If you fight him with these two spots, he will be weak.”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you've done your job and he's got two or three of those holes in his body, he'll be too busy fighting you.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The sea cucumber said, "If you can open his two spots, he won’t have the strength to fight with you."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you want to open those pores, you've got to give him something to focus on — something to oppose the energy of his Vital Centre with.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The Sea Old Man said, "If you put your strength into seizing these two points of his, he won't have any energy left to fight with you."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): If you close them with your fingers,' said the old eunuch, 'he won't have much energy left to fight back with.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Old man said, 'If you can grab him there, he won't be able to fight back."</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'If you can find the two vital points and shut them off, he'll be knocked out, all right.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The octopus king said: "If you strike him at these two weak points, he will have no energy to fight with you."
If you can hold him properly and close the right and left vital points, he won't be able to resist you.'

chinese: 石头听了大喜，因问：“不知可镌何字?
english: The stone was delighted. 'What words will you cut?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The stone was overjoyed when it heard that it could be engraved with a symbol.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): What does the inscription ought to say?' said the rock, listening with eager attention to its silent protest.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The stone was overjoyed and asked, "Do you know what letters I should carve?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Hurray for luck! 'What have you been set to carve?' said the stone.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The stone was delighted upon hearing this and asked, "I wonder what words can be carved on it?"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The stone was exceedingly delighted with this unexpected opportunity. 'I suppose you will be wanting a inscription?
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The stone heard the big news and asked, "Do you know how to carve letters?"
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'What should the inscription be, sir?' asked the stone.
