chinese: 顾炎武道：“当今之世，便真有桃源乐土，咱们也不能独善其身，去躲了起来……”
english: 'Come,' said Gu, 'even if there were such a place, we cannot, as individuals, opt out altogether. In times like these—'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Wu Xuezhi said: “In this era, there is indeed a paradise-like world where everyone can be happy. We cannot be good enough to stay hidden.”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now's not the time for people to become self-absorbed and try to create a桃源乐土来躲避我们这些人的好啊!--那样做是对已经良知未灭的上帝的亵渎, 也是对友爱、对善良的背叛!'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Gu Yongwu said, "In this day and age, even if there is a true paradise on earth, we can't escape the world and remain pure ourselves."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Even if there were a perfect society somewhere in the world today,' said Gu, 'I don't think we could stay away from it and lead our lives there...'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: KuYanwu said, "In this world today, even if there were a peach blossom source of happiness, we could not be self-righteous and hide away from it…"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): In the present state of the world,' said Gu Yanwu, 'even if there were a Peach Tree Paradise where we could go and hide ourselves, I don't think we could limit our ideals to saving only ourselves.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The phrase "当今之世" means "in this current era" or "in the present time". "桃源" refers to a place of peace and tranquility, often associated with the Chinese idyll of the Taoist philosopher Tao Yuanming. "乐土" means "a place of happiness and bliss". The speaker is saying that in this current era, there is a place of peace and bliss, but we cannot simply hide away and enjoy it alone.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'If such a refuge did exist,' said Gu Yanwu, 'we couldn't just go and hide away from the world and leave everyone else to fend for themselves.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Gu Yanwu Martial Arts: "In this current world, there truly is a Peach Blossom Spring, we cannot just look out for ourselves and hide away...."
Nowadays it is practically impossible for a man of honour like myself to keep body and soul together,' said Gu Yanwu, 'unless I go into hiding....'

chinese: 轿夫们的话更加粗野了，他们有的骂我外曾祖父是个见钱眼开的小人，有的说鲜花插到牛粪上，有的说单扁郎是个流白脓淌黄水的麻风病人。
english: The bearers' banter turned coarse. One of them reviled my great-granddad for being a money-grabber, another said something about a pretty flower stuck into a pile of cowshit, a third called Shan Bianlang a scruffy leper who oozed pus and excreted yellow fluids.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The language of the servants became more coarse than before, and they had said things like: "My granduncle was a little money-grubbing fellow; some said flowers were put on the dung heap, while others said that single-tailed lad was a contagious case of yellow fever."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): With each word the bearers were cursing their elders—who were, it seemed, the only ones who'd ever been rich—and my great-uncle for what he had done, charging him as much as possible as a 'eunuch with a view to becoming ruler of the whole empire'; and that Single Slime the hound of leprous horses was dripping yellow from an open wound and causing Mummer to have leprosy, scolding him for viewing his health in the same way.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The轿夫们的言语更粗俗了，有的说我曾祖父是个只知金钱不顾脸面的小人，有的说花插在牛粪里，还有的说单扁郎是患麻风病的脓包痨汉。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): They became much worse in their profanity. One of them said that I was only a money-grubber, another accused me of making beauty out of filth, and yet another described Shan Bianlang as a leper who sewed bandages from leprosy patients.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The porters' words became more savage. Some called my great-grandfather avaricious and base, others said that beauty was being matched with filth, and still others accused Single Flattop of being a leper who oozed white pus and yellow water.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The bearers' coarse language grew more vulgar. Some cursed Great-Granddad as a greedy scoundrel; others sneered that she had planted a flower on a cow dung heap; still others insulted Pocky Man, saying he was a man who excreted green water and oozed pus.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The men's words became more coarse, some called my great-great-grandfather a money-grubbing little man, while others said that he was a flower that was stuck into cow dung. Some called me a single flatfooted man with a white, pus-filled sore on my leg, which is a disease that causes leprosy.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The bearers grew rough in their language: Some of them called my great-granddad a money-grubbing weasel, others compared the groom to a leper with oozing sores.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The drivers' words became even more coarse and rude. Some of them called my great-grandfather a greedy and shameless person, some said that I was like a flower planted on cow dung, and some said that I was a leper with a discharge of pus and urine like Sanjianlong.

The bearers got even ruder. Some called my granddad a greedy, low-down, moneygrubbing little bastard, some said the flowers I wore were stuck on top of a cow pat, and some said that Shan Bianlang was a leper with a discharging sore.

chinese: 凤姐道：“可知男人家见一个爱一个也是有的。”
english: 'Men are all the same!' said Xi-feng. 'They have only to set eyes on a woman to begin another affair.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Qian Xi said, “There are men who can fall for one woman after another.”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Then that's why she has such success with men!' said Xi-feng.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Feng Jie said, "Men do love many things."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): You must have seen what happened to the man who fell in love first?' said Xi-feng.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Ning Jing said, "One can indeed know that men tend to like one woman and then another."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Well, men do get carried away by their infatuations,' said Xi-feng.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: She said, "You know that a man may love one woman in his own home."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'Of course. Men don't mind a man looking at their wives or sisters if they love them.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Sister Phoenix said: "It is also true that a man can love only one at a time."
Well, of course,' said Xi-feng, 'everyone's happy if they can marry the person they love.'

chinese: 这一晚是国庆夜，有哪幢楼的平台上，放起礼花，孤零零的一朵，在湛黑的天空上缓缓地舒开叶瓣，又缓缓凋零成细细的流星，渐渐消失，空中还留有一团浅白的影。
english: The party took place on the evening of National Day and fireworks were being set off from one of the balconies. A single rocket shot up into the darkness and slowly unfurled its fiery petals in the night sky before breaking up into a stream of falling stars, which vanished slowly, leaving a faint white shadow in the sky.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: This evening is National Day Eve, with a dozen or so buildings on each level of the platform, lit up by fireworks. A lone flower slowly unfolds its petals, gently fluttering like a feather, then slowly fading away into tiny bits of dust, and eventually disappearing from sight.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): There was a sense of celebration on this night, as if the owners had lit off some fireworks for each launch. One lone star, small and white, drifted slowly down, finally turning into a shower of tiny stars that shone gradually into nothing in the blackness of the night. There was a dim outline remaining above the starry sky.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: This was the night of the National Day, and there were some flower-beds on the balconies that set off fireworks. A lonely flower spread its petals slowly as it grew, then withered into a tiny shooting star, gradually disappearing from the sky. There was also a pale white shadow lingering in the air.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That night, October Day, a certain building on the platform was lit up by a lone fireworks display; in the black sky above downtown, it slowly unfurled the petals of a leafless tree before gradually transforming into a streaming流星, gradually vanishing into the sky.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: This was National Day night, and on the rooftop of some building, a solitary firework bloomed in the deep black sky, unfolding its petals slowly before fading into a fine meteor, disappearing gradually, leaving a faint white silhouette in the air.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): It was National Day eve. Night blooming flowers were set off on some of the apartment buildings' terraces, briefly unfolding their petals in the deep black sky, then dying away like shooting stars, leaving behind a trace of white smoke in the air.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: This evening, there was a building with a platform where fireworks were set off. A lone firework floated up into the black sky, slowly opening its petals and gradually fading away, leaving behind a faint white shadow in the air.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: On this national holiday evening, the patio of one of the tall buildings lit up the night sky with fireworks, which expanded slowly like the petals of a flower, turned into a stream of stars that twinkled faintly and then gradually disappeared, leaving behind a faint white silhouette in the sky.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: This evening is National Day, and on some building's platform, lanterns were lit. A lonely flower among them slowly opened its petals in the deep black sky, and then slowly withered into fine, streaking trails, gradually fading away, leaving a faint white glow in the air.
It was Darkness Day, and couples were dancing on the rooftops of all the buildings around them. One by one, their fireworks faded into the night, leaving only a faint outline against the inky sky.

chinese: 我想纯粹为我，这样太自私了，所以就很少干。

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'We finally walked out into the great outdoors.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Later, we moved towards vast skies and lands!"
Later we walked on wider lands.'

chinese: 小红抬头见是小丫头子坠儿。
english: Crimson looked up. It was Trinket, another of the maids from Green Delights.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The red-haired girl looked up at him as if she were a little girl.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She应声向坠儿走来，发现是个丫头站得地方。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Little Red lifted her head and saw a little girl named Zhidu.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Crimson looked up and saw Trinket, Aroma's maid.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Xiao Hong looked up and saw it was little servant girl Zui Er.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Crimson looked up and recognized Trinket.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Little Red's head is the Little Girl's Downfall.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Crimson raised her head and saw Trinket.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Small Red raised her head to see a little girl falling.
Crimson raised her head and recognized the voice: it was Trinket's.

chinese: 黄宗羲神色惨淡，摇了摇头。 顾炎武却自斟自饮，一口气连干了六七杯。
english: Huang Zongxi declined gloomily with a brief shake of the head; but Gu Yanwu, helping himself unceremoniously from the wine-kettle, downed half a dozen of the tiny cupfuls in quick succession.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Nan Guoqiang’s expression was pale. He shook his head. Zhuo Songwu, however, drank from a cup after cup without any pause.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Huang Zongxi's face, somewhat pale with愁苦的面容， looked down upon this newcomer. He appeared to be drinking quite a lot, having consumed four or five cups already by the time the two gentlemen sat themselves down.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Liang Zongyi looked pale and shook his head. Guo Yanwu, however, drank a cup after another, gulping down six or seven cups of wine.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Huang's face grew very pale, and he shook his head. Gu Yanwu, on the other hand, was drinking wine to himself as if he were the bartender. He had already drained six or seven cups.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Huang Zongyi had a wan look on his face as he shook his head. On the other hand, Kǔ Yánwù drank from the cup by himself, finishing off several cups in one go.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Huang Zhongxi's face was pale and expressionless, and when he shook his head, it was barely perceptible. But Gu Yanwu, on the other hand, began to pour wine for himself and drink it down rather rapidly, knocking it back perhaps a dozen times in quick succession.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Yellow Bitterness's expression was somber, he shook his head. Despite this, he drank one cup after another, finishing six or seven in total.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Huang Zongxi's face was pale and he shook his head. But Gu Yanwu, at each successive cup, drained it off in a single gulp.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Zhong Zongxi looked solemn, shaking his head. Gu Yanwu drank steadily, downing six to seven cups at once.
Huang Zongxi's face looked pale and he shook his head. Gu Yanwu, on the other hand, drank greedily, draining six or seven cups at a breath.

chinese: 唉，睡觉的时候以后可多着呢，朝也睡，晚也睡，睡着了永远不醒。
english: There's plenty of sleeping to come: sleeping all day, sleeping all night, sleeping and never waking up again.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Oh, it's so much better when you sleep now that you can have a lot of sleep during the day as well. You'll be sleeping all night long and never waking up.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): At least you can't sleep now.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Oh, I can sleep all night long now, whenever and wherever I want to.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Well, then, I can sleep whenever and wherever I want. I'll never wake up.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Alas, there are so many times for sleeping ahead, I sleep during the day and at night, never waking up forever.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Ah, yes. There are so many opportunities to sleep in the days to come. I can sleep when I want, both in the morning and at night. I'll never wake up.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Alas, sleeping so much during the day and night, one can never wake up again.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Well, they do sleep a lot. They sleep at all hours of the day and night and then sleep soundly without waking up.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Ah, sleep more in the future, sleep in the morning, sleep at night, sleep so much that you never wake up again.
Well, they say that after you die you can sleep forever. I think I'll sleep then, too. I can sleep in the morning and sleep in the evening.

chinese: 父亲听到爷爷被饼噎得哦哦地叫，看到那些棱角分明的饼块从爷爷的喉咙里缓慢地往下蠕动。
english: Father heard Granddad's painful cries as the dry cake stuck in his throat and saw the rough edges make their way down his neck.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Father heard his grandfather coughing so softly that he could barely breathe as the slices of dough from his throat began to slide down slowly.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Father heard Granddad scream as the uneven steaming-hot cake blocked his airway, and saw the sliced, blexified cakes waddle down slowly from his throat.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The father heard his grandfather making a strange sound, like he was choking on a piece of bread, and saw the flat pieces of bread slowly descend down his throat.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Father heard Granddad make that oohing, ogling sound as the fragments of cake slid down into his throat.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The father heard Grandpa making oh-oh sounds as he choked on the biscuit, watching the sharp-edged pieces of the biscuit slowly slide down his throat.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Father watched as Granddad gurgled and choked, trying to swallow the dry cakes.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Father heard the old man's throat being squeezed and saw the crumbs move slowly down his throat.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Father heard Granddad gag on the crunchy biscuits and watched them move slowly down his throat.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Father heard grandfather choke on a bun, "oh oh", and saw sharp-edged buns slowly moving down grandfather's throat.
Father heard the choking sound and saw pieces of the flatbread move slowly down Granddad's throat.

chinese: 最后月亮从门对面的窗子里照进来。 这时我和她分开。
english: At last the moonlight shone through the window opposite the door and we were separate by then.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Finally, the moon shines through the window on either side of my door. This time, we separate.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Finally, the moon dropped into the window next to her door and at that point, my partner and she parted ways.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The moon came through the window opposite us, and then I was alone with her.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): At last the moon came in through the window next to us. At that moment, we separated.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The last moonlight shone in from the window opposite the door. It was then that we parted.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Finally the moonlight shone through the window across the door and she parted from me.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The moon shone through the window opposite the door. At that moment, I was separated from her.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Finally the moon shone in the window opposite me and I broke up with her.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The last moon shone through the window from the opposite side of the door. At this time, I and she parted.
In the end, the moonlight shone through the window opposite the door and we were finally separated.

chinese: 她们俩却是这漠然里的一个活跃，虽然也是不做声，却是有着几百年的大事在酝酿的。
english: Amid this sea of indifference, Wang Qiyao and Wu Peizhen were animated and alive. Though neither said a word, centuries of anticipation and excitement were brewing inside them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: They were a lively one, though they did not say anything; yet their deeds had been on the horizon for centuries.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The two women, who were lively about each other before, would now be reinvigored with over fifty years of history before they could speak again.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The two of them were the only active ones in this indifferent, though silent, but they had something brewing for centuries.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The two women were always somewhat vivacious even though their efforts seemed futile; although they made no noise, they were indeed preparing something grand and historic.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Yet amidst this indifference, they were two active figures. Although they too remained silent, they were brewing matters of great significance that spanned several hundred years.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): However, these two were anything but still and silent—they were the architects of great plans and schemes, although their actions were slower than the passing of hundreds of years.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: They were two people who were alive in the desolate place, though they never spoke, but they were brewing something significant that had been in the making for centuries.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: But the girls were the ones who kept this vast emptiness alive with their quiet strength, as if holding some great truth inside.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: They are two who are an active part of this indifferent place, although they make no sound, they have several centuries of great events brewing.

But as the years went by, their marriage became one bright spot in this bleak landscape. Although they never made a lot of noise, they were involved in a number of major events that took place over the course of several hundred years.

chinese: 透明单薄布满血管的大耳朵是王文义头上引人注目的器官。 他个子很小，一颗大头缩在耸起的双肩中。
english: Large transparent ears covered with tiny blood vessels were the trademark of Wang Wenyi, a small man whose enlarged head was tucked down between his shoulders.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: A transparent cotton-covered ear is a conspicuous organ on Wang Wen’s head. He is small with a small head that is hidden by his shoulders.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The small, thin, and delicate ear of Wang was one more thing to notice; he was a very small guy, his head buried in the crease of his shoulders.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The transparent, thin ear that is filled with blood vessels on Wang Wenyi’s head is the prominent organ of his head. He is small in size, and a large head is squeezed between raised shoulders.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The translucent ears, thick with blood vessels, were Wang's most obvious organs, though he was small and short-statured, the top of his head shrinking up until it slumped back under his shoulders.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The large ears, translucent and thin with veins covering them, were prominent features on Wang Wenyi's head. He was short in stature, with a big head tucked under his raised shoulders.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Those thin, see-through ears of Wang Wenyi's, the way they were dotted with blood vessels, set his small frame apart.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: His translucent, thin ears that are full of blood vessels are the focal point of his attention-grabbing organ. His small head is tucked into his raised shoulders.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Wang Wenyi's large, translucent ears, filled with visible blood vessels, caught people's attention. He was a short man with a big head that seemed to sit on his hunched shoulders.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The prominent ear, covered in blood vessels and standing out on Wang Wenyi's head, is a striking organ. He is short in stature, with a large head tucked between his raised shoulders.
His most notable feature was the transparent membrane-covered blood vessel on his ear, small in stature, his large head cradled between his shoulders.

chinese: 这个大平面上布满了大兴安岭这样的山脉，也布满了森林，林间点缀着一个个像齐家屯一样的村庄……
english: The flat surface was covered with mountain ranges like the Greater Khingan Mountains, and with forests dotted with tiny villages, just like Qijiatun....
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: This vast landscape is covered by mountains like the Great Bear Country, as well as forests. Each village in the forest is dotted with houses—like the Quanzhou Village.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Beneath this level surface were vast forests, which dotted the countryside like a network of village clusters inhabited by like-minded residents . . .
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The plains were covered with mountains like the great兴安岭, forests and scattered villages that looked like Jilin Town...
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The flat surface was covered with mountains like the Greater Khingan Range, and with forests. Between the forests were many villages like the village of Qijiatun....
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: This vast plane is dotted with mountain ranges like the Greater Khingan Mountains, as well as forests, with small villages scattered throughout, much like Qijia Tun...
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): This vast plain was covered with mountain ranges as vast as the Greater Khingan Range, and forests blanketed these mountains. Small villages like the village of Qijiatun dotted the forests. . . .
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: This large plain is covered with mountains like the Great Xing'an Range, and dotted with villages that resemble small hamlets scattered throughout the forests.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: This vast plain is crisscrossed by the Greater Khingan Mountains, which are in turn dotted with small villages like Qijiatun.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: This large expanse is covered with mountain ranges like Xing'an Mountains, also filled with forests, with villages resembling Qi Jia Tu scattered among the woods here and there...
The plateau was covered with mountains, all named after the Great Wall of China, and forests, some parts of which were dotted with villages like Qijiatun.

chinese: “审判日”号正在过去，它在通过死亡之琴。
english: Judgment Day was below them now, passing through the deadly zither.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The "审判日" has passed. It is through the death of the violin.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The ship, Judgment Day, was passing by. It had passed over the zither, raining death upon the world.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Judgment Day" is past, and it passes through the Death Waltz.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Judgment Day was approaching, and it sailed between the two bridges.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The "Day of Judgment" is passing, traversing the keyboard of death.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Judgment Day was passing by, passing over the deadly zither.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Judgment Day" is approaching, and it is playing its final note through death.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Judgment Day passed by, and now it crosses the deadly zither.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The 'Judgment Day' is passing, it is passing through the Death Bell."
Judgment Day was passing by, going through the gate of death.

chinese: 黛玉自觉忘情，不觉红了脸，拿袖子遮了脸，翻身向里装睡着了。
english: Dai-yu realized that she had been caught off her guard. She covered her burning face with her sleeve, and turning over towards the wall, pretended to be asleep.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: With her heart so full of love for him that she forgot her own face red, she covered her face with a sleeve and rolled herself inside to sleep.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Crimping open her face, she found that it was red with embarrassment, and having first concealed herself with a movement of her hand, had now turned and slumbered away from them all.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Daidai felt that she was losing herself, and her face turned red. She covered her face with the sleeve of her dress and fell asleep on her back.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Dai-yu felt this questionably amused joke and her face reddened; she therefore turned round and, with the sleeve of her gown hid under her chin, appeared to be asleep, but in fact was very embarrassed.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Dai Yu, feeling that she had lost control of her emotions, turned a shade of red and covered her face with her sleeve, then turned over and pretended to be asleep.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Dai-yu felt that she had perhaps been too forward, and flushing up to the roots of her hair drew her sleeve across her face, and turning on her side away from him, pretended to be asleep.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Daiyu became aware of her own feelings and blushed, covering her face with her sleeve and turning around to lie down.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Dai-yu, on her part, feeling she had been too free with her tongue, blushed deeply, covered her face with her sleeve, and turned over in the bed as if she had been asleep.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Dai Yu self-aware forgot emotions, unaware blushed face, took sleeve to cover face, turned body towards inside pretended to sleep.
Dai-yu, who was beginning to feel embarrassed, covered her face with her sleeve and turned towards the wall to pretend to be asleep.

chinese: 一丝甜味的液体温暖着他的口腔。 奶奶在他屁股上用力打了一巴掌，然后把他推出去。
english: Trickles of a sweet liquid warmed the corners of his mouth, until Grandma gave him a swat on the bottom and pushed him away.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: A sweet liquid that warmed his mouth. Grandma slapped him on the back of his butt and then sent him out.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): A sweet liquid moistened his mouth. Grandma gave him a slap on the backside and he was pushed away.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: A sweet liquid warmed his mouth. His grandmother hit him on the backside with a hard slap, then pushed him out.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): A sweet liquid filled his mouth, and Grandma smacked his behind really hard, then pushed him out of the room.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: A sweet-tasting liquid warmed his mouth. His grandmother gave him a hard smack on the buttocks and pushed him away.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): A drop of warm liquid filled his mouth, and then she slapped his bottom and pushed him away.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The liquid with a hint of sweetness warmed his mouth. The milkmaid slapped him hard on his butt, then pushed him out.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: A drop of sweet liquid warmed his mouth, and then Grandma slapped him across the bottom and shoved him away.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: A sweet-tasting liquid warms his mouth. Grandma slapped him hard on his buttocks and then pushed him out.
The sweet warmth of the liquid coated his mouth and throat. Grandma slapped him across the rear end and pushed him out.

chinese: 他的派对渐渐地有了名声，一传十，十传百的，来的人呢，也是一带十，十带百，他全是欢迎。
english: Gradually, his parties started to gain some notoriety: word traveled fast, as one guest brought ten friends and each of them brought along others—but he didn't mind, everyone was welcome.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: His party grew in fame as more and more people came forward to attend, and he welcomed them all with open arms.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Soon, word of his party reached even more distant places: people came to her parties to welcome their friends and relatives. People who normally wouldn't show up normally did so now.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: His party grew in reputation, word of mouth spreading it far and wide until people came in groups of ten and a hundred. He welcomed them all.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As his parties grew famous, word spread, ten people would invite ten others, and before he knew it, everyone from whom he had received an invitation had shown up.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: His parties gradually gained a reputation, with word of mouth spreading quickly. The number of attendees followed a similar pattern: one person would invite ten, those ten would each invite ten more, and so on, and he welcomed all of them.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Word of his parties began to get around, and people started coming by the hundreds. He welcomed them all with open arms.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: His party gradually gained popularity, with one person telling ten others, and ten telling a hundred. The more people who came, the more he welcomed them.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Word of his parties spread gradually, one to ten, ten to a hundred, and he welcomed them all with equanimity.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The party gradually gained fame, with word-of-mouth spreading quickly, attracting people in groups of ten, groups of a hundred, and more. He welcomed them all warmly.
Word of his parties began to spread, and people started to come in droves, some invited, some merely curious. He welcomed them all.

chinese: “夜里船上的人睡觉啊，都是躺着的，五十厘米的空当太大了，白天他们就是坐着或蹲着，也够了。”

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: In the night, people on board were sleeping; they all lay down, so that there was a 50 cm gap between them. They could be sitting or standing, too. That was enough for the day.

chinese: 只因素日闻得人说，嫂子是个利害人，在你跟前一点也错不得，所以唬住我了。 我如今见嫂子是个有说有笑极疼人的，我怎么不来?
english: True, there was a time when I should have been scared to come, because people always told me what a holy terror you were and how dangerous it was to cross you; but now I know that in reality you are all gentleness and fun, there is nothing that could stop me coming.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The people who spoke of her said that her sister was a troublesome person in front of you; so I was afraid of her, so I hid myself behind her. Now that I see her as someone who is cheerful and caring, how could I not come?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was because on hearing her name mentioned by some people at home, the lady had been worrying about me and trying to figure out where she had gone; but because of this worry she had not let me off too severely when I turned up at her front door. She now realized that I was a maniac with a heart for the poor—very amusing indeed, she thought, if you knew what else was in my trouser buttons! He therefore came to see me—and there were things in my trousers that needed mentioning!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Only because I heard that your wife is a sharp woman, and she cannot be wronged before you, so I was frightened away. Now seeing that my wife is someone who says something and laughs about everything, how can I not come?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I've heard say that in this your honourable company you have a very capable wife; and besides, she always makes such nice pleasant noises; so I thought it would be wrong not to come. Please believe it or not, though, that when I see how sweet and lovely she is—how kind and how full of gaiety—you can't deceive me into thinking that there's anything dishonest about me wanting to see her again.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Only because I heard people say that my aunt is a formidable person, who can't be wronged in front of you, so I was frightened away. Now that I see my aunt is someone who talks and laughs, and deeply cares for me, why wouldn't I come?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): I've heard a lot of tales about you,哥儿, ' said he, 'and some of them weren't very complimentary. That's what makes you keep away, I suppose. But I can see now that you're not at all the terrible sort of person they make out. Why didn't I come sooner?
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Because people say that my aunt is a dangerous person and I should not make any mistakes in front of her, I was intimidated by her. However, now that I see that she is a kind and funny person, I should have come to visit her earlier.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'Your sister-in-law? Well, you see, I heard her talked about: how she was a shrewd one and no one could get anything past her. So when I saw this was a straight sort of person, I thought it wouldn't be any use coming.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
The text translates to:

Only because I heard people say that your sister-in-law is a self-interested person, and she can't be wrong even a little in front of you, so she deceived me. Now that I see your sister-in-law is a person who is both talkative and humorous, how can I not come?
I heard people say that a person like you, being a woman of influence, wouldn't mind putting me right if you saw me coming. So I thought it was worth a try.

chinese: 喂她最多的是齐猎头儿的儿媳妇，叫大凤，这个健壮的东北妮子每天吃着高粱米大渣子，同时奶两个娃，奶水还是旺旺的。
english: The one who nursed her the most was Hunter Qi's daughter-in-law, called Feng. Feng had the strong, solid frame of the women of the Northeast. She ate sorghum every day, and her large breasts were full of milk even though she was feeding two babies at the same time.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The most affectionate thing she gives to her husband is his wife, called Guo Ling, a strong and energetic North American girl who eats high-grain rice and two kids every day. She also breastfeeds two babies with milk that's full of energy.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): And as for me, he usually lets his wife, Qing Fei, feed her. She's a strong Northeastale, like a guest, eats rice bran every day to support herself and the two kids, producing plenty of milk.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The most generous thing she fed was the daughter-in-law of the hunting head, called Big凤, a robust Northeastern girl who ate on a daily basis on high粱 米大渣子，同时奶两个孩子，奶水还是充足的。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Feed her mostly breast milk, from the wife of Hunter Qi, a man who fed elk heads to his babies. Every day she drank a gallon of milk, which was especially rich because of the sorghum paste she mixed with it, while nursing two other babies.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The one who feeds her most is Qilie's son-in-law, named Dafeng. This robust Northeastern girl eats millet and coarse corn every day while nursing two babies, and her milk is still plentiful.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The woman who fed her the most was Hunter Qi's wife, Feng. This strong Northeastern girl ate sorghum meal every day, nursing two babies at the same time, and still producing plenty of milk.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The woman who feeds her most often is called Big Phoenix, a strong woman from the Northeast who eats highland barley husks every day and nurses two babies while still producing copious amounts of milk.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: She fed her two small children on a diet of husks, and although she was a thickset Northeastern woman herself, she had more than enough milk to spare.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Hello, her main one is the wife of a big-hunter, named Da Fen, this robust northeastern woman eats large millet porridge every day and nurses two babies, the milk is still abundant.

chinese: 这里有一些老住户，与平安里同龄，他们是平安里的见证人一样，用富于历史感的眼睛，审视着那些后来的住户。

chinese: 这些真东西是体面后头的东西，它们是说给自己也不敢听的，于是就拿来，制作流言了。
english: These articles lie outside the parameters of what is dignified; their nature is such that no one dares speak of them aloud—and so they are taken and molded into gossip.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: These are things that are not good enough for you; they are said to be too much of a burden to yourself, so they are brought up to be, and made up as a rumor.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): These things that really matter come after you have made yourself famous. They are the kind of words no man would dare listen to, so they end up in rumor.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: These genuine things are the stuff of posturing, the things one doesn’t dare listen to but which have been brought forth and made up as rumors.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The real things are the face-forward stuff, the stuff that people aren't supposed to hear; they put it on paper, making rumors.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: These genuine things are the decent leftovers, things that one wouldn't dare say even to oneself, so they are repurposed to create gossip.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): What we call 'real things' always come after the things that are proper to say. But we can't bring them out into the open—so we have to make them into gossip.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: These things are something that is important to one's face, and they are not willing to hear them from others. Therefore, they make up rumors instead.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: These truths are things that face the back of a person, things that he is not brave enough to confess even to himself. Consequently they get transformed into gossip.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: These are genuine items from the back room, things that are not fit for public ears, so they were made into rumors.
The real things are what happen behind the scenes. Things that are too embarrassing to be believed become gossip. And so they are made into rumors.

chinese: 在奶奶脚前的那个轿夫——我后来的爷爷余占鳌，他的心里，有一种不寻常的预感，像熊熊燃烧的火焰一样，把他未来的道路照亮了。

chinese: 这娘们随时可能翻了脸给我一耳光，假定如此，就证明女人不懂什么是交情。

chinese: 因此发狠，按倒打了三四十板，还不许他吃饭，叫他跪在院内读文章，定要补出十天工课来方罢。
english: Thereupon he, forced him to the ground, and, with the utmost savagery, dealt him thirty or forty whacks with the bamboo, after which he forbade him to eat and made him kneel in the open courtyard with a book in his hand until he had prepared the equivalent of ten days' homework.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Thus, he beat him up so hard that he was beaten thirty-four times, yet he did not let him eat. He then ordered him to kneel on the inside of the hospital for ten days’ work before he would release him from his debt.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): So I drove out a sweat and fought hard for what seemed the world's peak, until he fell down: that was 40 or so plates clear of the labourers! Then I forced him to eat something; then I made him read in the hospital clinic for ten days!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Thus he went mad, and felled him with three or forty blows; and did not allow him to eat, but made him kneel in the courtyard to read a piece of paper, until he should write out ten days' work before he would be allowed to do so again.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But he seemed to have set himself a challenge and had expended considerable energy on the boy, fording him with about thirty or forty strides of his body and holding him there until he had eaten nothing, then making him kneel down and start reading a piece of reading to earn his keep.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Therefore, he became furious, forcing him down and beating him with thirty or forty strokes. He did not allow him to eat, made him kneel in the courtyard to read articles, and demanded that he make up for ten days of work before stopping.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): As a consequence of this determination, Jia Huan had the unfortunate boy held down and beaten (with a certain rudeness peculiar to that country) for more than thirty times without allowing him anything to eat, and making him kneel in the yard and recite articles from memory, thus depriving him of ten days' work in all before they would allow him to get up again.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Therefore, he hit him with great force, knocking him down three or four times, and would not let him eat. He made him kneel in the courtyard and read the article, insisting that he complete ten days of detention before stopping.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: With that he threw him to the ground and gave him thirty or forty strikes of the board, and then ordered him to kneel in the yard and read until he had worked off a ten-day punishment.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Therefore, he was severely punished, beaten with about 30-40 boards, not allowing him to eat, making him kneel in the courtyard to read articles, and he was strictly ordered to make up for 10 days of work to settle the matter.

And since he was so wicked, he had whipped him forty stripes with a board, and now he wasn't allowed to eat any dinner, but had to kneel in the courtyard and read out loud from the book of rules. He had to make up ten days' worth of missed chores.

chinese: 他感到有些凉意上来，用力把衰衣裹紧。 手不慎碰到肚皮，又觉腹中饥饿难忍。
english: He wrapped the cape tightly around him to ward off the chill, and as his hand brushed against his belly he realised how hungry he was.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He felt a chill coming over him as he tried to put on his coat. He accidentally touched his stomach and found himself feeling hungry again.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Dampness began to seep into his clothing. He braced himself; then he accidentally brushed his belly, which soon became so hungry that it made Trinket shudder with want.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He felt a chill come over him, and he forced the ragged shirt around his body. His hand accidentally brushed against his belly, causing him to feel a great hunger that was hard to bear.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As a shudder ran down his spine, he drew the old clothes tighter around himself, accidentally resting his hand on his belly, and feeling the growling hunger in his stomach.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He felt a chill, tightened his robe vigorously, and then, inadvertently touching his stomach, realized he was starving.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): He felt a nip of cool air and wrapped his cloak tighter around himself, when his hand brushed against his stomach and he realized how hungry he was.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He felt a bit chilly, so he wrapped himself up tightly in his clothes. He was careful not to touch his stomach, as he felt so hungry he couldn't bear it.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He could feel the chill seeping through the tattered clothing and wrapped it more tightly around him; but in doing so, he accidentally brushed against his bare belly, and the skin prickled with hunger.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He felt a slight chill, pulling his robe tightly around him. Accidentally touching his stomach, he felt a gnawing hunger in his abdomen.
The change in the temperature made him shiver and he tightened his gown around himself. His hand, inadvertently, came into contact with his belly, which seemed even emptier than before.

chinese: 拍摄的现场又是要多破烂有多破烂，可是从开麦拉里摄取的画面总是整洁美妙。
english: The set locations may have been dilapidated and in disrepair, but the images captured by the camera were always perfectly beautiful.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The scene was so shabby that you could hardly imagine it had been shot with a camera; yet from the pictures of Abdul-Rahman’s filming, everything was perfect.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The site of the scene was a neglected heap of rubble built up years ago with no plumbing or electricity. But the image taken from the microwave was always clean and beautiful.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The set was as shabby as it had to be, but the images shot through the camera lens were always clean and beautiful.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The set was as decimated as could be while still meeting the requirements of the industry; yet the images captured by the camera were clean and beautiful.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The setting for filming was as shabby as it could be, but the scenes captured through the camera lens were always neat and beautiful.

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The scene that was captured is supposed to be chaotic and messy, but the images taken with the camera are always neat and beautiful.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The set was supposed to look run-down and shabby, but the image from the camera was always clear and beautiful.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The on-site shooting was as chaotic as it could be, but the footage taken from the opening ceremony was always neat and beautiful.

chinese: 小红听了，冷笑两声，方要说话，只见一个未留头的小丫头走进来，手里拿着些花样子并两张纸，说道：“这两个花样子叫你描出来呢。”
english: Crimson laughed scornfully, though whether at Melilot's simplicity or at Bao-yu's improvidence is unclear, since just as she was about to comment, a little maid came running in, so young that her hair was still done up in two little girl's horns. She was carrying some patterns and sheets of paper. 'You're to copy out these two patterns.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Little Red listened with a sneer on her lips, before she had time to speak. To her surprise, however, as soon as she turned around, there was a girl who didn’t have a head beside her, holding some flower-like things and two pieces of paper. She said, “Those flowers you’re supposed to draw are called that.”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Crimson noticed that the girl had a small hand advantage over her; she wondered where the untrained servant was going to get his flowers from, when he entered with the maid's bouquet and the two papers on which the drawings were to be made. 'She's drawing the pictures for you,' she said. 'Two of them.'

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Xiao Hong, upon hearing this, let out a cold laugh twice before she could speak. Then, a young servant girl without hair on her head walked in, carrying some patterns and two pieces of paper. She said, "These two patterns need you to copy them."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Crimson laughed sarcastically. She was on the point of replying when a little maid with neither of those head-dressings on came hurrying in, carrying some patterns and two sheets of graph-paper. 'These patterns you are to copy out, mistress.'

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Crimson was about to answer her, when a little maid came in, of no more than fourteen or fifteen years old, carrying a collection of patterns and two sheets of thin paper in her hand. 'We want you to trace these patterns for us, Miss.'

Crimson heard this with a gasp of laughter. 'Describe them?'

chinese: 父亲只见过一次真正的秋水，那时候高粱即将收割，墨水河水暴涨，堤坝决裂，洪水灌进了田地和村庄。
english: He had only really seen autumn water once in his life. The sorghum was ready for harvest when the Black Water River rose and burst its banks, flooding both the fields and the village.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Only once did his father see real autumn water. At that time high粱将要收割，墨水河涨势凶猛，堤坝即将决口，洪水灌进农田和村庄中。

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Father had seen true autumn water only once, when the sorghum was about to be harvested, the inkwater river was swollen, the embankments had burst, and the floodwaters had flooded into the fields and villages.

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Father had only seen the real autumn once, when the high grass was about to be harvested, the ink river water surged, and the dam broke, causing floods to pour into the fields and villages.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Father had seen the real autumn flood only once, when the dikes along the Black Water River had given way, flooding the fields and village.

Father had only seen the real autumn floods once, when the sorghum was being harvested and the water from the Black Water River, swollen by the heavy rains, broke through the dike and flooded the fields and the village.

chinese: 空气凝固了，所有人像石化般一动不动，连周围电脑的嗡嗡声似乎都变得小心翼翼。

chinese: 明明听得韦小宝是落在一株芍药花旁，这小鬼手中的宝剑或许已震得远远飞出，可是他的尸体怎会突然不见？

chinese: 父亲，一九五七年，你躲在我家里间屋里那个地洞里时，你每日每夜，在永恒的黑暗中，追忆流水年月，你至少三百六十次想到了我们家那几十间房屋的屋盖在大火中塌落的情景。 你想到你的父亲我的爷爷在那时刻想到了什么，我的幻想紧追着你的幻想，你的幻想紧追着爷爷的思维。
english: Father, when you were hiding in the burrow we dug for you in the floor of my home back in 1957, you recalled those days of your past in the unrelenting darkness. On no fewer than 365 occasions, in your mind you saw the roof of your house crash down amid the flames, and wondered what was going through the mind of your father, my granddad. So my fantasies were chasing yours while yours were chasing Granddad's.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Father, you hid yourself under my bedroom that night when I was buried in a cave between the walls of our house. You dreamed of all those years spent in the dark, recalling scenes from the past, such as the collapse of the houses after the fire. Your imagination followed your imagination closely; your father’s mind followed his own.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): FITTs, in 1957, when you hid yourself inside my house, every day year after year, you illuminated the darkness around you by reciting the passing years. Three hundred and sixty times, you focused on the scene when our dozen or so houses fell into flames because of the great fire of that year. Three hundred and sixty times, you followed my imagination, and my imagination followed my father's imagination.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Father, when you hid in the cellar of my house in July of nineteen fifty-seven, you, every night and day, were lost in the eternal darkness, thinking back on the years that had passed and the hundreds of times you thought about what our house's roof looked like as it collapsed in the fire. Your thoughts followed your father, who was my grandfather, and then his thoughts followed mine.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): FATHER, ONE YEAR BEFORE HIS DEATH, had buried himself in the underground cave of my home when, every night and day, he poured his thoughts back and forth across the abyss that was eternal darkness. He recalled, on one hand, the hundreds of times he had remembered sitting with my mother as they watched our house's roof collapse in the raging fire; and, on the other hand, he could not help but think about what your father, your granddad, must have been thinking during that desperate moment. Your mind raced frantically between your reality and your grandfather's.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Father, in the tiny underground room of my home in 1957, every night under the eternal darkness, you must have recalled the passing years at least 360 times. You pondered the scene of your family's houses, with their hundreds of roofs collapsing in flames. You wondered what your father, my grandfather, was thinking at that moment, and my imagination followed your thoughts, as if I were chasing after them myself.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): In 1957, when you hid away in the little cave behind my mother's kitchen, you recalled the yearning for forgotten times. At least three hundred times you thought about the coverings of our family's buildings burning away, and you wondered what your father, my granddad, was thinking when he saw that fire. I follow your imagination, and you follow Granddad's thoughts.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Father, in 1957, you were hiding in a small hole in the wall of our house, and every day and every night, you thought about the past in the darkness. You must have thought about our house burning down at least 360 times. You must have thought about what your father, my grandfather, was thinking about in that moment. Your imagination must have been chasing after my grandfather's thoughts.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Father, in 1957, when you hid out in the hole in the wall of our house, you saw the nighttime pass, and at least three hundred sixty times you saw the scene in which our house, dozens of rooms, burned. You thought about what Granddad was thinking then, and your imagination chased after his way of thinking; his way of thinking chased after yours.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
Father, in 1957, when you hid in the secret hole in our house, you remembered the flowing years and months every day and night. At least 360 times, you thought about the sight of our many houses with their roofs collapsing in the fire. You wondered what my grandfather, your father, was thinking at that moment. My imagination closely followed your imagination, which in turn closely followed my grandfather's thoughts.

Translation:
In 1957, while hiding in the secret hole in our house, you often remembered the flowing years and months. At least 360 times, you thought about the sight of our many houses with their roofs collapsing in the fire. You wondered what my grandfather, your father, was thinking at that moment. My imagination closely followed your imagination, which in turn closely followed my grandfather's thoughts.

Father, in 1957, you hid in our house, in the hole under the floor, and every day and every night, in the eternal darkness, you longed for the days of the Sino-Japanese War. You fantasised about the roofs of the dozens of houses we had in our compound collapsing in the fire, and you wondered what my grandfather was thinking then. My imagination always followed yours, and yours, the thoughts of my grandfather.

chinese: 爷爷走着，他已经感觉不到自己的腿在何处，只是凭着一种走的强烈意念，在僵硬的空气的浊浪中，困难地挣扎。
english: All that kept Granddad moving was a powerful drive to push on and continue the bitter struggle against wave after murky wave of obdurate air.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The old man walked slowly, feeling no longer the presence of his legs in a particular place, but relying on a strong will to push forward through the foggy air.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Granddad walked and his leg wasn't following any pattern; all he could think was strong wind currents driving him towards a wall of stiff air. He struggled to keep his existence viable.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Grandpa was walking, and he couldn't feel his legs anymore. He just walked on with a strong will, struggling against the stiff air's waves of muck.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As he walked, Granddad no longer knew where his legs were; he was simply clinging on to a weak belief that he needed to move.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Grandfather walked on, no longer able to feel where his legs were, merely driven by a strong sense of movement, struggling against the thick, stagnant air like waves, with great difficulty.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): By then Granddad was walking more by force of will than anything else, and struggling against the僵硬空气的浊浪, step after step.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Grandfather walked on, but he could not feel his legs anymore. He was struggling in the murky and stagnant air, his movements heavy and labored.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Granddad was no longer conscious of his legs, only the powerful desire to keep moving. He struggled to buck his way through the murky sea of foul air.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Grandfather walked, he no longer felt where his legs were, only relying on a strong sense of walking, struggling in the stiff waves of the stale air.
Granddad was no longer aware of his legs; he was propelling himself forward only through the strength of his will, struggling against the currents of the congealed air.

chinese: 海老公脸一沉，说道：“借给老吴这小子有什么用？

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old eunuch threw a frown at him. 'What do you want to lend this guy, anyway?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The sea cucumber’s face fell as he said, "What is the use of lending this kid?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old eunuch's face dropped. ' Borrowing some of my tools for a young man like Wu to use?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The sea grandpa's face darkened as he said, "What good is lending this brat Wu to me?"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The old eunuch's face fell. 'How can you let them borrow any of your stuff, that boy and his like?
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: What does it mean to lend this young man to Old Wu?" Old man's face fell as he spoke.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The old eunuch's face fell. 'What's the use in lending to that sort of person?
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Old Li's face sank, and he said: "What use is lending to old Wu?"
The old eunuch's face fell. 'What use is it to lend money to that little bastard for?

chinese: 如今出挑的美人儿似的，少说着只怕有一万心眼子；再要赌口齿，十个会说的男人也说不过他呢！
english: She's grown up to be a real beauty too, has Mrs Lian. But sharp! Well, if it ever comes to a slanging match, she can talk down ten grown men any day of the week!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Now that she is a woman with the appearance of a beauty queen, she may not be able to say much if there are ten men who can’t speak for her!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now you're speaking ! A hundred knowledgeable men out of a hundred thousand hands must weigh up what you say before they won't listen to you.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The beautiful young woman is now like a beauty that one can't help but think of a thousand wits; and if one were to talk, ten men who could speak would not be able to say as well!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Mrs Wang is a beautiful young woman-- truer words than any can ever be lacking. Add to that the gift of speaking fast and with much fluency, and you have a combination which knows no equals in the language!
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Nowadays, she's a stunning beauty with perhaps ten thousand thoughts; and if you were to challenge her in argument, ten skilled speakers couldn't match her!
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): She's as good-looking as a picture, which means she must have at least a thousand ways of getting her own back if she wants to play word games with anyone, young man or not.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Nowadays, she looks like a beautiful lady, and her words are so few that she might have a million eyes. Even if she speaks with her mouth, ten men would not be able to say what she means.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Abody as beautiful as a sight in a picture book is worth a thousand eyes to look into, and with as many tongues as that to play with, a hundred men of ten fingers each couldn't keep up with her if she started talking!
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Today's contestant is like a beautiful girl, barely speaking but with a thousand eyes; if you dare to argue with ten men who can speak, he would still outdo them!

I know what you're thinking, but I'd rather not say it out loud, in case there are a thousand ears listening in. And even if you put all the men in the world together, you couldn't find one who would say what you want to hear as well as she does!

chinese: 我办过一个盗窃案，罪犯能把行驶中的列车中间的一节车厢偷了，前后的其余部分又完好地接起来开到终点站，用的工具只是一根钢丝绳和几只铁钩子。
english: I once handled a robbery where the criminals managed to steal one car out of a moving train. They reconnected the cars before and after the one they were interested in so that the train got all the way to its destination without anyone noticing. The only tools they used were a length of wire cable and a few steel hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: I have committed a theft before, a criminal could steal one of the cars' seats from the middle compartment and then use it as if it were still there after the journey had finished. The tools used were just a piece of steel wire and a few iron hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I used to commit robberies, and the criminals would be able to steal a car section from the inside and put the rest back on the track afterward, keeping the damage to only the车厢和一些铁钩。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I've handled a case of theft, where the criminal could steal one section of the train's middle car while it was moving and then reassemble the rest of the train intact so that it arrived at its destination without any damage. The only tool he used was a piece of steel wire and a few iron hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I solved a theft case once. The perpetrator had squeezed a section of the train between two stations using just a piece of wire and a few iron hooks, then repaired the train so it could continue from there.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: I once handled a case where a thief could steal a section of a moving train while leaving the rest of the train, both before and after the stolen section, intact and seamlessly reconnected to its destination. The only tools used were a single steel cable and a few iron hooks.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): I handled a case where the criminal stole a section of a moving train between two stops. He left the other sections intact and connected them with the train so that it could continue on to its destination. All he used were a few iron hooks and a steel rope.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: I once committed a theft, where the criminal was able to steal one compartment of a train in transit, reconnecting the front and back parts perfectly, using only a steel wire and some iron hooks.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: I committed a crime by stealing a train car in motion, and then using only a length of rope and a few iron hooks, I was able to couple the other sections together and arrive at the destination station without incident.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: I committed a theft case, the criminal stole a middle section of a moving train, leaving the front and rear parts intact and continuing to the destination station. The tools used were only a steel cable and a few iron hooks.

I once pulled off a heist in which the criminal stole an entire section of the train while it was in motion, then smoothly joined the remaining sections together and continued to the terminal station. He used only a steel cable and a few iron hooks.

chinese: 老耿那时已七十多岁，孤身一人，享受“五保”待遇，是村里德高望重的人物，每逢诉苦大会，都要他上台诉苦。 每次诉苦，他都要剥掉上衣，露出一片疤痕。
english: Old Geng, who was already over seventy by then and lived alone as a pensioner, was one of our most revered villagers. Asked to speak at meetings to air grievances against the old order, he invariably stripped to the waist onstage to show his scars.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: At that time, Ye Zheng was seventy years old. He was alone, enjoying “five-star treatment,” and was respected by villagers with a high reputation. Whenever he would speak at the complaint meeting, he had to take off his clothes and expose his scars.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng was already seventy years old,孤身一人,享受'独生子'待遇,是村中备受尊敬的人。每逢揭疮大会,他要脱了衣服穿皮肉相见的痛苦!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: When Lao Geng was then seventy years old, he lived alone and enjoyed "Five Provisions" benefits, a person of high moral character in the village, and every time he attended a meeting where people complained, he would have to take off his coat and expose a scar.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng had turned sixty-four, was a single man who relied on the Five Ensurances program, and was a respected veteran of the village, so whenever he spoke at the hand-in-hand meetings, he would strip off his clothes in front of the crowd, which caused him to display a series of lines on his upper body that looked like scars.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: At the time, Laogang was in his seventies, a lone individual, enjoying the "Five Guarantees" benefits, and was a highly respected figure in the village. He was often called upon to share his grievances during grievance meetings. Every time he shared his grievances, he would strip off his shirt to reveal a scar.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Old Geng had been a70-year-old bachelor who relied on the government to support him. He was a well-respected man in the village and would often be called upon to complain at meeting. Every time he complained, he would take off his shirt, revealing a network of scars.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: When he was over seventy, he was the only one in the village to receive "five guarantees" treatment, which means he was respected and highly regarded. He would always attend the meetings where people would come to complain about their troubles, and he would always take off his shirt to show the scars on his back. He was a respected figure in the village, and his presence was always welcome. He was a man who had experienced hardships, and he knew how to empathize with others.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Old Geng, who was over seventy, a widower living alone, enjoyed special status as a 'five-category red guard,' and, at every meeting where people complained about their hardships, would come forward, taking off his shirt to reveal the scars on his body.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Geng, who was over seventy, lived alone, enjoyed the "five guarantees" treatment, and was a highly respected figure in the village. Whenever there was a mass complaint meeting, he was always asked to speak. At each meeting, he would remove his upper garment to reveal a patch of scars.

By then Old Geng was over seventy, and the only person left in his family. He enjoyed the benefits of the Five Black Categories, and was a person of some standing in the village, attending every mass struggle session to denounce his own suffering, during which he would always remove his shirt, revealing the wounds on his chest.

chinese: 这情景持续了很长时间后，她在朦胧中想到，这可能就是她永恒的归宿了，这就是她的地狱，三个太阳构成的地狱之火将永远灼烧着她，这是她因那个超级背叛受到的惩罚。

chinese: 下午来打针多是在三四点钟，这一小时总空着，只她们俩，面对面地坐。 夏天午间的困盹还没完全过去，禁不住哈欠连哈欠的。 她们强打精神，自己都不知说的什么。 弄口梧桐树上的蝉一迭声叫，传进来是嗡嗡的，也是不清楚。
english: Most of Wang Qiyao's patients came between three and four o'clock, so they had an hour to kill. Sitting across from each other in the lazy summer afternoon, they would stifle their yawns and chatter on without fully realizing what they were talking about, as cicadas droned in the parasol tree at the entrance to the longtang.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The time for injections during the afternoon was from 3:00 p.m.to 4:00 p.m., which is a half hour of rest. The two of them were alone, sitting side by side. In summer, when the afternoon’s nap had not completely worn off, she couldn’t help but groan as she lay there. She was exhausted, and her mind wouldn’t stop talking even after she fell asleep. She tried to think about what she should say, but it wasn’t clear what she was saying.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In the afternoon they brought their shots in early, leaving empty capsules between them. It was nearly dinner time and they began to fall asleep, but not before a series of napping bouts that made no sense brought them out again. They force themselves to keep their minds on something, but neither can understand what is being said, just as the silvery insects of willow tree Maplegar glow with a loud buzzing. At one moment it was called 'woooah', the next 'woooah'.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It was around three or four o'clock in the afternoon that they came for their shots, and for this hour there was nothing to do but sit face-to-face with them. The two of them were still exhausted after a nap during midday; they could not help yawning again and again. They managed to keep themselves awake and say something, although they did not know what it was. The cicadas on the trees outside kept calling one after another, making a buzzing sound. It was unclear whether it was the real thing or just made up sounds.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was empty in the clinic by three o'clock, except for Mrs. Wang and her patient. They sat face to face, each falling into a daze after a morning of working in the heat, the mosquitoes biting, but trying hard to keep their spirits up as they yawned endlessly and sneezed. The crickets continued to chirp loudly in the梧桐树上的树枝中,时断时续的响声让这里变得不那么清楚。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The injections usually come around three or four in the afternoon, leaving this hour empty for just the two of them, sitting face-to-face. The drowsiness from their post-midday nap was still lingering, making them yawn repeatedly. They tried to keep awake, but their words were aimless and unclear, even to themselves. The cicadas on a nearby wutong tree kept chirping, their sound muffled by the walls, also indistinct.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Their patients usually showed up between three and four o'clock in the afternoon, so for an hour at a time it would just be the two of them facing each other, yawning uncontrollably from the afternoon heat. They would make an effort to stay awake and carry on a conversation that neither of them remembered afterward.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: In the afternoon, around three or four o'clock, the room was empty except for the two of them sitting facing each other. The summer afternoon drowsiness had not fully passed, and they couldn't help but yawn. They tried to stay awake, but didn't know what to say to each other. The cicadas on the hibiscus tree outside were buzzing loudly, and the sound was indistinct.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Most of the afternoons I went to get a shot, from three to four o'clock. It was just the two of us facing each other across the table. The afternoon drowsiness had not yet gone away, and we couldn't help dozing off. To keep ourselves awake, we had to talk, but our thoughts were so muddled we couldn't keep up a conversation; the cicadas on the mulberry tree outside sang with all their might, their buzzing filled the room, but their song was indistinct.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Afternoon appointments for acupuncture are usually around three or four o'clock, and during that hour, it's always empty, just the two of them, facing each other. The drowsiness of the summer afternoon hadn't completely passed, and they couldn't help but yawn repeatedly. They tried to stay alert, not knowing what to say. The cicadas on the mulberry tree chirped in a repetitive pattern, and the sound was muffled, also unclear.

The afternoon shots were usually given between three and four o'clock, and during that one hour, the clinic would be empty except for the two of them, facing each other across the room. The post-lunch drowsiness had not yet passed, and they were both restless. They tried to concentrate, but their minds were clouded and they were not sure what to say. The noise of the tree cricket outside the clinic was taken in by the empty room, where it sounded like a resounding drone, but they could not quite make out the individual chirps.

chinese: 韦小宝不明白他说些什么，只是见他神色欢愉，确是解开了心中一件极为难之事，也不禁代他高兴。

Zhou Rui's husband, in spite of the force of his son's dog-eat-dog world, had given such an impression in the previous day with his dealings with the landowners that Two Gou had given up hope of catching him by surprise and preferred, in order to show his own sagacity, to leave a few questions unexplained.

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Zhou Rui's household, having heard this, guessed the intent behind it. He then said, "Don't worry, old Liu."

Zhou Rui's mind was already running ahead of her words. It was not without some misgiving that she had made so unguardedly of her husband's strength in the matter of the land; and now, confronted with this venerable gentleman's claim to be older than her own, she was impelled both by a desire to save face and a fear of offending him by too openly contradicting him, to express herself in words which, to her own mind, contained a good deal of irony. 'Don't worry, Grannie,' she said with a smile. 'You have only to leave everything to me.

chinese: 人家夫妇敦伦，我们无伦可言，只好敦友谊。
english: Married couples have a code of ethics to strengthen, and we don't have that, so we can only strengthen our friendship.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The man and wife were advanced in years and still strong in the bedroom, whereas we men had long since given up trying. So our only excuse for meeting was that we could have friendship with each other.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct:
The phrase "人家夫妇敦伦，我们无伦可言，只好敦友谊" translates to:

"People emphasize propriety and ethics in their marriage, but we have no such standards to speak of. As a result, we can only focus on fostering friendship."

This sentence implies that in some context, one is observing or interacting with a couple who uphold traditional values and respect for social norms in their relationship, while the speaker or their situation lacks similar principles to adhere to. Consequently, they find themselves having to prioritize and develop relationships based on friendship rather than more conventional marital or familial dynamics.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The husband and wife were having sex while we had nothing sexual to go on, so we had to rely on our friendship.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The couple's intimacy is beyond description, so they can only rely on their friendship.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: They were a married couple and we were just their friends. There was no way we could join their marriage bed, so we contented ourselves with being friends.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The couple is from Dunlop, we have no common ground to speak of, only a friendship based on mutual respect.
You see, he's married, and I am not. That's why we're friends, not relatives.

chinese: 天地会的会众多是江湖豪杰，赌钱酗酒，乃是天性，向来不以为非，总舵主也就不再理会，向他凝视片刻，道：“你愿不愿拜我为师？”
english: Since most members of the Society came from a travelling background in which gambling and drunken brawling were accepted as normal behaviour, the Helmsman was inclined to turn a blind eye on these matters. He looked at Trinket intently for some moments as if trying to make his mind up about something. 'Would you like to be my apprentice?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Many of the members of the Society of Heaven are local nobles with a love for gambling and drinking, which is their nature, so they never considered it as abnormal or improper, and the headmaster just ignored them, and he looked at her for a moment before saying, "Do you wish to become my disciple?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): All the members of The Society for the Protection of Great Treasures were men and women with natural passions for gambling and drugging, and they spent their lives on these paths; and as a matter of fact they never did anything unusual about it. unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The Heaven and Earth Association had a lot of members who were martial heroes, gamblers and drunkards. They were by nature not regarded as something wrong. The Grand Master didn’t care about him any more and looked at him for a moment before saying, "Do you want to be my master?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The Brothers of the Triad Society were a rather unusual lot, not the least of whom was the absence from their nature gambling and drinking. To these eccentric hillfolk neither these activities were in any way immoral, and the Helmsman was so accustomed to their ways that he paid them off with a casual wave of the hand. 'Would you like to be my apprentice?'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The Heaven and Earth Society was a place for all manner of adventurers and gamblers, who indulged in their vices with abandon. This was seen as part of their nature, and the leader of the organization did not interfere unless it was necessary. After giving him a moment's scrutiny, he asked, "Do you wish to take me as your master?"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The members of the Triad Society were men of the road, for whom gambling and drinking came naturally and was indeed an article of faith. Since the Helmsman himself had once been a gambler and an alcholic, he had no difficulty in understanding the Society's的看法 that these were natural pursuits, and left the subject in peace. But he stared at the young man for a moment or two before he asked, 'Would you be willing to make me your master?'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The members of the Heaven and Earth Society were all skilled fighters, gamblers, and drinkers, and they were used to their ways. They never saw anything wrong with it, and the leader of the group didn't bother to reprimand them. When one of them looked at the leader, he asked, "Do you want to become my disciple?"</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The Brotherhood was full of colourful characters, gamblers and drinkers all. Brawling and baying for drink were their natural impulses and they had never met a Helmsman who didn't go along with them. He stared at Trinket for a moment before asking him if he was willing to become his disciple.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The crowd at the Tian Di Hall were numerous, they were the powerful figures of the river-sea world, gambling and drinking, which was their nature, and they had never been concerned about right or wrong. The host, not paying attention to them, looked at him for a moment and asked, "Would you like to take me as your master?"

The members of the Triad Society were, like their leader, men of action. They gambled and drank to their hearts' content and took whatever pleasures they could get. There was no question of their basic integrity; the Helmsman, having observed them for a few moments, put the question to them directly. 'Do you wish to take me as your Shifu?'

chinese: 叶文洁：如果他们能够跨越星际来到我们的世界，说明他们的科学已经发展到相当的高度，一个科学如此昌明的社会，必然拥有更高的文明和道德水准。

chinese: 父亲在王文义妻子的尸体上游蹲下，双手掬起水来喝，粘稠的水滴从他的指缝里摇曳下落，落水无声。

chinese: 我甚至想到可能中国已经复辟了帝制，军代表已经当上了此地的土司。

chinese: 它们是自行其事，你说你的，它说它的，什么样的有公论的事情，在它都是另一番是非。

chinese: 父亲拖着枪，跟着爷爷，绕着屠杀场走着，滋足了血的黑土像胶泥一样，陷没了他们的脚面。 人的尸体与高粱的残躯混杂在一起。

chinese: 没有远的目标，近的目标是有的。
english: And, though he lacked long-term goals, he did have some short-term plans.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But they didn't lack a target—there were just no targets set.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Without a far-reaching goal, there will be some near goals.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Without far-reaching goals, their goal was simply to have anything.
