chinese: 故乡的黑土本来就是出奇的肥沃，所以物产丰饶，人种优良。 民心高拔健迈，本是我故乡心态。
english: The black soil of my hometown, always fertile, was especially productive, and the people who tilled it were especially decent, strong-willed, and ambitious.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The fertile black soil of one’s homeland is so extraordinary that it yields plenty of produce, and people from there are excellent in character. This is my original feeling about the place.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Our black soil was so much richer than other places that we were indeed rich with produce, proficient in people, and above all loyal to our native customs.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The black soil of my hometown was naturally fertile, so it produced abundant products and people were of high quality. My mind is strong and energetic, which is the spirit of my hometown.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The black soil of our hometown was so rich that plenty of good things grew in it, and people who grew up there were naturally hearty and tough-minded. This was also the mentality of the people in my hometown.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The black soil of my hometown is naturally exceptionally fertile, thus yielding abundant produce and cultivating fine people. The spirit of the people is high-minded and vigorous, which has always been the mindset of my hometown.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The black soil of home is so fertile that it produces a plentiful harvest year after year, nourishing the race of people who, like the land, are strong and upright.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The fertile soil of my hometown is truly remarkable, and it is the source of abundant resources. The people who live there are of high moral character and strong physique. This is the essence of the mentality of my hometown.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The black earth of my hometown was naturally so fertile that the produce was bountiful and the people were healthy and handsome, with confident and vigorous hearts.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The native soil of my hometown is naturally very fertile, so the produce is abundant, and the people are of good quality. The spirit of the people is high and vigorous, which is the attitude of my hometown.

The black earth of my hometown was naturally very fertile, producing bountiful crops and giving rise to a sturdy and intelligent people. We were proud and ambitious, which was the mentality of the people of my hometown.

chinese: 轿夫身上散发出汗酸味，奶奶有点痴迷地呼吸着这男人的气味，她老人家心中肯定漾起一圈圈春情波澜。
english: The men's bodies emitted the sour smell of sweat. Infatuated by the masculine odour, Grandma breathed in deeply – this ancestor of mine must have been nearly bursting with passion.

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The porters exuded a pungent sweat smell, and Grandma was somewhat entranced by this man's scent. In her heart, there were surely ripples of spring passion.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The trinket-bearer's sweat exuded a odour that Grandma found a bit intoxicating. She must have been undergoing little waves of sexual excitement as she breathed it in.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The groom's sweat smells of vinegar, and grandma is slightly intoxicated by his scent. She must be feeling a wave of springtime emotions in her heart.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The smell of sweat enveloped them, and Grandma breathed in the smell deeply, as if she had been seized with a springtime passion.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The coachman emanated a sweaty odor, Grandma seemed slightly entranced by the man's scent, and in her heart, a circle of spring feelings undulated.
The sweaty odour of the bearer overwhelmed her, and she breathed in his scent absentmindedly, evoking in her old heart a tide of springtime passion.

chinese: 韦小宝不肯服输，心想你大胆偷食，我的胆子也不小于你，当即拿起一块千层糕，肆无忌惮的放入口中。
english: Trinket was not going to be outdone. If this young fellow could continue calmly scavenging, so could he. He popped another slice of layer cake nonchalantly into his mouth.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Qu Yuan refused to be beaten, thinking that you were bold enough to steal from me, and I was not as bold as you, so he immediately took a piece of the Thousand-layer cake and ate it with all his might.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket didn't think that small-minded he had been: having been too modest himself, he decided to give the cake a wild toss in front of him.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaoping refused to give up, thinking that you dared to steal, my courage is also greater than yours, so he picked up a cake with layers of thousand, without restraint, put it into his mouth.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket refused to admit that he had been beaten, and argued that it was unjustifiable to take other people's food. The greater the insult, he thought, the greater the reward he decided to claim. Accordingly he picked up a cake of layers upon layers of rice-gram flour and stuffed it greedily in his own mouth.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Wu Xiaobao was unwilling to concede defeat, thinking, "You have the boldness to pilfer, but my courage is no less than yours." He immediately picked up a layer cake, and with complete disregard for propriety, put it into his mouth.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket was not having this. 'You think I'm afraid of you, sitting here telling you what to do! I've got as much courage as you've got! ' he cried. And he picked up a layer cake and stuffed it recklessly into his mouth.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Wu Xiaobao refused to admit defeat and thought, "You may be brave enough to steal my food, but my courage is not smaller than yours. Therefore, I will take a slice of thousand-layer cake and eat it without hesitation."</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Trinket was not having this. If you can steal a cake, I can too, he thought, and reaching out, he took a fistful of the ten-layer cake and stuffed it into his mouth without bothering to excuse himself.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Wei Xiaobao refused to concede, thinking you are audacious to steal food, my courage is not smaller than yours, so I immediately picked up a piece of thousand-layer cake, eating it without hesitation.
Trinket was not having this. 'You didn't think I'd let you win, did you? I've got as much pride as you have. I'll eat this cake if I want to! I'll eat it now, if you like.

chinese: 刘老老忙道：“一早就往这里赶咧，那里还有吃饭的工夫咧？”

chinese: 那宾馆区的灯光却因为天地楼群的大和高，显得有些寂寥，却是璀璨的寂寥，有一些透心的快乐似的。
english: The lights over in the hotel district look a little lonely due to the heights of the buildings around it, but theirs is a resplendent loneliness that pierces the heart with rapture.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The lighting of the hotel district is a bit dim compared to the grandeur and height of the skyscrapers that surround it. It seems to be somewhat lonely and melancholy, with some profound pleasure embedded within it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But the hotel buildings still give the area a somber mood, as the群峰林立的高台上的人们使出浑身的力道，也是为了排遣心中那股刻印着生死存亡仅有一线希望的快乐。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The lights of the hotel district, however, looked somewhat desolate because of the grandness and height of the sky-high buildings surrounding it, but they were also a kind of sheer happiness that made one's heart ache.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But the lights of the hotel complex looked lonely against the sky, although the building towers dominated them.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The lights in that district of hotels seemed somewhat desolate due to the grandeur and height of the buildings, yet this was a splendid solitude, as if it brought a profound sense of joy.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): But the lights in that area of the city, where the hotels are clustered closely together and rise up tall, seem to be in the darkness, glittering in isolation—rather like a contented heart.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The lights in the hotel district shone brightly because of the high-rise buildings, but it felt somewhat desolate, yet sparklingly so. It was as if there was some joy deep within.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The lights of the hotels and office buildings shining down on the city streets give the impression of solitary grandeur, but the feeling is one of free and easy happiness.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The lighting in the hotel district seemed somewhat lonely due to the grandeur and height of the Tian Di towers, yet it was a splendid loneliness, with a hint of transparent happiness.
But the hotel district was lit up by the setting sun, which cast a gaudy pall of darkness over the whole area. But it was a transparent kind of happiness.

chinese: 潘寒坐下，沉默良久才开口：“有些问题我能够回答，有些不能，但如果各位与三体世界有缘，总有一天所有的问题都能得到解答。”
english: After looking at each of them in turn, Pan sat down and spoke. 'Some questions I can answer. Others I cannot. But if you are meant to be with Trisolaris, all your questions will be answered someday.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Pan Han sits down after a long silence and then speaks: "I can answer some of these questions, but not all of them; if we have a good connection with the Three Body Problem world, eventually we will be able to answer all of the problems."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Pan sat down and then continued silently. 'I can try to answer some questions, but not all . . . if your world exists, you'll certainly one day be able to answer all the mysteries.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Pan Han sat down and remained silent for a long time before speaking, "There are some questions I can answer, but not all of them; if you all have the chance to get to know the Three Body World, there will come a day when all your questions can be answered."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Pan sat down and spoke for a long time. He could answer some of the questions but not others because he didn't know the answer to them. But if they had a future connection with Trisolaris, all the answers would be given to them in the end.

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Pam sat down, remained silent for a while before speaking, "There are some questions that I can answer, and some that I cannot, but if you are connected to the Three Realms, all your questions will eventually be answered."</s>

gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Pán Han sat down, remaining silent for a long time before speaking: "Some questions I can answer, some I cannot, but if everyone here has a connection with the Three-Body Problem universe, there will be a day when all questions will be answered."

Pan sat for a long time before replying. 'Some questions I can answer,' he said. 'Others I cannot. But if any of you should ever find yourselves in the Trisolaran world, you will eventually get the answers you seek.'

chinese: 他自觉得胜，心下高兴，只是小郡主不会说话，未免有些扫兴，要想去解她穴道，却又不知其法，说道：“你给人点了穴道，倘若解不开，不能吃饭，岂不饿死了？
english: It was agreeable to have won, but it rather took the gloss off his victory that she couldn't speak. He would have liked to open the vital points that would enable her to do so, but he didn't know how. 'Now that your vital points are closed, you can't eat,' he said. 'If they're not opened, you'll just starve to death.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He felt that he was winning, and his heart was happy. However, since the young lady of a small county didn’t speak, it was somewhat regrettable; he thought that if he wanted to find out her secret, he would have no idea how to do so, saying, “If you gave me a point for a secret place, I cannot eat, what then?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But he was still unhappy, because the Little Countess had not said a word and he was afraid that her feelings might be hurt before she would reveal what lay behind her strange movements. So he went on as if nothing had happened, 'Now think of what will happen if your Meridians don't open up for us? They say you can't eat anything until they have been blocked! What shame!'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He felt that he was victorious, and his heart was filled with joy. However, the little princess didn’t speak; it would be a pity if she couldn’t open her acupuncture points. He wanted to know how to open them, but he had no idea. "If you give someone an acupuncture point, and they can’t open it, they will starve to death! What’s more, if they can’t eat, what about their lives?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old eunuch felt rather pleased with himself as he saw the displeased look on the Little Countess's face. He had succeeded in keeping her from eating while she was tied up, but he realized that this was the price she had to pay; and though he knew there must be a way of releasing the bandages without compromising her position, he was at sea as yet. 'Now people are starting to complain!,' he said to himself. 'What have I done to deserve all this?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Feeling that he had won, he was pleased, but the princess, being unable to speak, somewhat dampened his spirits. He wanted to release her from the binding technique, but didn't know how to do it. He said, "If you have been bound by a binding technique and can't unbind it, you can't eat, right? You'll starve to death!"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): It was very satisfying to him to be the victor, but he felt a twinge of conscience at overlooking Misty's soreness and incontinence; and though he didn't dare admit to her that she had been manipulated by a chi expert, he wished he could some way restore her to health. He knew there was no hope for her as long as she remained with the block in her throat, and he wished he knew the method of removing it; but though he had watched the manœuvre when the old eunuch had closed up the Palace, he had not paid sufficient attention to remember it. 'If you can't eat because you've been chi-blocked,' he said, 'you'd starve to death, wouldn't you?
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He felt triumphant and happy, but the princess was unable to speak and his excitement was dampened. He wanted to free her from her bindings, but didn't know how. "If you can't free yourself, you won't be able to eat and might starve to death," he said.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He felt triumphant. The little Countess would now be unable to speak for some time and he felt a certain disgust for her. He reflected that if he could find the right vital point and block it, she would soon die of hunger, which in his opinion would be a fitting punishment for her obstinacy.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He felt victorious, feeling happy inside, but the young lady of the manor was silent, which was a bit disappointing. To approach her and learn her ways was difficult, as he didn't know the method. He said, "If you teach me her ways, if they can't be opened, I won't be able to eat, won't I die of hunger?"

He felt victorious; but the Little Countess's silence began to bore him and he longed to close some of the vital points he had opened in order to relieve her suffering; but he had no idea how to go about it and was beginning to get hungry, which made him rather cross. 'If you don't open your mouth for me to close some of the vital points,' he said, 'you'll die of hunger.

chinese: 汪淼说：“这个能解决，有少量片状的‘飞刃’材料，可以用作细丝在柱子上固定处的垫片。”
english: Wang said, 'That's easy to solve. We have some small amounts of Flying Blade material that are flat sheets. We can use them to protect the parts of the column where the filaments are attached.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Liang Meng said: “This can be solved, with a small amount of ‘flying blade’ material, which can be used as a垫片固定在柱子上的细丝上。”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Wang said, 'This should be easy. I have a small amount of filaments of high-index diamond fiber with the right properties: You could use it as垫片，在导电体之间固定几根后可实现微小截面的‘飞刃’材料按入，就能解决了。'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wang Miao said, "This can be solved. There is a small quantity of sheet ‘spearhead’ material that can be used as the pad for fixing a thread on the column."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Wang said, 'This should be solved. I have a few pieces of Flyblade material available, and they can be used as the pad between the filaments and the column.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Wang Miao said, "This can be resolved. There's a small amount of flaky 'flying edge' material that can be used as a spacer for the attachment points of the fine threads on the column."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Wang said, 'That should be easy. I have a small amount of the sliced 'sword blade' material. We can use it as spacers between the wires and the pillars.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: This can solve the problem of having small amounts of "fly blade" material that can be used as a cushioning layer for thin wires on a pillar.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Wang said, 'Well, in that case we can use thin slices of the material to make shims to hold the filaments in place against the pillars.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Wang Wen says: "This problem can be solved by using a small amount of 'fei jian' material as a fixing pad for the silk threads on the rods."
Wang said, 'I think I can solve it. We can use some of the sliced filaments as shims between the pillars to reinforce them.'

chinese: 旁边伏侍的人只见他先还拿着镜子照，落下来，仍睁开眼拾在手内，末后镜子掉下来，便不动了。
english: To those who stood around the bed and watched him while this was happening he appeared first to be holding up the mirror and looking into it, then to let it drop; then to open his eyes in a ghastly stare and pick it up again; then, as it once more fell from his grasp, he finally ceased to move.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Nearby soldiers just saw him still holding a mirror before he went on his way. As soon as it fell, he opened his eyes again and picked up the mirror, but it didn't move after that.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): who was watching him had stopped him already on looking back in the mirror and making a little noise with his hand held up to him, but in fact he continued to pick it up when it fell to his ground. And so he did.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The attendant saw that he first held the mirror up, dropped it, and then picked it back up in his hand; finally, when the mirror fell down, it did not move at all.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Observing the action of this one individual within their charge, who, it transpired, was a eunuch employed to keep the emperor's clothes tidy, they saw him first hold up the mirror to himself, release it, and then open it again, his hand still hovering over it; but as the last episode of the spectacle took place, he remained where he was on the floor.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The attendants nearby, seeing him first holding a mirror to inspect himself, then letting it fall, still opening his eyes to retrieve it, and finally stopping when the mirror fell and no longer moved.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): As she went, her hand was busily employed with a hand-mirror which she held up from time to time to examine herself by, but this was now dropped on to the bed and remained there until it was finally found there lifeless by the attendants standing beside them.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The person next to him only saw him take the mirror, look at himself, and then put it down. When the mirror fell, he didn't move.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The pages on either side of the mirror saw it fall and reached out to pick it up, but the mirror lay where it fell and remained where it lay.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The person standing beside him was seen to take a mirror, lower it, and then keep his eyes open while holding it in his hand. Later, the mirror fell down, and he did not move anymore.

While he was speaking, the boy at the side was busy with the mirror. He took it from her and held it up to her face, then, having done that, took it back and stared at it himself, before finally letting it drop to the floor.

chinese: 这地方一上来就显得有些没心肺，无忧虑，是因为它没来得及积蓄起什么回忆，它的头脑里还是空白一片，还用不着使用记忆力。
english: When you first arrive here, the place seems to lack a heart because it is so carefree—but that is because it hasn't yet had time to build up a reservoir of recollections; its mind is blank and has not begun to feel the need to call on its memory.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The place immediately appears to lack a heart and mind; it seems to be lacking memories due to its inability to store any of them, so it is not necessary for it to use memory at all.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The start is very unmemorializing, as if the place not even had a soul. This is because all memories it has have just been stored in an empty memory bank; no need for mental recrimining was likely implied.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: This place comes off as lacking a soul and worries, because it hasn’t had the chance to accumulate any memories yet. Its mind is still blank, so it doesn’t need to use its memory at all.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): This section of Shanghai seems lacking in heart and soul, lacks the capacity for storing memories because it has never had the need to recall; its brain is still empty, and it doesn't have to develop memory capacities.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: This place starts off seeming a little heartless and carefree because it hasn't had time to accumulate any memories. Its mind is still blank, not needing to use its memory yet.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The place lacks conscience right from the start; it is a callous place. This is because it has not had time to form memories, its mind is still blank, and it has not learned to use its memory.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: This place seems a bit dull and lifeless at first glance. It's because it hasn't had a chance to accumulate any memories, and its brain is still blank. It doesn't require the use of memory.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: This is because these areas have not yet had the opportunity to accumulate memories. Their minds are blank slabs, and they do not need to summon up memories.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: This place seems somewhat lifeless and carefree from the start, without worries, because it hasn't had time to accumulate any memories, its mind is still a blank slate, and it doesn't need to use its memory capacity.

As soon as she arrived at this new place, she felt that her heart and lungs had collapsed—she was carefree. This was because her mind was still empty; she had not yet begun to accumulate memories here and did not need to use her faculties of recall.

chinese: 只见她微笑着招手，韦小宝大喜，轻轻闪身过门。 蕊初又将门掩上了，在他耳畔低声道：“我怕你进不来，已在这里等了许久。”
english: She smiled at him and beckoned to him to come in. He complied happily, and when he had slipped inside, she fastened the gate after him. 'I thought I'd better wait here in case you had trouble getting in,' she said softly in his ear. 'I've been waiting ever such a long time.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Seeing her smiling as she waved, Wang Siyu was overjoyed. She lightly flitted past the door and whispered softly to him: "I am afraid you won’t come in here, I have been waiting for you there for quite some time."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She smiled and beckoned to him, Trinket bigging on look, but swiftly backtracked when he saw her door closed again and low on his throat: 'I'm afraid you would be unable to get inside. You've been waiting quite some time.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I saw her smiling and waving, and Hu Xiaokang was overjoyed. He slipped through the door quickly. Rui Chu was already shutting the door softly on his ear, saying, "I don’t want you to come in; I’ve been waiting here for a long time."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He saw her smile and call to him, Trinket was pleased beyond measure. He hurried across and gently slipped through again so as not to be seen. Blossom had already closed the door after her. She waited for him quietly by the side of the house, her voice low, saying, 'I didn't want you to think you couldn't get in.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: She smiled and waved at him, and Wei Xiaobao was overjoyed as he slipped through the door. Rui Chou then closed the door again, whispering close to his ear, "I was afraid you couldn't get in, so I've been waiting here for a long time."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): At a gesture from her he slipped inside and the door clicked shut behind him. 'I was afraid you wouldn't be able to get in here, so I've been waiting here for you a long time.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He saw her smiling and waving, and he was delighted. He quickly flashed through the door and heard her whisper in his ear, "I was afraid you wouldn't be able to come in, so I've been waiting here for a while."</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He could see that she was smiling and waving him in, and hastened to obey, ducking his head and slipping inside. The door closed softly behind him and he heard her voice in his ear: 'I was afraid you might not get in, so I waited for you here.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: She smiled and waved, Wei Xiaobao was very happy, he lightly darted through the door. Liu Chi again covered the door and whispered in his ear: "I've been waiting here for a long time, afraid you wouldn't be able to come."
Trinket flashed a smile at her and hurried inside. Blossom closed the door after him and whispered in his ear: 'I was beginning to think you weren't going to come.'

chinese: 虽然如此，还是和白天不一样。

chinese: 他在这夜晚里嗅到了他所熟悉的气息。 灯光令他亲切，是驻进他身心里的那种。
english: He took in the familiar scents of the city and soaked up the evening scene.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He sensed the familiar scent that he knew well. The light made him comfortable, akin to a home inside his heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): That night he caught a whiff of that place, and the lamp gave him a sense of familiarity; he missed it dearly.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He detected the familiar scent of that night. The light made him feel close, like it had settled inside his heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He could smell the familiar air of night, and the lights were pleasant reminders of where he'd left off.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: In this night, he caught a familiar scent. The lights were welcoming, they had become part of his inner self.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): In that evening's darkness he detected a familiar scent, and the glare of the lights had a familiar quality, as if they too had worked their way into his heart.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He sensed the familiar scent in the night. The light made him feel at home, as if it was a part of his soul.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He could smell the familiar scent in the darkness, and the lamplight penetrated deep into his soul.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He could smell a familiar scent in the evening. The light was comforting, the kind that settled within his heart and soul.
He could smell it, that familiar odour, as the lights went on—an intimacy he welcomed into the depths of his being.

chinese: 太太听见气死过去了，这会子叫我来拿你。

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Mrs Li was stunned. She had summoned me today because your air was poisoned.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The wife heard that her husband had died of anger, so she called me now to fetch you.

chinese: 贾瑞笑道：“别是路上有人绊住了脚，舍不得回来了罢？”
english: 'Could it be,' Jia Rui inquired archly, 'that Someone has detained him on his way home and that he can't tear himself away?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Jia Rui smiled, "Is it because someone has stopped you on the road that you can't come back?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): This isn't the place for showing your gratitude, ' said Jia Rui. 'It's better if she doesn't get on to any other route and bump into anyone along the way and let her get back anyway.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Jia Ru smiled and said, "Perhaps someone tripped over your way home and you didn't want to come back?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Someone must have tripped me, or I shouldn't be walking back again,' said Jia Rui.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Jia Rui chuckled, "Perhaps someone tripped on the road and is unwilling to come back?"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Perhaps someone you might have expected has been detained on the way here and hasn't had time to get back again?'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "No, it's not that someone stepped on my foot on the road and I couldn't come back. It's just that I've been too busy with work and haven't had time to come home."</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'Oh no!' said Jia Rui. 'Someone's tripped me up!'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Jia Rui laughed and said: "Is it not because someone tripped on the road and you can't bear to return?"
It wasn't that I tripped up on the way,' said Jia Rui. 'I just didn't want to come back.'

chinese: 他想着：“兄弟们一并都有父母教训，何必我多事，反生疏了。 况且我是正出，他是庶出，饶这样看待，还有人背后谈论，还禁得辖治了他？”
english: 'We are both equally subject to our parents' control,' he would say of himself and Jia Huan. 'Why should I create a greater distance between us by trying to control him myself – especially when I am the wife's son and he is the concubine's? People already talk behind our backs, even when I do nothing. It would be ten times worse if I were to start bossing him about.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He thought: “My brothers have their parents’ teachings, why should I trouble myself? And besides me being the one who is out there, he is a peasant, so I shouldn’t be so hard on him?”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Well, first of all my younger brothers have parents to go guiding them, so不必寄希望靠他们。况且我也够单身汉，再说再说硬要叫我取经，那可太失礼了; 而且人家也不会觉着我的存在，依旧过日子，什么也没人管我，更没人罚我去去的。'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He thought, "My brothers have been punished by their parents, why should I trouble myself and become estranged? Besides, he is a庶子, and so I can treat him well; there will be people behind his back talking about it, and he can't even be controlled."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The thought ran through Old Colour's mind as he planned to go: 'If my brothers are all under the watchful care of parents who teach them everything they know, why should it be any more difficult for me, who am myself a child of choice, to see someone once or twice a week? After all, I have only got to keep quiet about it all and there are people about who might gossip and make me feel embarrassed.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He was thinking, "Brothers all have their parents' teachings, why should I bother myself? It might even make me seem distant. Besides, I am of the legitimate family line, while he is of the concubine's, even if I treat him with respect, there will still be people talking behind our backs, how can I possibly manage him?"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): It was calculated by our protagonist that since the boys all had their own parents to bring them up, there was no reason why he should bother to instruct them himself and risk making them too distant from him; besides, as a man born in wedlock he was naturally inferior to Bao-yu, who was a full-blooded son. Even if he did give the boys lessons, they would talk behind his back and he would never be able to maintain strict discipline over them.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He thought: "Brothers have all been trained by their parents, why should I bother them? It would only make them distant. Moreover, I am the eldest, he is the youngest, and people might talk behind his back even if I treat him well. So, it's better not to interfere."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'If my other brothers have had to put up with their father and mother, why should I be the one to get the rough end of it? Besides, I am the eldest. What more have you to say against me? It's bad enough having people gossiping behind my back; but when they get hold of a story like that, I wonder if there's any way of stopping them?'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He thought: "All of my brothers have been taught by our parents, why should I be so busy, causing us to drift apart. Moreover, I am the eldest, he is the younger brother, how can I treat him like this, and there are still people gossiping behind his back, and he is still being controlled? "

But 'brothers', he thought, 'all have their parents to guide them. There's no need for me to go interfering and causing him trouble. Besides, he's a natural son; I'm only a foster-son. People will think I'm trying to usurp her place if I tell her.'

chinese: 他让她们等一会儿，再带她们去别处逛，今日有一个棚在做特技呢！
english: He told them to wait a little while, and then he would take them to watch a special effects shoot that was going on at one of the other sets!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He let them wait a bit longer, then took them somewhere else to do stunts. This is one of those places where they have a special tent today!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He waited, asking them to wait a bit, and then he took them somewhere else to see. The balcony stand-up man they saw was performing magic!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He let them wait a while, then took them somewhere else for a show, there's a tent set up today with some special effects!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He told them not to wait long, then took them to another section of the studio where they would see some acrobatics.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He asked them to wait a moment and then take them to another area to wander around. There was a stunt show going on in a tent today!
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): He asked them to wait a bit, then took them to another section of the studio. Today they were doing special effects in one of the studios.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He told them to wait for a while and then take them to another place to explore. Today, there is a tent set up to perform some tricks!
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He told them to wait for a bit before taking them somewhere else to shop. There was a scene being shot today for a movie and they could go and watch if they liked.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He made them wait for a while, then took them to another place to shop. There is a performance on a stage today!
He asked them to wait there for a while. He would take them to see something else soon. There was a shot being made today, he explained.

chinese: 第二天她要回上海，她叫我送她上车站。

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She would come back to Shanghai the next day, and I was to pick her up at the subway station for her.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The next day she was going back to Shanghai, and asked me to take her to the train station.

chinese: 我倒再照照正面是什么？”
english: But let me see what happens when I look into the other side!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: What if I were to look at the other side?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): What about the back? I'd like to see what he looked like.'

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Let me take a look at the front of it!'

chinese: 父亲怔怔地看着爷爷。 父亲的双眼大睁，从那两粒钻石一样的瞳孔里，散射出本来属于我奶奶的那种英勇无畏、狂放不羁的响马精神，那种黑暗王国里的希望之光，照亮了我爷爷的心头。
english: Father stared wide-eyed and fearfully at Granddad. The glare in his diamondlike pupils embodied the heroic, unrestrained spirit of Grandma, a flicker of hope that shone and lit up Granddad's heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: His eyes were wide with disbelief as he stared at his grandfather. The two diamond-like pupils of his eyes scattered a glimmer of bravery, courage, and reckless abandon that I had seen only from my grandmother’s eyes in the dark realm of the underworld.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Father's eyes grew large as if overwhelmed by something. He focused his flash of bravery and enthusiasm on Granddad. He saw the same look in Grandma's eyes that lit up the heart of the man who had come to guide him: a flickering hope of joy and happiness in the dark, alienation-filling hope of a life lived for.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The father stared at his grandfather with wide eyes. The two diamonds of the grandfather's pupils radiated what belonged to my grandmother, a fearless and reckless spirit of bandits, hope in the dark kingdom, lighting up my grandfather's heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Father's eyes, large and round, as though filled with the two diamonds of wisdom that had once shone in Grandma's eyes, were filled with the uncowed, reckless spirit of pannier thieves who dare not畏惧 even the darkness itself. Just what the devil was wrong with him?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Father stared at Grandfather in disbelief. Father's eyes were wide open, and from those two diamond-like pupils, radiated the boldness, recklessness, and fearless spirit that belonged to my grandmother, the light of hope in the dark kingdom that illuminated Grandfather's heart.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Father's eyes widened, and he stared at Granddad with two round holes of diamond-like eyes, projecting the same fearless, rakish spirit that had defined Grandma. The light of hope illuminated Granddad's heart.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Father stared at his grandfather with a solemn expression. His eyes were wide open, and from the two diamond-like pupils, there was a radiance that belonged to his grandmother's bravery, wildness, and hope. It illuminated his grandfather's heart.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Father stared at him wide-eyed. Through the diamonds of his pupils shone a glimpse of the fearlessness and defiant passion for life that had once belonged to Grandma, the light of hope in the kingdom of darkness.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Father stared fixedly at Grandfather. Father's eyes widened, and from the two diamond-like pupils, a spirit of my grandmother's fearless, unbridled, and spirited gallop, the hopeful light from the dark kingdom, illuminated Grandfather's heart.
Father's eyes were wide open, and hopeful glints leaped out of the diamond-like pupils, as though the wild, noble spirit of the horse had been released.

chinese: 现在不着急，再聊一会。
english: But let's not rush. We can talk a little longer.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Now not hurry, we’ll have another chat.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Come on; don't be so sudden! Let's see a bit more of the countryside.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Don't rush now, let's talk for a while more.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She didn't need to be in a hurry. She could chat with me for a little while more.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: We're not in a rush, let's chat for a while longer.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): No rush. Let's keep talking for a while.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Right now, no hurry, let's chat for a while.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: No hurry. We can talk a bit more.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Take your time, let's chat for a while.
Well, there's no hurry. Let's talk a little more.

chinese: 我当然不能承认是我的错，就痛骂勒农。
english: Of course, I wouldn't admit it was my fault. Instead I yelled at Le Long.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: I cannot admit that it was my fault, and I will curse Léonard.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Of course I couldn't admit that I was wrong and be cursed by you.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Of course I can't admit it was my fault, so I just cursed Larnon.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Of course I couldn't admit that I was wrong, so I called Le Long.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Of course, I couldn't admit it was my fault, so I just went after Lennon.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Of course I couldn't admit that I was wrong, so I cursed Le Long.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: I can't admit that it's my fault, so I scolded the farmer.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: I couldn't admit that I was at fault, so I had to curse Le Long instead.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: I cannot admit it's my fault, so I curse at Lei Nong.
I couldn't admit that it was my fault, so I blamed Le Long.

chinese: 现在它是一片废墟了，人创造的，又被人摧毁。
english: Now the village lay in ruins; man had created it, and man had destroyed it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: It is now a heap of ruins, man-made, then destroyed by man.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now damaged by people's creations, I am又被别人摧毁得干干净净。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It is now a pile of ruins, created by humans and destroyed by humans.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It is in ruins now, a product of human creation and soon to be destroyed.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Now it is a ruin, man-made and man-destroyed.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Now it is a pile of ruins, created by humans and then destroyed by humans.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Now it is a ruin, created by humans, yet destroyed by humans.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Now it is a deserted ruin—a product of human creation, reduced to rubble by human hands.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Now it is a ruin, man-made, and destroyed by man.
It is now a pile of ruins. People built it up, only to see it destroyed by other people.

chinese: 陈清扬说，当时她刚好醒来，看见我那颗乱蓬蓬的头正在她肚子上，然后肚脐上轻柔的一触。
english: Chen Qingyang said that she had just awakened in time to see my tousled head on her belly, and then she felt a gentle touch on her navel.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Chen Qingyu said that she was just waking up when she saw me with my messy head on her stomach, and then a gentle touch there at the belly button.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Chen Qingyang said, just at the time that she actually woke up, she caught a glimpse of me lying there, with my乱蓬蓬的脑袋正好盖在小腹上，那时她用轻柔的手把头从小腹上拿下来。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Chen said that at the time, she had just woken up and seen my unruly head on her stomach, then a gentle touch on her navel.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Chen Qingyang said that at the time she just woke up to find my greasy head on her belly, then felt the gentle bump on her chest.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Chen Qingyang said that at the time she had just woken up and saw my disheveled head on her belly, then a gentle touch at her navel.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Chen Qingyang said that she happened to wake up just then and see my messy head sitting on her belly, and then a gentle touch at her navel.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: When she woke up, she saw my unruly hair scattered on her stomach, and her belly felt a soft touch.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Chen Qingyang said that she just woke up to find my hairy head on her belly, and then my little finger rubbing her navel.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Chen Qingyang said, at that time she had just woken up and saw my disheveled head on her abdomen, then a gentle touch on her navel.
Chen Qingyang said that at the time she had just woken up, and found my head of hair on her abdomen, and then felt the softness of my belly button.

chinese: 另一名使者将坐骑让给了韦小宝，自己另乘一马，跟随在后。
english: Another of them gave up his horse to Trinket and found himself another horse on which he rode along behind.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The other messenger gave his horse to Wang Siwang, himself riding a different horse after him, following behind.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Another eunuch rode off with Trinket's horse, while the other remained after him on another mule.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Another envoy gave his horse to Wuhuan, and rode off on another one, following him.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Another of the messengers got his mount back again and walked on with Trinket on the lead.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: A second messenger gave his horse to Xiaobao Wei, who then rode another, and followed behind.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): One of the horsemen offered his animal to Trinket, who accepted it with alacrity, and the other mounted behind him on a second horse.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Another messenger gave his horse to Wei Xiaobao and rode another horse behind him.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The other horseman let out his burden to Trinket and mounted a second horse, falling in behind him as he galloped off.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Another envoy handed over his steed to Wei Xiaobao, mounting another horse and following behind.
The other messenger gave his horse to Trinket and got on to a second mount himself to bring up the rear.

chinese: 这时间的电车，多是些家庭主妇般的女人，手里拎着布袋，身上的旗袍是有皱痕的，腿后的丝袜也没对准缝，偏了那么一点，头发或是蓬乱，或是理发店刚出来戴了一顶盔似的，脸上表情也是木着的，万事俱不关心的样子。
english: Most of the passengers at that time of the day were housewives with cloth bags in hand, wearing wrinkled cheongsams, the seams of their stockings running crookedly up the back of their legs. They either had messy, disheveled hair or, if they had just walked out of the beauty salon, hair that look like a helmet. Their faces were rigid, as if nothing in the world concerned them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: This time machine is a bunch of women with hands holding bags, with wrinkles on their clothes, and no socks at all under their feet, even if they’re slightly off from where it should be, hair or messy, or a hat that was just put on by the hairdresser before she came out.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As for the trolley cars, these were women in family dress skirts adorned with handbags, slanted socks that didn't quite hit the floor despite their best efforts, and wobbly hair; their faces, too, appeared wooden as they stared down from a factory, indifferent to anyone or anything around them.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The electric car of this time was mostly women who looked like housewives, holding bags in their hands and with loose-fitting skirts. Their stockings were not aligned properly at the back, and there was a slight deviation in their hairdos, or perhaps they had just come out of a barbershop with a helmet-like hat on. Their faces showed no expression other than being emotionless, as if they didn’t care about anything.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): But it is the kind of electric ride for which the saying 'when the train arrives, all women will be there' is meant. There are not a few dressed like在家休息的妻子，她们手提布袋，旗袍有折痕，脚后跟戴着没有用到一半的筒状袜，头发要么乱得像去理发店刚出来，要么就是虽是标准的西式头型，但因为不对称，有点偏斜，脸上的神情都显得很麻木，好像与天下所有的事都没有半点关系。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The electric trains at this time of day are filled with women who resemble housewives. They carry cloth bags in their hands, and their cheongsams are creased. Their stockings are not aligned with the seams, slightly askew. Their hair is either disheveled or freshly styled like a helmet from a barber shop, and their facial expressions are wooden, as if they are indifferent to everything around them.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): During these hours, the passengers on the trolley are mostly housewives. They carry grocery bags, and their cheongsams are creased at the seams; their stockings are not even at the seams, and their hair is either messy or recently permed, looking as if they had just come out of a hair salon and were still wearing the plastic cap. They all have a distant look on their faces, as if nothing mattered.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: These women who ride the train during this time are mostly housewives, carrying bags in their hands. Their cheongsams are wrinkled, and their stockings are slightly off-kilter at the back. Some of them have unkempt hair, as if they just left the salon, and their faces are expressionless, as if they don't care about anything.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The ride was mostly filled with women who looked like suburban housewives, with their arms loaded down with bags, the seams on their cheongsams strained, the stockings on their legs sagging; or they would have on a new hairstyle, just out of the beauty parlor, their faces looking tight and wooden, as if all were far from their minds.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: During this time, many women on the train resembled housewives, carrying bags and wearing creased robes. Their socks were slightly misaligned at the back, their hair was either disheveled or freshly styled in a helmet-like fashion, and their faces showed a carefree, unconcerned expression.

The trolley was filled with women who looked very much like the wives of the household. They carried bags made of coarse cloth, and their coats had the creases of frequent use. Their stockings were mismatched, their hair was either tangled or just out of the salon's perming solution, and their expressions were blank, as if they could not have cared less about anything.

chinese: 如果打了的话，恐怕会把他打死。
english: If I had, it would probably have killed him.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: If he were to be killed by the blow, I fear that it would happen.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: If you hit him, I'm afraid he'll be killed.

chinese: 当看到他时，他的样子使那人双眼中的睡意一下子消失了。
english: But when he saw Wang's face, sleep disappeared from the staffer's eyes and was replaced by fear.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: When he saw him, his face made the person's eyes awake instantly.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When he appeared, his manner overwhelmed the person's need for sleep.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: When he appeared, the man's eyes went wide with sleepiness.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The man's eyes snapped awake as he saw her.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: When he saw him, the drowsiness in his eyes disappeared at the sight of the man.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The sight of him vanished the sleepiness from the man's eyes.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: When he appeared, the person's tired look vanished immediately.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The sight of him caused the sleepiness to disappear instantaneously from the man's eyes.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Upon seeing him, the sleepiness in that person's eyes vanished instantly.
The sight of this strange man suddenly banished all desire to sleep from his eyes.

chinese: 我倒听见说你辛苦了好几天。”
english: I hear you've been very busy these last few days.'

chinese: 奶奶嫁到单家，其实也是天意。 那天，我奶奶在秋千架旁与一些尖足长辫的大闺女耍笑游戏，那天是清明节，桃红柳绿，细雨霏霏，人面桃花，女儿解放。
english: Grandma's marriage into the Shan family was the will of heaven, implemented on a day when she and some of her playmates, with their tiny bound feet and long pigtails, were playing beside a set of swings. It was Qingming, the day set aside to attend ancestral graves; peach trees were in full red bloom, willows were green, a fine rain was falling, and the girls' faces looked like peach blossoms. It was a day of freedom for them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: It was not a coincidence that my grandmother married at singlehood, for it is part of the universe’s plan. That day, she was playing with some tall, curly-haired big-nosed girls on the swings when the rain began to pour down. It was the Qingming Festival, a beautiful spring morning, with cherry blossoms blooming and misty weather. The daughter was liberated.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When Grandma was sent down the scaffold, she was actually a part of history. That day she entertained with her parades of bare-footed, graceful granddaughters, that rainy day it was复活节, pink and lime green, dawning rain, liberated daughter.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Grandma had married to the family of Single, but it was also a sign of fate. That day, my grandmother played with some tall girls with short hair and long hair on the swing. It was Qingming Festival, with peach blossoms and green willows. People were wearing red and white clothes, and their daughters were free.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Her marriage to the Shan family was also part of a divine plan. At the time of her wedding, fall 1920, she was playing on the swing outside their home, enjoying herself with some other girls with high navel rings and long braids. It was Cherry-blossom time, the river roses were in full bloom, and the morning rain was falling lightly.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Grandma's marriage into the Shan family was indeed fate. That day, my grandma was playing games with some girls with high pointed hairdos and long braids, on a swing set. It was清明节 (Qingming Festival), a time when the peach blossoms were red, the willows green, and the fine drizzle fell, with faces reflecting the beauty of peach blossoms. The girls were enjoying their freedom.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): It was fate that brought Grandma to the Shan household. That day, as she swung back and forth beside the pendular willow, she laughed and played with other girls with long braids; that day was the Qingming festival, when willows were green and willows yellow, fine spring rain fell, and maidenhood was released.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Grandma married into the family, it was indeed fate. That day, Grandma was playing with some girls who had long braids and were wearing sharp shoes. It was the Qingming Festival, and the peach blossoms were in full bloom. The rain was light and gentle, and the girls were laughing and having fun. The girls were so beautiful that they seemed like peach blossoms themselves.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: She had married into the Shan family, it was destiny that had decreed. While playing a game of ring-toss with some of the long-haired, high-arched maidens by the swing set on that spring festival morning, she felt the petals of a peach brush her cheek, and the raindrops falling gently on her face like a wash of pink and green.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Grandmother moved to a single household, it was actually destined. On that day, my grandmother was playing games with some sharp-footed, long-braided young ladies near the see-saw, it was Tomb Sweeping Day, peach blossoms were red, willows were green, light rain was drizzling, people were like peach blossoms, and daughters were liberated.

When Grandma married into the Shan family, it was also preordained. On that day, she pushed her daughter, Yanwen, on the swing next to a group of bored young ladies who had come out to play on the festive Qingming holiday, when peasants celebrate the emergence of new life after the drab winter months.

chinese: 胡思乱想，一夜也不曾合眼。

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Ruminating on random thoughts, I didn't get a wink of sleep all night.

chinese: 我的母亲也是小脚，我每次看到她的脚，就心中难过，就恨不得高呼：打倒封建主义！
english: My mother also had bound feet, and just seeing them saddened me so much that I felt compelled to shout: 'Down with feudalism!

unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: My mother also had bound feet, and every time I saw her feet, it filled me with sorrow, urging me to cry out: Down with feudalism!

chinese: 她母亲便连连冷笑道：王琦瑶原来是在坐月子，我倒不知道，她男人都没有，怎么就坐月子，你倒给我说说这个道理！
english: Mrs. Wang laughed coldly. 'Oh, so Wang Qiyao should be resting this month, should she? That's funny, I didn't know. With no man around to rely on, how is she supposed to be able to rest? Will you explain that to me?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Her mother kept repeating that Wang Qihe was not pregnant anymore, and she had no children at all, so how could she be on maternity leave? You tell me this reason!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Mrs. Wang laughed at herself. 'She's actually been out having birth-patency here on vacation. I never knew she was having a baby . . . and yet she's sitting around all alone, and I've always been able to tell that something was wrong. Why does it suddenly seem like such a bad idea to sit around all day long?'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Her mother was laughing coldly all the time: Wang Qi'er actually was sitting at home during her pregnancy, I did not know this either. She had no men, how could she be sitting at home? Please tell me about this!
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Mrs. Wang made a series of cynical comments: Oh, the little blessed little miracle state of grace that she's in! I didn't know; and then all because she's a new mother . . . to tell me about the medical value of lying on the floor for seven days! Just give me the clue, please!
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Her mother laughed coldly repeatedly: "It turns out Wang Qiaoyao is in confinement. I didn't know that. Without a man, how can she be in confinement? Explain this to me!"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Mrs. Wang started laughing sarcastically. 'Huh! Sit out the month? I didn't know she had a husband. Well, I bet it wasn't easy figuring out who her baby daddy was. Tell me, how does one go about announcing a pregnancy like that?'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: She said with a cold laugh, "It turns out that Wang Qiu Yao was sitting for her confinement, and I didn't know that. How could she do that without a husband, and you should explain this logic to me!"</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Mrs. Wang snorted in derision, 'So you're one of those new-fashioned mothers-to-be who skip over the first three months of pregnancy and then suddenly start showing? I had no idea. Let me tell you something about that: you should be proud to be carrying a child for your husband! You should feel lucky to be in his position!
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Her mother laughed repeatedly: "Wang Jiaxiao is on maternity leave, I didn't know that, but she doesn't have a husband, how can she be on maternity leave? Could you explain this logic to me!"
Mrs. Wang laughed bitterly. 'I see.' she said. 'So you are on maternity leave. I had no idea. Well, who is the father?'

chinese: 韦小宝扑将过去，便去扭男孩的双臂。 那男孩一侧身，右手一勾，韦小宝站立不住，立时倒了。

chinese: 士隐慌忙起身谢道：“恕诓驾之罪，且请略坐，弟即来奉陪。”
english: Shi-yin hurriedly rose up and excused himself: 'I seem to have brought you here under false pretences. I do hope you will forgive me. If you don't mind sitting on your own here for a moment, I shall be with you directly.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: I apologize for my tardiness; I must admit that I am very sorry about this.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Take your fill, Sir,' said Shi-yin bustling to him to welcome his guest and to fetch him some coffee if he likes. 'Wait for you!'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wang Ling hurriedly stood up and said, "I apologize for deceiving you, please sit down for a moment. I will come and accompany you immediately."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Shi-yin hurriedly got to his feet and clasped his hands in greeting. 'Pardon my misrepresentation. Please sit down a moment while I go out and come back again to affront.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Scholar Shen hurriedly rose to express his gratitude, saying, "Forgive me for leading you astray. Please wait just a moment; I will come back to join you."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Shi-yin hurriedly rose to his feet. 'Please excuse me! I must ask you to wait a moment while I go and fetch her.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The gentleman hurriedly stood up to apologize, saying, "Please forgive me for my mistake. May I sit down and accompany you?"
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Shi-yin hurriedly rose to his feet. 'I beg to apologize for the rudeness. Please do not disturb your kindness. I will fetch some wine and we can sit and smoke together.'

chinese: 轿夫抬轿从街上走，迈的都是八字步，号称“踩街”，这一方面是为讨主家欢喜，多得些赏钱； 另一方面，是为了显示一种优雅的职业风度。
english: As the bearers carried their load down the path, their feet left a series of V imprints known as 'tramples' in the dirt, for which satisfied clients usually rewarded them, and which fortified the bearers' pride of profession.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The driver of the carriage walks on the street with his feet straightened out like a square, known as "stepping down the street." This is part of a scheme to please the owner, thus increasing their revenue; it also serves as an indication of a refined professional appearance.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sedan bearers walked along the streets in八字步, so their主人就以收取路费的名义开轿。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The porter carried the carriage down the street, walking on his toes in a square step, which was called "walking the streets". On one hand, this was done for the pleasure of pleasing the master and getting more money; on the other hand, it was done to show a graceful professional style.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When they entered the street, the bearers bent their legs out at the ankles in a square dance called 'strolling,' which was both a public relations stunt to please their master and a display of refined craftsmanship.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Porters carry the sedan chair through the street, stepping in a八字 pattern, known as "walking the streets." This practice is on one hand to please the host family and earn more rewards; on the other hand, it is to demonstrate a refined professional demeanor.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The bearers' legs never touch the ground as they pollywog their way down the street; this is called 'street walking', not only to please the wedding party and earn more tips, but also to project the professional grace and elegance of their trade.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The sedan bearers walk down the street with a graceful pace, known as "treading the streets," both to please their employer and to showcase their profession's elegance.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The bearers walked in a cadence called 'walking in eight-inch steps', or 'treading the dirt', to earn tips from the passengers and to show off their elegance of manner.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The carriage driver walks down the street with a rhythmic eight-character step, often referred to as "street-treading". This serves not only to please the master's family, often earning tips, but also to show a refined professional demeanor.

As the bearers lifted the sedan chair from the street, they took it in a rhythmic eight-character step, known as 'street walking', which not only pleased the eye of the onlookers but also enabled them to put their prestigious profession on display.

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Wu Pei-chen is a woman who is capable of taking care of herself, her life's mission is not as heavy as Wang Qi-yao's, she has a small amount of self-interest, and she also has a small amount of disregard. unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Fortunately, Wu Peizhen was the type to take things in stride; she realized that her friend's problems were more significant than her own. She decided to bear the brunt of the disappointment for Wang Qiyao's sake.

chinese: 因见上面大旨不过谈情，亦只是实录其事，绝无伤时诲淫之病，方从头至尾抄写回来，闻世传奇。
english: He could see that its main theme was love; that it consisted quite simply of a true record of real events; and that it was entirely free from any tendency to deprave and corrupt. He therefore copied it all out from beginning to end and took it back with him to look for a publisher.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: In view of the grand purpose not being merely a summary but a factual record of the matter itself, it is free from the disease of infatuation and vice, and I have written down everything from beginning to end, so that one can read this story from start to finish.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): From what above seems to us, as well as what below tells us, is only a reading of the documents relating the affairs of two persons and no profanation of those events for the sake of charm or sensuality, and we have therefore decided to put all this material together into a single volume which will contain both the text of the letters and the context in which they were written. We have even consulted the most recent editions of the critical biographers of the当事人.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: For the purpose of copying it back from the beginning to end, I have heard of this novel that is not only a historical account but also has no disease of causing trouble for time or morals.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He found that, whatever the principal purpose of The Story of the Contentious Times was to serve as a record of courtly intrigue without, it seems, containing any indecent or immoral matter, he had, on reading it through from beginning to end, copied it out and had it printed. This copy is now in the possession of the Society.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Given that the main theme is merely about love and it simply records events as they occurred without any corrupting influence or immoral teachings, I have copied it from beginning to end to circulate among the world as a legend.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The book, he found, was concerned solely with the 'business of love'. Unlike many of the romances current at that time, it presented unadulterated facts, without a single questionable moral or improper scene. This, said Jia Huan, was what made it so interesting. He had therefore copied the whole thing out and published it for the benefit of his fellow-men.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: I saw the gist of the matter, but did not discuss emotions. It is only a record of what happened, and I have written it from beginning to end without any harm or indecency. It is a legendary story that has been heard throughout the world.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'In his Preface he tells us that what he is about to publish is 'a simple chronicle, without any of the embellishments of romance, and calculated only to record what actually took place'. He adds that his object in publishing it is 'not that it may be an edifying tale, but simply that it may be preserved for posterity'.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
The following conversation is merely a record of the events, with no intention to discuss personal feelings. It is devoid of any malicious gossip or slander. I am merely copying it from the beginning to the end, passing on the legendary tale.

The following conversation is merely a record of the events, with no intention to discuss personal feelings. It is devoid of any malicious gossip or slander. I am merely copying it from the beginning to the end, passing on the legendary tale.

Observing that the contents of the letter were already known in their entirety, he saw no point in reciting them to the Lady Wang, and merely copied out the contents, word for word, in a small book, leaving out the names of the principal characters, so that future generations might read about this extraordinary romance and learn from it the devastating effects of unrequited love.

chinese: 你身上中的毒，旁人没解药，我终究是有的。 小娃娃，你到底是受了谁的指使，想这计策来弄瞎我眼睛？
english: Now then, no one else has an antidote for this poison but me, so why don't you be a good little boy and tell me who you are working for? Who was it that put you up to blinding me?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Your poison is inside of you. No one can help you; I have my own way of doing it. Little girl, what’s the plan that you’re trying to use on me?
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): There is no antidote for what is有毒。 I shall have to take the blame for that. But I've got to be extra careful, though,因为我 isn't after the advice of any master. I'm after a little man who has done this sort of thing before: Take him as wide a canvas as you can possibly imagine, and try to deal him a serious blow, because if he's as stupid as thelittle one seems to think, he must be thinking of some big shot of metal.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The poison in your body can be cured by someone else, but I have mine. The child, what did you do with the plan to blind me?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): You're lucky that there's still still a bit of my poison left; but you've got the wrong idea about me. I used to have a business dealing in poisons, but that's all over now. It was no use trying to make a living out of deceiving people, has it? Because of what you're doing to me, you think you've got to be told where to put their eyes.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The poison within you has no antidote for others, but I do have one. Little child, who has ordered you to use this scheme to blind my eyes?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The poison you were poisoned with was rare and expensive; so rare and so expensive that there's probably no one else in the whole world who's got a cure for it except me. So who the devil do you think you are, coming along with your little plot to make me go blind?
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: You have poison within you, and no one can cure it. Who are you working for and why do you want to deceive me with this scheme?</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: But I know there's no antidote for what's in my body, and you can't be planning all this to make my eyes go blind. Who put you up to it?
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The poison on you, others don't have an antidote, I still have some. Little doll, who is it that has manipulated you to blind my eyes with this scheme?

The poison in your body that the other doctors couldn't cure I can. And as for blindness, there's a cure for that, too. Now tell me, little darling, who it was that sent you to me to be made a fool of?

chinese: 一家四口，以务农为业。 因狗儿白日间自作些生计，刘氏又操井臼等事，青板姊弟两个无人照管，狗儿遂将岳母刘老老接来，一处过活。
english: The four of them depended on agriculture for their living, and since, with Gou-er himself busy most of the day on the land and his wife busy about the farm drawing water, pounding grain, and the like, there was no one to look after Qing-er and her little brother, Gou-er invited his mother-in-law, old Grannie Liu, to come and live with them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: A family of four, farming as a livelihood. Because of Tuan's dog who sleeps during the day, Liu's household has been engaged in various activities like making well-draining wells or digging wells, while Tuan and her two younger sisters have been unable to look after their mother-in-law, Tuan's grandmother, due to lack of supervision.

The dog then brought his grandmother, Miao’s mother, over to live with them.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The father of the family was a full-time farmer; his occupation was mainly家务。 The mother was called Nannie, as were her two granddaughters. unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: A family of four, living by farming. As Hairy Dog managed to earn some income during the day, Lady Liu, who also handled household chores like fetching water and grinding rice, had no one to look after the two siblings, Hairy Dog's niece and nephew. Thus, Hairy Dog invited his mother-in-law, Old Lady Liu, to come live with them, so they could all live together.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): They earned their living by farming, but Gou-er had to devote himself to finding evening employment, while his wife, Liu-shi, tended the household chores and the garden, so that the two girls could not keep together without constant supervision. Consequently he was obliged to invite his mother-in-law, Grannie Liu, to live with them.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: One family of four, with a man and woman, worked as farmers. The woman would take care of the household chores during the day, while the man would go out to make a living. The two older siblings were left to take care of themselves, and so the dog took their grandmother, Liu Laolao, under its care, and they all lived together.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: A man and his three children relying entirely on agriculture for their living, and as Gou-er was obliged to go out during the day-time to earn a livelihood, and as his wife was occupied in scoursing the village for paunches and other offal, there was no one to look after the two younger boys, and so he decided that he would take Grandmother Liu in and make her his wife.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: A family of four, engaged in farming. The dog would earn a living by itself during the day, while the Lius also tended to the fields and other tasks. The two older siblings were left unattended. The dog eventually brought the grandmother-in-law, Liu Lao Lao, over, and they lived together.

The Jias were a fairly large family, and Cousin Gou-er, who was their eldest son, had taken it upon himself to support them all by working on his father's farm. He had therefore no time to spare, and had entrusted the management of his grandmother's property to his younger brother Qian-bian and his sister Liu-shi, who, being adults, were capable of looking after it.

chinese: 总舵主一言不发的听完，点头道：“原来如此。
english: The Helmsman listened to all that Trinket had to say without making a single interruption. When at last Trinket had finished, he nodded. 'I see.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The captain remained silent as he listened. He nodded his head, "That's right."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The Helmsman listened carefully to what Old Gan had to say and then nodded. 'It makes sense . . .'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The chief captain listened silently, nodded and said, "It makes sense."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The Helmsman listened in silence. 'Clearly,' he said, nodding, 'I see.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The leader listened without a word, then nodded, saying, "So it is."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The Helmsman said nothing, but listened intently. Then he nodded. 'So that's how it is.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The overall captain listened silently and nodded his head, indicating that he understood.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The Helmsman listened attentively while Trinket spoke, and then nodded. 'I see.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Understood. (Nodding in agreement) "So that's clear."
The Helmsman nodded silently. 'I see.

chinese: 我抬举起你来，这会子我来了，你大模厮样儿的躺在炕上，见了我也不理一理儿。
english: After all I've done for you – and now when I come to call on you, you lie back there on the kang like a young madam and haven't even the grace to look up and take notice of me! You and your airs and graces!
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: I lifted you up for you, now I'll be here; you're looking at me like that, not giving a damn.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It's my turn then. I'll be there tonight, therefore I will take you as you are, lying on the kang like a dandy.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I raised you up, and now I have come; you lay on the bed as if not knowing me at all, ignoring me.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I can carry you wherever you are. Now I'm here, and you're snoring the way you are! Not a word, or a nod of recognition, to greet me with!
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: I raised you up, and now that I'm here, you're just lying there all big and important on the炕, ignoring me completely.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): When I lifted you up, you were such a smart-looking thing, but now that I've come again you just lie there without saying a word.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: I picked you up and came here. You are lying on the bed, looking like a big baby, and you don't even acknowledge me when I'm here.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: I lifted you up just now. You lay there on the kang, not even bothering to say hello.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: I lifted you up, here I am, you lying there like a hooligan on the bed, not even acknowledging me when you saw me.
I'll pick you up myself this minute. You can lie there on the kang looking as if you don't even see me, if you like.
