chinese: 天也晚了，不虚留你们了，到家该问好的都问个好儿罢。”
english: It's late now, so I won't try to keep you. Give our regards to everybody who ought to be remembered when you get back!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The night was getting late, so we ought not to leave you. You should say "How well have you done" when asking good things of those who have already asked for them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It's not if things don't get done. We'll leave it unaccomplished for the time being so that you can go home and do what you want with your best fried in the land.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It's getting late, so I won't stay here any longer. Just say hello to those who should be greeted at home."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It is getting dark. I don't want to keep you all waiting. When you get home you can shake each other's hands and say 'Good evening'/'Good night'.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: It's getting late, so I won't force you to stay any longer. When you get home, greet everyone properly."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): It is getting late, too. We can't virtualy entertain you much longer. But if you have any friends or relations to ask after, you had better now mention them and go.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Goodbye, it's getting late, don't stay any longer. When you get home, be sure to ask how everyone is doing."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: It's getting late, so I'll be getting off now. But before I go, I'd like to say goodnight to everyone.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The day is late, I won't keep you waiting any longer. Those at home that I should greet, let me greet them properly."
It's getting on in the evening, and I must not keep you. But before you go, I want you to know how much I appreciate your visit.'

chinese: 他顾不上伤痛，急忙地、讨好似的回答：“有，有，有。”
english: Ignoring his pain, he eagerly and ingratiatingly replied, 'Yes yes yes.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He did not even consider his injuries and rushed to make a good impression: "Yes, yes, yes."
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): All he could think about was vengeance. So he flashed a promisingly happy-face answer: 'Yes, ma'am.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He couldn't afford to worry about his wounds, so he quickly and charmingly replied: "Yes, yes, there is."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He answered hurriedly, "Yes, I do. . . . Yes, I do. . . . Yes, I do.'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He was too distracted by his pain to notice it, hurriedly and obsequiously replying, "Yes, yes, yes."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Painful though he was, he hurried to comply with their demand, eager to please. 'Yes, yes, there is.'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He didn't pay attention to his pain and hastily responded with an eager tone, "Yes, yes, yes."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He didn't feel the pain; he answered hurriedly, as if trying to please someone. 'Yes, yes, yes.'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He replied hurriedly and in a conciliatory manner: "Yes, yes, yes."
He didn't want to admit weakness, and answered in the most obsequious tones possible: 'Yes, yes, yes.'

chinese: 陈清扬在我的草房里时，裸臂赤腿穿一件白大褂，和她在山上那间医务室里装束一样。
english: As Chen Qingyang sat in my thatched shack and poured out her troubles, she had on a white smock that left her arms and legs exposed, the same outfit she had worn earlier in her clinic.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: When I was in my tent with Chen Qingyang, I wore a white robe over my bare arm and leg, just as she did in her hospital room.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When Chen Qingyang was in my thatched hut, she wore a white smock over her arms and legs, as she had done when we were on the mountain.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: When Chen Qingyang was staying with me, she wore a white coat without sleeves or legs and her hair loose, as if she were in the medical room on top of the mountain.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): During the time Chen Qingyang stayed with my thatched hut, she wore a white smock like the one she wore in the clinic, even though she didn't provide medical care.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: When Chen Qingyang was in my shack, she wore a white lab coat with bare arms and legs, just as she did in the clinic on the mountain.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): When Chen Qingyang was staying in my thatched hut, she came bare-armed and bare-legged, wearing only a white smock, just like in the clinic on the mountain.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Chen Qingyang was in my room wearing a white robe with bare arms and legs, just like she did in the clinic on the mountain.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: When Chen Qingyang was naked to the waist and wore only a white smock, she looked just like the nurse in the mountain clinic.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Chen Qingyang was in my study room wearing a white robe, bare-armed and bare-legged, similar to how he was dressed in the medical room on the mountain with her.
When Chen Qingyang stayed with me in my thatched hut, she wore nothing on her upper body, only a white smock down below. That was how she was dressed in the clinic on the mountain, too.

chinese: 大爷说，“心急喝不得热粘粥。”
english: Greedy eaters never get the hot gruel.'

gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Grandpa said, "One can't drink hot congee in a hurry."
The doctor says I can't drink anything hot until my fever's down.'

chinese: 这种弥漫全宇宙的残留背景辐射，在厘米波段上是可以观测到的。

chinese: 有那么多的矢车菊，在杂草中高扬着细长的茎，开着紫、蓝、粉、白四色花。

chinese: 大江南北，见闻所及，不但读书人反对鞑子，而贩夫走卒、屠沽市井之中，也到处有热血满腔的豪杰。
english: And wherever I've been, north or south of the River, I've discovered that it isn't only among educated people like ourselves that resistance to the Tartars is to be found. Many of our most ardent patriots are small tradesmen, Yamen runners, or market folk—people belonging to the very lowest ranks of society.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Across China and beyond, the world is a vast place where not only scholars oppose the Qing dynasty, but also people from all walks of life, including street vendors and petty merchants, show their passion for fighting for their country.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As far as I could detect, even among the educated not only the sailors and prospection who sold their goods on the rivers and the common lad who took it upon himself to be a butcher or a marketham would have seen鲜红的血淋漓地从指缝流下来。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: In the north and south, wherever one travels, not only do bookish men oppose the Tartars, but also everywhere there are heroes of the bloodthirsty common folk, the street peddlers, and the market vendors.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): From north to south, as his travels took him everywhere, he found everywhere a fellow-countryman who, with whatever means at his disposal, opposed the Tartars; some high and noble, others common and humble, heroes of extraordinary courage.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: From north to south of the great river, in all that I have seen, it wasn't just scholars who opposed the Tartars, but also common folk, street vendors, butchers, and market traders, all full of passionate blood.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): In the South and the North, wherever men's feet have trod and ears have heard, there are men full of blood and ready to fight against the Tartars, whether or not they are scholars or members of the cultivated classes— even the vendors in the street, the butchers and grocers' employees, have been known to show their patriotic fervour.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: In the south and north, news of the rebellion had spread far and wide, and not only scholars opposed the Mongol rule, but even ordinary people like merchants, traders, and butchers in the marketplaces were filled with passionate indignation.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'How many times have we heard of brave heroes drenched in blood shedding it freely in the streets and marketplaces, and of bandits and slaves who, ignorant of reading and writing, have shown more courage than our so-called scholars, merely because their passion was roused by the wrongs of their oppressed country!
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: South-north broad, heard of all, not only scholars oppose the Qin, but merchants and soldiers also, in the marketplace, have hot-blooded heroes everywhere.

The story of the Great Wall and the Tartars is known far and wide. Not only the scholars but every merchant and artisan in the city has heard of it. Hot-blooded heroes like us are to be found everywhere.

chinese: 现在，三十九号住进一个王琦瑶，不由她又惊又喜，还使她有同病相怜之感。
english: She was therefore delighted to see another woman similarly out of place moving into no. 39.

chinese: 士隐因说道：“适闻仙师所谈因果，实人世罕闻者；但弟子愚拙，不能洞悉明白。
english: 'It is not often that one has the opportunity of listening to a discussion of the operations of karma such as the one I have just been privileged to overhear,'said Shi-yin. unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'I heard the holy man speaking just now about the theory that nothing is caused but seems to cause itself,'said Shi-yin. 'It's very interesting, but I'm afraid I didn't quite follow all he was saying.

chinese: 上海弄堂里的做人，是悉心悉意，全神贯注的做人，眼睛只盯着自己，没有旁骛的。

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): People who live in Shanghai's longtang put their full hearts into everything they do. They focus all their attention on themselves and have no use for distractions.

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: In the Shanghai alleyways, people are devoted to their work, fully focused and intent on their tasks. They don't look around or get distracted.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: In the longtang of Shanghai, people lived with their eyes fixed on their own goals, never once looking aside.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The behavior in the Shanghai alley is meticulous, with full attention and complete focus. The gaze is solely on oneself, without any distractions.
People in the Shanghai longtang live with their whole hearts and minds. They have no time for nonsense; their eyes are on themselves and themselves alone.

chinese: 兄弟和梨洲兄推想，这次‘明史’一案所以如此大张旗鼓，雷厉风行，当是鳌拜意欲挫折我江南士人之气。”

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: The group of dogs scattered in a frenzy, sitting far away and howling mournfully, greedily staring at the corpse.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The pack scattered in pursuit of their prey, snarling obscenely as they devoured the corpse.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Dogs gathered and dispersed, sitting far away, wailing and howling, greedily gazing at the corpse.
The pack broke up, each dog going his own way, but keeping a safe distance from the corpse, which they stared at with greedy eyes.

english: 'I'm with Hai Goong-goong.'

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I've got an old eunuch problem.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaoping said, "I'm with Captain Hai."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I've got to see Old Hai.'

With the Old Devil.'

chinese: 平安里的夜晚其实也是有许多想头的，只不过没有王琦瑶窗帘上的大花朵，映显不出来罢了。 许多想头都是沉在心底，沉渣一般。 全是叫生计熬炼的，挤干汁，沥干水，凝结成块，怎么样的激荡也泛不起来。
english: There was a great deal of thinking going on around Peace Lane, but much of it, like sediment, had sunk to the bottom of people's hearts, all the juice squeezed out of them, so that they had solidified and could no longer be stirred up.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The night of Peace Village is also full of desires, but it does not have the large flower curtains on Wang Qian'er’s curtains. That just makes it look like she has no desire at all. Many desires are hidden deep inside, they are like a thick layer that can’t be squeezed out.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In fact, late at night in Peace Lane there is not a single intriguing prospect in sight, except for Wang Qiyao's windowless room, whose flowers on her door have dried up. Many of them sink deep into one's soul and are eliminated by the sanding machine, where they evaporate like steam.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There is also much to think about in Peaceful Street at night, but it cannot be seen because there is no big flower on the curtains of Wang Qiyue's house. Many thoughts are buried deep in one's heart, like silt. They are all forced by life to survive and grind down until they become a solid block. How could anything so turbulent come up?
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Underneath the tranquil surface of Peace Lane, however, one has as many thoughts as Wang Qiyao's, which simply cannot be brought to the fore because of the thick layer of sediment that has accumulated. Such thoughts sink to the bottom of her heart, to be brewed into something strong through the exertions of real-life chores and demands.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The nights in Peaceful Lane indeed held many possibilities, though not as vivid as the large flowers on Wang Qiyao's curtains. Many of these possibilities lay hidden deep within, like sediment. They were all shaped by the struggle of survival, squeezed dry, drained, and coagulated into a solid form; no amount of turmoil could bring them to the surface.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Underneath the quiet of those平安里夜晚其实 also reside many desires, though not the blossoms on Wang Qiyao's curtains; the exertions required to survive seem to extract all the fluidity from life, compressing it into a form in which individual desires sink to the bottom and dissolve into a thick sludge.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: In the peaceful nights, there are many thoughts that exist, but they do not appear on the big flowered curtains of Wang Qiuyao's window. Many of these thoughts are like sediment that settle at the bottom of the heart, and no matter how much they are stirred, they cannot be released. They are the result of enduring hardships and struggles, and have become hardened and concentrated over time.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Peace Lane at night is also the scene of many an adventure, but the blossoms on Wang Qiyao's curtains do not always catch the light. Many of her adventures sink to the bottom of her heart, where they settle like sand at the bottom of a jar. Through the long process of making a living, all the juice is squeezed out, leaving behind only the concentrated essence; no amount of stimulation can make it respond.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The night in Ping'an is indeed filled with many worries, but they are not as vivid as the large flowers on Wang Jiaoyao's window curtains. They are mostly buried deep within, like sludge. They are all about struggling to make ends meet, squeezing out juice, draining water, solidifying into lumps, but they cannot boil up in any way.

Under the cover of darkness, Peace Lane is alive with all kinds of speculation; but without the large flowers on the curtains, these rumors and gossip remain hidden. Most of the gossip is subterranean, like sediment at the bottom of a pot, from which no stirring up of the liquid can produce any result.

chinese: 这种弄堂的房屋看上去是鳞次栉比，挤挤挨挨，灯光是如豆的一点一点，虽然微弱，却是稠密，一锅粥似的。
english: Apartment structures are built virtually on top of one another, cheek by jowl, breathing down upon each other's necks. Their lights are like tiny glowing peas, not very bright, but dense as a pot of pea porridge.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: These shophouses look like they're clustered together, crowded together, with lights so faint that they're barely visible; yet they're dense, as if a soup was boiling.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The longtang buildings appear to be packed tightly onto each other, with dots of light seeming to slithereardrops of paint on tiny grains of light. Like bowls and crocks holding as many beans, the lighting is sparse even though it is abundant.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The houses of this narrow lane look like they're a jumble, crammed together and lit up by flickering lights that are barely visible, yet dense enough to seem like a pot of soup.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): On the surface, these longtang appear to be a mess, with buildings of different sizes and shapes crammed together, their dim lights giving off a vague glow.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The houses in such alleys are packed like fish in a barrel, crammed together tightly. The lights are dim, like tiny beans, though feeble, they are dense, resembling a pot of porridge.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): At first glance these longtang seem to be comprised of buildings that grow up next to each other in a crowded pattern, illuminated by a multitude of dim lights scattered about like bean-size dots, thick and dense like the grains in a pot of porridge.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: This house looks like a row of closely packed buildings, with the lights dimly flickering like a tiny speck of dust. Although they are weak, they are dense, like a pot of thick soup.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The buildings look crowded and cramped from the outside, the lights flickering like fireflies, yet dazzlingly bright, like a pot of boiling soup.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: This type of courtyard house appears to be a jumbled comparison to a comb, tightly packed and closely spaced. The light is like scattered beans, although weak, it is dense, resembling a pot of porridge.

The longtang in the Shanghai neighborhoods appear to have been built haphazardly, with buildings so close together that they seem to be leaning in on one another. The illumination from the windows is like tiny dots, so weak that one might think it insignificant—but when placed together, these dots form a thick soup of light.

chinese: 薛蟠道：“要不是，我也不敢惊动：只因下月初三日，是我的生日，谁知老胡和老程他们，不知那里寻了来的：这么粗，这么长，粉脆的鲜藕；这么大的西瓜；这么长，这么大的暹罗国进贡的灵柏香熏的暹罗猪、鱼。
english: 'Look,' said Xue Pan. 'I wouldn't have troubled you otherwise, only it's my birthday on the third of next month and old Hu and old Cheng and a couple of the others, I don't know where they got them from but they've given me: a piece of fresh lotus root, ever so crisp and crunchy, as thick as that, look, and as long as that; a huge great melon, look, as big as that; a freshly-caught sturgeon as big as that; and a cypress-smoked Siamese sucking-pig as big as that that came in the tribute from Siam.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Peng Ben said that he would not have dared to disturb him if it were not for his birthday: because on the 3rd of January, it was my birthday, but I did not know where they had come from. It was quite coarse, long, and so soft; it was a large fresh pumpkin; it was so big that it resembled a giant fish.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I'm afraid I couldn't manage it on my own,' said Bao-yu, 'because by the time the month's end there must have been already gone over half a dozen or more corsages and several hundred flowers for him to choose from. They would have cost quite a lot of money, and besides he doesn't seem to have got these from anyone ordinary; he must have gotten them from some experienced people.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wang Xiaopan said, "I wouldn't have done it if I hadn't been ordered to." He had only dared to do so because the day before last was his birthday, and he happened to meet some people who were not very familiar with him: a big, long, fragrant lotus root; a large watermelon; a pig and fish that were sent by the Siamese court as a gift of respect.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I wouldn't have asked for help if I didn't need to, but it's my birthday on the threerd of the following month and so when I found a fucking thick one down at Uncle Hu's place and a really fucking nice, really fucking long one at Great-Granddad's, I was a bit worried they'd all been brought in by some old chum of theirs who goes hopping all over the place like,' said Trinket. 'And what did I find when I cut open the fucking thing? A fucking big, fucking nice, fucking Hmong pork buns and a fucking big fucking Siam elephant-scented pineapple!
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Xue Pan said, "If it wasn't, I wouldn't have dared to disturb you: only because on the third day of the first lunar month, it was my birthday. Who knew that Old Hu and Old Cheng found such things from who knows where: so thick, so long, fresh lotus root; such large watermelons; such long, such large Siamese tribute of fragrant cypress wood-smoked Siamese pigs and fish."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): I'm sure I wouldn't dream of troubling you if it wasn't for the reason that it falls on the third of the first month tomorrow that my birthday is to be celebrated,' said Xue Pan. 'I was wondering where they could have got all these things from: this nice, fresh, crisp water-atom, for example; and this large, perfectly round watermelon; and these long, thin, aromatic rosewood pigs and fish from the Siamese Court.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Ah, I wouldn't dare to disturb them. It's because next month on the third day, it's my birthday. Who knew that old Hu and old Chen found these things somewhere? They're so thick, so long, and so crispy. And these are such big watermelons. They're so big, and they're from Siam. And these are such long, fragrant Siamese incense sticks. They must have come from Siam. And these are such big, smoky Siamese pigs and fish."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'I hadn't,'said Whiskers. 'But it is my birthday, the third of the first month. And how do you think Hu and Cheng and the others got all this stuff? There's so much of it! And it's all so excellent! There are the Alouatte ginger-infused Borneo pork and the Alouatte honeydew melons, and the Tibetans' Borneo pepperkins...
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-:
Xuanzong Dao: "Perhaps I wouldn't dare to disturb: only because the third day of next month is my birthday, who knew that Old Hu and Old Chen came from afar: so coarse, so long, fragile and pink lotus; so big the watermelon; so long, so big the Xiaoxia brocade from Xiping tribute of spirit tree incense-infused Xiaoxia pig, fish."

Translation: Xuanzong Dao: "Perhaps I wouldn't dare to disturb, as it's my birthday next month. I didn't expect Old Hu and Old Chen to come from afar. They brought such coarse, long, fragile, pink lotus; such a big watermelon; such long, big Xiaoxia brocade from Xiping tribute, infused with spirit tree incense, for pigs and fish."
If I hadn't been born on the third of the next month, I shouldn't have been worried about offending them by refusing, but as it is my birthday, I thought it wouldn't do to offend them by refusing.

chinese: 麻雀肉味鲜美，营养丰富。
english: They were delicious.

gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Crow meat tastes delicious and is nutritious.
It tastes delicious,' said the doctor. 'And very nutritious.

chinese: 为此她没少发牢骚，严先生枕头上也立下千般愿，万般誓，不料公私合营，产业都归了国家，能保住一处私房就是天恩地恩，花园洋房终成泡影。
english: In response to her complaints, he had, in bed, promised many times to move them to a house with a garden. Now that their assets were controlled by the government, they felt lucky simply to be allowed to keep their house.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: For her part, she had complained a lot about Mr. Chen’s bed, but Mr. Chen also left behind countless wishes for her, all of which were not fulfilled by the state-owned enterprise and the real estate industry. The end result was that she could no longer secure one private house as God’s favor or heaven’s grace.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): For her part, she had made a big mess while taking over the business; Mr. Yan,枕上百般愿意，眠中万般眷恋，终于只成一句:「恩恩，当地政府分给我们的这笔巨款，我已向天报到了，恳请皇上立即发赈，将这处我们各自所有但共建不造的私人花园弄平，新建一栋为国尽忠、为士子耕种的豪华大宅！」
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: For this, she had been complaining incessantly, and Mr. Yan had pledged his thousand words and ten thousand vows on the pillow that all private property would be taken over by the state, and that even if he could save a private house, it was as if heaven and earth were gifting him with such a privilege. The garden villa turned out to be nothing but a dream.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Madame was furious. And Mr. Yan made a thousand promises and oaths that he would never allow their home to be nationalized, but then state-run enterprise became reality and the answer was no to her request for a apartment in the backyard.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: For this, she had complained endlessly, and Mr. Yan had made countless vows and oaths on his pillow. But when the private businesses were consolidated into state enterprises, all their properties were seized by the state. It was considered divine grace to be able to keep even one private house intact. The dream of a garden villa finally turned out to be just a bubble.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): For this reason, she had often complained, while her husband solemnly pledged himself to her in front of the wedding pillow only to break his promises when, nationalization came along and the government took away all their property except a single townhouse which, thanks to divine intervention, was the now-garden apartment they had dreamed of.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: She grumbled incessantly, and even her husband's pillow had thousands of promises written on it. But despite their joint efforts, their business ended up being nationalized, and they could only keep a small private room. The garden villa became a mirage.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: For this she had plenty to be grateful for, and Mr. Yan, resting his head on hers, made all kinds of vows and pledges, promising with equal zeal to repay her kindness with his own. Never, he vowed, would he allow the state to take over their joint enterprise; he would fight to the death to keep their private property safe. In the end, however, it was the state that got everything. The fruit of their joint venture became a mirage, the mansion and garden a vanished dream.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: For this, she didn't lack flirtatious remarks, Zhang Laoshi also placed countless wishes and vows on his pillow, unexpectedly, public and private enterprises merged, all industries fell into the hands of the state. Keeping one private property was considered a blessing from heaven and earth, the garden villa eventually became a fleeting shadow.

Consequently she was not slow in making up her mind what to do, and by the time that Mr. Yan had got used to his new bed, he had already drawn up a thousand and one plans for their future life together. However, the merger of public and private enterprise into a single state-run industry had left no room for a private household like theirs, and the beautiful garden mansion had gone the way of all such enterprises—into oblivion.

chinese: 程先生笑了：我当然明白的。
english: Mr. Cheng laughed, 'Of course I do.'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Mr. Cheng smiled: I understood it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Mr. Cheng laughed. 'Of course I understood.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Mr Cheng smiled: Of course I understand.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I understand that very well, Mr. Cheng,' Mr. Chang said with a smile.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Mr. Cheng smiled: Of course I understand.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Mr. Cheng laughed. 'I know that much already.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Mr. Chen smiled: "I understand."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Mr. Cheng laughed. 'Of course he did.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Mr. Chen laughed: Of course I understand.
I wouldn't have guessed that you would have needed me to explain it to you,' said Mr. Cheng, laughing.

chinese: 韦小宝一鼓作气的走来，身上的疼痛倒也可以耐得，给蕊初这么一问，只觉得全身筋骨无处不痛，忍不住哼了一声。
english: The effort of getting to this appointment had absorbed so much of his attention that it had almost taken his mind off the pain; but as soon as she asked the question he became aware that he was hurting dreadfully all over and groaned in spite of himself.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: With a wave of his arms, Wang Xiaobang came forward with a burst of energy, and he could bear the pain that was on his body as well. To ask Lu Xianxiao this question, all of his body's muscles were in pain. He couldn't help but laugh when he heard her reply.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket came running over, injured arm still at his side. He could bear the pain; but when he asked Blossom how she was, he only found himself smiling uneasily because of the agony in his body.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Wu Xiaohong came walking towards him, his pain could bear. To the question of Rui Chu, he felt that every part of his body was in agony and couldn’t help but let out a cry.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket hurried over the as much as he could. He had the strength, he thought, to withstand the pain if he did, but when Blossom asked him what it was, all over his body seemed to go churning, and he cried out in agony.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: As Wei Xiaobao made his way forward with a burst of energy, the pain on his body was somewhat tolerable. However, upon being asked by Rui Chou, he felt a pain in every bone and muscle throughout his body, and he couldn't help but let out a sigh.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Trinket had covered a considerable distance on foot, and though the pain in his side was bearable, the answer to Blossom's question seemed to affect every bone and sinew in his body and he winced uncontrollably.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Wu Xiaobao took a deep breath and walked towards him, ignoring the pain in his body. He asked Qin Ersheng, "How are you feeling?" Only then did he realize that his entire body was aching and he couldn't help but let out a groan.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Trinket summoned up enough strength to stand up, and in so doing seemed to have driven all the pain from his joints to the surface of his skin, for he gasped as the contraction of the muscles caused every nerve to tingle.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Wei Xiaobao walked over with determination, enduring the pain on his body. When he asked Liu Qi for something, he felt every bone in his body ached, and he couldn't help but let out a sigh.
Trinket pressed on, forcing himself to ignore the pain. 'I'm fine,' he said. 'What's wrong with me?'

chinese: 看了心里有点欢喜，还有点起腻。 因她们站得远，听不见那里在说什么，只见有一个穿睡袍的女人躺在床上，躺了几种姿势，一回是侧身，一回是仰天，还有一回只躺了半个身子，另半个身子垂到地上的。 她的半透明的睡袍裹着身子，床已经皱了，也是有点起腻的。
english: Standing there watching they were quite excited, but at the same time irritated because they were too far away to hear what was being said on set. All they could see was a woman in a sheer nightgown lying on a bed with wrinkled sheets. She tried to lie in several different positions; on her side one moment, on her back the next, and for a while even in a strange position where half her body extended off the bed onto the floor. All this became somewhat boring.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: I had a bit of joy at first glance but also some unease. For these women stood so far away, they could not hear what was said there, and there was a woman wearing a sleeping robe who lay on several different positions. She was lying sideways, bent over, and then she was leaning against the wall. Another one lay facing the wall with her legs stretched out flat, while the other half of her body was hanging off the ground. The half-hidden sleepwear was covering her body. The bed was wrinkled as well. It was a little too much for me to stand in front of.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sight of them standing outside the curtain made its way inside her heart a little, even though all she could see was the direction in which they were lying. They were a couplee, on their side, with a bed already set up; another was on her back, stretched out on her hands and knees; and a third, one of the women guessed, had somehow rearranged herself so that her body was tilted towards the headboard and that she was lying on her back with her legs over the edge of the room—a single sheet covering nothing but her shoulders. The last picture showed her body completely outside of the sheet, showing clearly how it was beginning to show age.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: There was a little happiness and a little boredom in my heart as I read this, for they were standing too far away to hear what was being said there, so all I could see was one woman lying on her bed, laying in various positions, first with her back turned, then with her face up, and the other time only half of her body was laid down while the other half was hanging down to the ground. Her transparent nightgown covered most of her body, and the bed was already wrinkled.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Wang Qiyao's heart averted joy was mixed with distaste. She kept at arm's length so as not to miss anything, but she couldn't help noticing how awkward they looked standing there. The one woman, wearing a transparent nightie, lay on her side; the other, on her back; and another, only the top half of her body was exposed, her legs dangling off the side of the bed. The thin, translucent nightie added nothing to her elegance; the bed was pitted with wrinkles, and the scene was a little disgusting.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The sight stirred a mix of pleasure and weariness within me. The distance between us prevented me from hearing their conversation, but I could see a woman in a see-through robe lying on a bed, changing positions repeatedly. She lay on her side, then facing upwards, and once half her body was stretched out while the other half hung down. Her translucent robe clung to her body, causing the bed to wrinkle slightly, which was also somewhat off-putting.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): He felt a twinge of something when he saw this woman lying in different positions on the bed—perhaps lust, perhaps aversion. The other two could not hear what was being said but could see a woman in a nightgown lying on the bed. They saw her change positions several times: once on her side, another time facing up, then almost all the way up to her waist, the other half of her body hanging down. The see the transparent nightgown clinging to her body, the bed protesting against the pressure of her weight—a scene that, like the sounds from the studio, somewhat bored her.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Looking at her, I felt a bit happy, but also a bit uneasy. Because they were far away, I couldn't hear what they were saying, but I could see a woman lying on the bed, posing in different ways. She lay on her side, then on her back, and once with only half her body lying on the bed, with the other half hanging down. Her semi-transparent sleepwear was wrapped around her body, and the bed was wrinkled, with a bit of an uneasy feeling.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Wu Peizhen felt a strange sense of disgust. She was too far away to hear what they were saying, but could make out that the woman in the doorway was lying on the bed, alone, in a state of extreme relaxation, the transparent garment she had on clinging tightly to her body. The sheet under her had become rumpled and dirty.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: I felt a little joy in my heart, yet a bit tired. Since they were far away, I couldn't hear what they were saying, only seeing a woman in a nightgown lying on the bed, trying various poses, one was lying on her side, another was looking up to the ceiling, and there was also one where only half her body was on the bed, the other half hanging down to the floor. Her semi-transparent nightgown wrapped her body, and the bed was wrinkled, also a bit tired-looking.

But at the same time she was a bit bored, since they were so far away that she could not make out what they were saying. She could, however, see a woman lying on the bed. The woman slept in various positions: first on her side, then looking up at the ceiling, and finally with half her body on the bed and the other half hanging over the side. The woman was wearing a transparent smock, and the bedsheets were all wrinkled, as if the woman had slept there many times before.

chinese: 自己又不尊重，要往下流里走，安着坏心，还只怨人家偏心呢。

chinese: 陈清扬也是这么解释的，可是那女孩说，我可以把精液放到试管里，寄到云南让陈清扬人工授精。

chinese: 它就像箱底的旧衣服一样，好是好，可是错过了年头，披挂上身，一看就是个陈年累月的人，所以它还是给王琦瑶添旧的。
english: It was like the old clothes at the bottom of her chest: though many were still in good shape, wearing them only made her look older, because they were from the wrong era.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: It is like a worn-out garment on the bottom of a box, good enough, but it was missed by the end of its year, so it was a person who had been wearing it for years. Therefore, it still added to Ouija's old clothes.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She was like the old clothes beneath her bed: good only because she missed year after year of sunshine, which gave rise to a pile of winter clothes overlooking Wang Qiyao; therefore it still added to her wardrobe.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It was like a piece of old clothes that had been worn out and thrown away, but since it looked good, Wang Yige still wanted to give it to Hwang Yingyue.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Like worn-out clothes found at the bottom of the chest, they were certainly attractive; but they lacked freshness, and wearing them made people think that the individual wearing them had been a spent asset, which was why Wang Qiyao was gradually turned into an antique.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: It was like an old garment at the bottom of a trunk, decent enough but too late in the season to wear. Once put on, it made one look as if they had been around for a long time. Thus, it merely added to the aged appearance that Wang Qiaoyao already had.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): It was like an old garment tucked away in the drawer: still in good condition, but now worn-out and dated, it could only serve to emphasize the age and experience of the wearer.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: It is like an old box of clothes, even though it's good, it's been worn for years and has become outdated. It's obvious that it's been worn for a long time, so it adds to Wang Qiuxiao's aged appearance.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Like a pile of old clothes in the bottom of a trunk, her reputation preceded her; even if it was in good shape, the years had already worn it out. Worn it to a man who would appreciate it, like Wang Qiyao's father, and it would look old and well-worn, but on a man like Wang Qiyao it would only add to her age.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: It's like old clothes at the bottom of a box, good or not, but it's missed its time. Worn on the body, it immediately makes one look like an old relic. Therefore, it was given to Wang Jiaxiao as an old item.

Like a pair of worn-out pants at the bottom of a trunk, her beauty was still there, but it was past its prime. When she put it on, she looked like an old woman, but that was exactly what Wang Qiyao needed—something old.

chinese: 佳蕙点头，想了一会道：“可也怨不得你。
english: Melilot shook her head sympathetically. 'I can't say I really blame you,' she said.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Ji Hua nodded, thinking for a while before saying, “It’s also not your fault.”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Misty nodded. 'Yes, I suppose that's because she's always been the one who takes the blame.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Jia Hu nodded and thought for a moment, "It can't be helped."
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Little Melilot nodded, thought for a moment, and then said: 'It couldn't have been all bad, could it?
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Jia Hui nodded and said after some thought, "It's not your fault either."
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Melilot nodded and after a moment's consideration said: 'I can see why they should be upset.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Ah, I understand. You are right. I should not blame you for this."</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Melilot nodded. After a moment she said: 'Well, you can't really complain...
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Jane nodded and said after a moment: "I can't blame you either."
Little Melilot nodded, and after a pause added: 'I shouldn't mind being your wife, if you would have me.

chinese: 凤姐道：“碰坏一点儿，你可仔细你的皮！”
english: 'If it's the tiniest bit chipped,' said Xi-feng, 'I'll have the hide off you!'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Feng Xiaogang said with a smile: “If you break it, take care of your skin!”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Not a bit,' said Xi-feng钳工的活儿都得亲自加工出手的。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Feng Jie said, "Don't be careless about it! Look after your skin!"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): If you've done any breaking, Miss Wang, I shall have real fun!'
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Ning Jing said, "If you damage it even a little bit, watch out for your skin!"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): If you knock one of them out of joint,' said Xi-feng, 'you'll soon be having more than just your skin to worry about!'
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Phoenix Sister said: "Just bump into it a little bit, you must take care of your skin!"
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'Well, whatever happens, don't forget to look after your skin!'
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Sister Phoenix said: "If you mess up a little, you should be careful with your own skin!"
You'd better look after your skin, then,' said Xi-feng. 'It's in a terrible state.'

chinese: 六个人沿着大路行不到三里，便转入右边的一条小路。
english: The little party of six walked their horses along the road for about a mile before taking a right-hand turn into a little side-road.

unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): After walking not more than three roads, they entered a side trail.

unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Six people followed the main road for not more than three li, then turned into a small lane on the right.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: After walking no more than three miles along the main road, they turned onto a smaller one and went right at the junction.

The six travelers walked along the main road for about three miles, then turned onto a smaller path to the east.

chinese: 就在蓑衣旁边，蚯蚓在爬。

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Next to it was the gauze cover, and the mites were moving inside.

chinese: 他走到门口，便听到海老公的咳嗽之声，问道：“公公，你好些了吗？”
english: As he drew near the entrance, he heard the old fellow coughing. 'Goong-goong? Are you feeling any better?'
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He walked through the door and heard his grandfather coughing. He asked, "Grandfather, how are you?"
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As he did so, he heard Old Hai's coughing noise near him. 'Goong-goong, how are you feeling now?' his old master asked him.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He walked up to the door and heard a coughing sound coming from his grandfather, who asked, "Grandfather, how do you feel?"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When he reached the door, Old Hai's cough could be heard outside. 'How're you feeling today, Goong-goong?' he asked.

chinese: “已经了结了，你应该听说过的。”
english: 'The past is finished. You should know that.'

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): All the necessary meetings were completed and all the participants informed.'
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It's over, you should have heard about it.

chinese: 因此刘老老看不过，便劝道：“姑爷，你别嗔着我多嘴：咱们村庄人家儿，那一个不是老老实实，守着多大碗儿吃多大的饭呢!
english: Grannie Liu could eventually stomach no more of his wife-baiting and intervened on her daughter's behalf. 'Now look here, son-in-law: probably you will think me an interfering old woman; but we country folk have to be grateful for what is in the pot and cut down our appetites to the same measure.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Therefore Liu Tao is so fed up with him that he says, “Brother uncle, don’t be angry at me for being too eager: our village people do not want to talk too much; they are honest and they eat big meals because they are old and have a lot of money.”
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Please, your boy!' said Grannie Liu admonished the man. 'Look: as a child we all try our best to behave properly and stay where we live, without wasting any of the crumbs we eat.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Therefore Liu Old did not take it lightly, so he advised, "Young Master, don't be angry with me: every family in our village is honest and obedient, eating whatever they can out of a big bowl!"
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Grannie Liu intervened at this point and spoke up for her son: 'Cuncun, don't be angry! It's not that I like talking about it, but when you get to a certain age and experience some maturity, you start to realize that no matter how much you have, you have to share it with your family - just like the other people on our village estate: they don't squabble about what they've got. They make do and get on with it.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Therefore, Old Liu couldn't bear it any longer and advised, "My son-in-law, don't be angry with me for speaking out of turn: in our village, every household is honest and eats only what they can manage according to their means!"
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): That seemed to be all that was wanted, for Grannie Liu's mouth ceased moving. 'Your wife is right, sir,' she said. 'A body-servant like me has got to mind her language when she's among gentlemen. We folk in the country are not like your city folk. We don't take after our plates: we eat what's put in front of us.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: Therefore, Liu Lao Lao looked at him and said, "Don't scold me, dear. Our village folks are all honest and straightforward. They eat as much as they can afford."
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Grannie Liu, catching something of the tone, addressed a word of advice to her grandson: 'Come, Master! Don't be ungracious! We all know the sort of honest, hearty meals they bring us in this village.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Therefore, Liu Lao Lao couldn't see through it, so he advised: "Uncle, don't get angry at me for talking too much: In our village, isn't everyone not honest, eating as much as they want from a big bowl?"

Grannie Liu, offended by this sudden attack, sought to mollify him: 'Come, my dear! Let's not lose our tempers! You mustn't expect the people of this village to behave like gentlemen. They don't have any manners.

chinese: 我们在地头休息时，陈清扬拿斗笠盖住脸，敞开衬衣的领口，马上就睡着了。
english: During our break at the edge of the field, Chen Qingyang covered her face with a bamboo hat, opened her shirt collar, and immediately fell asleep.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: During our breaks at the field, Chen Qingyuan covered his face with a hat while opening the sleeves of his shirt. He instantly fell asleep.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When we sat down to rest on the farm, Chen Qingyang covered her face with the rain cap and opened the hem of her shirt to sleep immediately.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: When we rested at the base of the mountain, Chen Qingyang covered his face with a hat and opened the collar of his shirt, then fell asleep immediately.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): When we rested in the bush, Chen Qingyang covered her head with her palmwood hat and unbuttoned her shirt, falling asleep right away.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: When we took a break by the field, Chen Qingyang held her conical hat over her face, opened the collar of her blouse, and fell asleep immediately.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): When we rested at the head of the field, Chen Qingyang would lower her palm leaf hat over her face, unbutton her shirt collar, and fall asleep right away.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: When we were resting at the head, Chen Qingyang put his hat over his face, opened his collar, and fell asleep immediately.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: When we rested under the tree, Chen Qingyang put her straw rain hat over her face and unbuttoned her shirt collar, and she fell asleep right away.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: We rested at the top of the hill, Chen Qingyang covered his face with a bamboo hat, and opened the collar of his robe. He immediately fell asleep.
When we rested at the edge of the field, Chen Qingyang would often fall asleep with her face covered by her veil, her shirt open at the collar.

chinese: 这时，王琦瑶的心才擂鼓似的跳起来。
english: In that instant her heart began pounding like a drum.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Just then, her heart began to beat up a trumpet sound.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Then, Wang Qiyue's heart beat like a drum.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Only then did her heart begin to beat fast, like a drum.

gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: At this time, Wang Qiaoyao's heart leaped up like a drumbeat.
Only then did Wang Qiyao's heart begin to pound.

chinese: 他像喜鹊珍爱覆巢中最后一个卵一样珍爱着我父亲，但是，已经晚一点了，命运为他安排的更残酷的结局，已在前面路口上，胸有成竹地对他冷笑着。
english: He loved my father as a magpie loves the last remaining egg in its nest. But by then it was too late, for fate, cold and calculating, had sentenced him to a cruel end that was waiting for him down the road.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: He cherishes me like a crow cherishes the last egg that he has left in the nest; but it is too late now, as fate has placed him in a more cruel destiny than his own. He smiles with coolness on his face as he looks at him.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He took great care over his father's final donation, but it was already too late. As a nestbuilder, Father had been blessed with a perfect pair of hands; however, life had given him even more cruel treatment as he prepared for the opening in the other side of the gate. He smiled at himácil, as though waiting for the worst.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: He loved my father as a parent loves their last baby, but it was too late. The crueler fate that had been arranged for him earlier on the way ahead had already smirked at him coldly.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): He loved me father so much that it hurt a little bit, but, late on the way home, he realized that his fate, the cruel destiny that had prepared for someone else, was waiting for him out ahead on the street.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: He cherished my father as a magpie cherishes the last egg in its nest, but it was already too late; a harsher fate had been laid out for him, waiting with a cold, knowing smile at the next turn.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): He treasured me as a bird would its last egg, but it was too late. A more cruel fate waited for him at the crossroads, where it sneered at him with calculating brutality.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: He cherished me like the last egg in the nest of a magpie, but fate had already arranged a more cruel ending for him. He walked towards it with a resolute expression, as if he knew what was coming.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: He treasured me as a sparrow treasures its last egg; but it was already late, and a cruel fate had placed a stumbling block in his path.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: He cherishes me, his father, as if he were the last egg in a peng's nest, but unfortunately, a crueler fate has been arranged for him, and a cold, knowing smile is on his face at the crossroads ahead.
He came to love my father more than any other man, but it was already too late. Fate had reserved a cruel fate for him, which he faced with calm resolve.

chinese: ‘谋事在人，成事在天’，咱们谋到了，靠菩萨的保佑，有些机会，也未可知。
english: 'Man proposes, God disposes. It's up to us to think of something. We must leave it to the good Lord to decide whether He'll help us or not. Who knows, He might give us the opportunity we are looking for.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Strategy is in man; success is in heaven,’ we have succeeded, but it may be that some opportunities are open to us too.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): As long as we try our best, something good may happen. Look down from your sacred mountain to see whether it comes true—whatever that might be.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Things are in the hands of men, and things are in the hands of God," we've got a chance because we've got our minds set on it. We may have a little help from above.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It takes planning to succeed, and it also takes luck,' I said. 'We've had our chance now. Let's hope somebody watch over us and let us have a little luck.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Planning is up to us humans, but success depends on fate," we have planned for it, with the divine's blessing, there might be some opportunities.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): You can't make things happen, you can only wait for them. We can do all we can; if the heavens are favourable, perhaps something will come our way.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: "Plans are in the hands of man, success is in the hands of heaven." We have planned, and with the help of the Buddha's protection, some opportunities may arise, but we cannot be sure.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: 'Man proposes, Heaven disposes.' We've thought things over carefully. Now we just have to pray to the Buddha to give us a chance.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Events are in people, success is in heaven." We have planned it, with the blessing of the Bodhisattva, some opportunities, are also unknown.
All our planning is in the hands of the Buddha. Let us hope that with His blessing we may sometimes be allowed the use of a miraculous opportunity.

chinese: “你给我下来，我操死你活妈！”

gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Give it to me, I'll kill you alive, you bastard!"
Get down here now, or I'll really give you something to cry about!'

chinese: 他们有两儿两女，女孩都嫁出去了，一个儿子在外地当兵，另一个成家后与他们一起过，儿媳妇也是刚生了娃。
english: They had two sons and two daughters. The daughters were married and had moved out. One of the sons was a soldier away from home, and the other was married and lived with them. The daughter-in-law had also just given birth.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: They have two sons and daughters, both of whom have gone off to college or work; one son is serving overseas and another is married and living with them.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Of the two children, one was married and lived abroad, the other stayed at home with their child and had begun a family of their own.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: They have two daughters who have married, and a son who is serving overseas as a soldier. The other son has already gotten married and lives with them. His wife just gave birth to a child.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The old man was alive with two sons, both of whom were away at college when they died; one was a soldier stationed in the north who had just brought home a new baby, and the other had married and moved in with his wife.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: They have two sons and two daughters. All of their daughters are married and have left home. One son is serving in the military out of town. The other has started a family and lives with them, and his daughter-in-law just had a baby.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): They had two sons and two daughters; the girls had all gotten married and left home. One of the sons was a soldier stationed away from home, and the other had moved back in with his parents after getting married, as the couple was still childless.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: They have two children, both daughters have married out, one son is serving in the army far away, and the other son lives with them after getting married, and his wife has just given birth to a baby.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: They had two children, a boy and a girl. The girl had married out of the family, and the son was serving in the army. The son-in-law and his wife lived with them, and she had just given birth to a baby.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: They have two sons and two daughters. Both daughters got married and left, one son is serving in the military in another place, the other son got married and lives with them, his wife recently gave birth.
Of their two sons, one had married and was now away in the army, while the other had settled down with his family nearby. His wife had just given birth to a baby girl.

chinese: 为了伪装，两根钢柱上都挂了一些航标和水位标志。
english: As a disguise, the pillars were decorated with some navigational markings and water depth indicators.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): To fake the scene, both of them had been lined with navigation signals and water levels.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: To camouflage, some buoy markers and water level indicators were hung on both columns.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): To disguise the pillars, both walls were equipped with a series of navigation markers and water-level indicators.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: To disguise them, buoys and water level indicators were attached to both steel columns.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): To disguise their true nature, both pillars were decorated with some navigation buoys and water level markers.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: To disguise, two steel pillars had some navigation marks and water level indicators hung on them.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: To disguise the pillars, some navigation buoys and water-level markers had been hung on the two pillars.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: To disguise, two steel columns have been hung with navigation markers and water level indicators.
To disguise the place, they hung out two navigation buoys and a water level marker on each of the pillars.

chinese: 一时那男孩翻在上面，一时韦小宝翻在上面，翻了十七八个滚，终于两人互相扭住，呼呼喘气，突然之间，两人不约而同的哈哈大笑，都觉如此扭打十分好玩，慢慢放开了手。
english: They struggled for a while, each one gaining the upper hand for a moment, then going under, ringing the changes more than a dozen times, until finally they were in a complete deadlock, panting and staring fixedly at each other. And then suddenly, at exactly the same moment, they both burst out laughing. There was something about the clinch they were in that struck them both as terribly funny. Slowly they let go.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: For a moment, the boy turned over on top of it, while the young prince turned over on top of it as well. They each rolled them seventeen times before finally pulling them apart, and then suddenly, both men laughed out loud at the same time, all feeling that it was quite amusing. Afterward, they let go of their hands.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Soon the boy on top of Trinket was off to one side, and the other was back on top of One-night stand. They struggled and wrestled for air, then, reluctantly released each other, when suddenly they both laughed out loud in delight. It was a fun game. They let go of each other.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: At first, the boy rolled on top of him, then it was the other way round that the boy rolled on top of him. They had rolled over each other seventeen or eighteen times before they finally caught hold of each other's hands and were panting hard. Suddenly, they both burst out laughing at once, and both felt that wrestling with each other was very amusing. They slowly let go of each other's hands.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Soon the boy was on top of Trinket again, and this time it was Trinket who fell on top of him after about twenty or三十个回合的翻腾, now for a change the straddled ones to be toppled over. Finally they stopped rolling, gasping and laughing at their own ridiculous struggle. Soon they were holding each other's hands and releasing them again, and then, suddenly struck by an inspiration, started chuckling loudly again, enjoying the fact that they found this扭打十分有趣，慢慢地放开了手。
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: For a while the boy was on top, then at other times it was Little Beggar who was on top. They rolled around like this for several rounds of flips before they suddenly found themselves tangled up together, both panting heavily. Without any prompting, they both burst out laughing, finding the roughhousing quite amusing. Slowly, they let go of each other.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): At one moment the boy was on top of Trinket, at another Trinket had him by the throat. They grappled each other, first one moment, then the other, until they were both winded and exhausted. Suddenly they both burst out laughing: it had been great fun wrestling like that. They let go of each other slowly, as though reluctant to stop.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: One time, the boy rolled on top of me, and so did Wei Xiaobao. We rolled around for about 17-18 times, and finally, we both held each other tightly and laughed heartily. It was such a fun game that we both enjoyed it, and we slowly let go of each other's hands.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The two of them spun round and round, grappling and panting, until, by some mutual accord, they finally came to a halt with their arms locked and the two of them laughing loudly, each thoroughly enjoying the sport of it. They gradually relaxed their hold on one another and lay back, still chuckling, side by side on the ground.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: At one time, that boy was rolling on top, at one time Wei Xiaobao was rolling on top, they rolled around seventeen to eight times, and finally they twisted around and held each other, panting heavily. Suddenly, they laughed heartily together without any prior agreement. They felt that twisting and wrestling was extremely fun. They gradually let go of each other's hands.

The boy was on top for a bit, then Trinket, and they went on like this, each of them winning a couple of falls, until they ended up face to face, both out of breath. There they were suddenly struck by a simultaneous fit of giggles: it was, they both felt, the most wonderful game they had ever played. They slowly disengaged their grips.

chinese: 从路两边高粱地里飘来的幽淡的薄荷气息和成熟高粱苦涩微甘的气味，我父亲早已闻惯，不新不奇。
english: He was used to the delicate peppermint aroma and the slightly sweet yet pungent odour of ripe sorghum wafting over from the sides of the path – nothing new there.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: The faint scent of thinning sweet grasses from the side of the road and the sweet bitter taste of ripe brown corn have been a familiar aroma for my father since he was a child.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The fainting-off smell of tea leaves drifted in through the field gates, and the sweet orchidainish aroma of ripe sucrose reminded Father of a year ago, when he had grown up.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: The faint, minty aroma wafting from the high-corn fields on either side of the road and the slightly bitter, sweet smell of mature corn, which my father had long grown accustomed to, did not impress me as new or odd.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): The sweet smell of thin leafiness from sorghum fields along the road and the acrid taste of mature sorghum reminded Father of things he had long gotten used to.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: The faint minty scent from the mulberry fields on both sides of the road, and the slightly bitter, slightly sweet aroma of ripe millet that my father was long accustomed to, no longer seemed new or unusual to him.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): The mild fragrance of薄荷在高粱地里飘散来，父亲早已习惯，不再觉得新鲜奇特。
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: From the fragrant aroma of the tender mint floating in the air along the roadside, and the bitter-sweet scent of mature millet, my father was already accustomed to it, not finding it strange.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: The fragrance of delicate mint drifting over from the sorghum fields on the highway and the sour-sweet aroma of mature sorghum were familiar to him.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The faint lavender scent wafting from the tall reeds on both sides, and the mature, slightly bitter and sweet smell of tall reeds, my father was already familiar with, neither new nor strange.
The faint scent of peppermint floating up from the sorghum fields on the roadsides and the sweet, bitter smell of fully ripened sorghum were familiar to him.

chinese: 到了这个时候我才悟到，犯不着向人证明我存在。
english: By then I began to realize that it was really unnecessary for me to prove my existence to others.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: By this point, I realized that it was unnecessary to prove my existence to people.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Only then did I realize that it was unnecessary to go back and prove my existence to people.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: It was only then that I realized that it didn’t matter if I had to prove my existence.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): It was then that I began to realize I didn't need to prove my existence to anyone.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: By this point, I realized that it was unnecessary to prove my existence to others.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Not until then did it occur to me that it was unnecessary to prove my existence to others.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: I finally realized that I didn't need to prove my existence to others.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Only then did it dawn on me that it was useless to try to prove my existence to others.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: At this point, I realized that it was unnecessary to prove my existence to others.
I didn't realize until then that I couldn't prove my existence to people.

chinese: 高粱深处，蛤蟆的叫声忧伤，蝈蝈的唧唧凄凉，狐狸的哀鸣悠怅。
english: From deep in the sorghum came the melancholy croaks of toads, the dreary chirps of grasshoppers, and the plaintive howls of foxes.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: Deep within a stalk of corn, the barking of a weasel brings sorrow; the hoots of a fly bring a melancholy sound; the mournful cries of a fox convey a sense of regret.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): In the marshes below, its pitter-latching nature seemed to go deeper into darkness than the swamp itself; to the weasel down at the water's edge sang melancholy croons like a weaver's lament.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: Deep inside the millet field, the sound of frogs is sad, the sound of grasshoppers is mournful, and the sound of foxes is wistful.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Deep in the sorghum fields, the frog's cry turns sad, the cricket's chirps turn凄凉, and the fox's howl sounds forsaken.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Deep within the sea of red sorghum, the frogs' croaks were sorrowful, the crickets' whistles凄凉, and the foxes' mournful cries echoed with melancholy.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): In the heart of the sorghum fields you can hear the croaks of frogs, the chirping of locusts, the wails of foxes.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: In the depths of the marshes, the croaking of frogs is mournful, the chirping of cicadas is melancholic, and the howling of foxes is sorrowful.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Toads croaked sadly in the fields, flies buzzed mournfully, and foxes howled plaintively.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: In the depths of the reeds, the croaking of the frogs is mournful, the cicadas' chirping is sad and chilly, the fox's lament is longing.
Deep in the sorghum field, frogs croaked plaintively, mosquitoes droned disconsolately, and the fox's mournful howl echoed in the distance.

chinese: 她订了一份晚报，黄昏时间是看报度过的，报上的每一个字她都读到，懂一半，不懂一半，半懂不懂之间，晚饭的时间便到了，炉子上的水也开了。
english: She subscribed to an evening newspaper to fill the hours of dusk. She read every word in the newspaper, making sense perhaps of half the reports. By the time she finished it, the water would be boiling and it would be dinner time.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: She bought a newspaper at night, when she was reading it. Every word of the paper she read, from beginning to end; she understood half of what was written, but not all of it; she could understand part of it, but not the whole thing; so dinner time came around, and the water on the stove was boiling.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She got a newspaper subscription, and in the evening time she would read through each page of the newspaper, trying to understand them all— but not the words, just the meanings—and by dusk her dinner time had come. The pot of boiling water had already been added to the stove.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: She had ordered a paper, and the time for reading was at dusk; she read every word of it, but only half of it made sense to her, so she would eat dinner when the water boiled on the stove.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She subscribed to a newspaper delivered every morning, and during her one hour of quiet time she would read it cover to cover, understanding a few words and knowing a lot others; by the time dinner time arrived, the water on the stove had boiled.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: She subscribed to a late edition newspaper, which she read during the evening hours. She read every word of the paper, understanding half and guessing the other half. By the time she was halfway through, it was dinnertime, and the water on the stove had come to a boil.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): She subscribed to a newspaper, which she read during the黄昏 hours of each day, word by word. She understood half of what she read, the other half not so much; but by the time she had finished reading, it was time for dinner, and the pot on the stove had also boiled over.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: She subscribed to a late edition newspaper. It was the time of the evening when she would read it. She read every word on the paper, half understanding, half not. When dinner time came, the water on the stove was boiling.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: She subscribed to a evening newspaper. Its pages were filled with news and advertisements that she read word by word. Sometimes she understood things completely; other times she didn't understand them at all. By the time she finished reading the paper, it was already evening and the stove was roaring.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: She subscribed to an evening newspaper, and she read it during the dusk, understanding half of the characters on the paper, half of them she didn't understand, and the rest was a mix of understanding and not understanding. By the time for dinner arrived, the water on the stove had also boiled.

She subscribed to a newspaper and read the evening edition during the hour before dinner. She understood most of the words, but not all of them. By the time the water in the stove had boiled, she had finished reading the newspaper.

chinese: 陈清扬一出十五队我就看见了，白天未必能看这么远。
english: I spotted Chen Qingyang as soon as she came out of the fifteenth team—I doubted if I could see that far during the day.

unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Chen Qingyang was there by the fifteenth team, even though I didn't see far during the day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I saw fifteen teams when Chen Qingyang appeared, and I could not see so far on the day.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Chen Qingyang came out of the fifteenth team right away after I left. I could have probably seen her from that distance even on a sunny day.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: As soon as Chen Qingyang left Team Fifteen, I saw her, but it might not have been possible to see so far during the day.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): As soon as I left the fifteenth team, I caught sight of Chen Qingyang; but it was hard to see that far during the day.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: I saw Chen Qingyang as soon as she stepped out of the group of fifteen. I couldn't see her so clearly during the day.</s>

gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Chen Qingyang appeared on the 15th team, and I only saw him during the day, it might not be possible to see that far.
I saw Chen Qingyang as soon as she got off the fifteen team bus. I might not have been able to see her in the daytime.

chinese: 那一条条一排排的里巷，流动着一些意料之外又清理之中的东西，东西不是什么大东西，但琐琐细细，聚沙也能成塔的。
english: Something is flowing through the longtang that is unpredictable yet entirely rational, small, not large, and trivial—but then even a castle can be made out of sand.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: A series of narrow alleys that flow like a stream of water, containing things unexpected and tidied up, such as small bits of stuff that don’t amount to much but can be put together into a tower.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Things that happen偶然的事儿也是意外的，却又是细枝末节一样，连沙子也浮上不得的。
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: A series of lanes and rows, all bustling with something unexpected and clean, not a great deal but small things that when collected together form a tower.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Between the long rows of alleys and streets lies a flowing network of unexpected things, not big by any means—but filled with the sand that, left undisturbed, can also make a dune.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: Those narrow alleys, lined up one after another, flow with unexpected yet neatly arranged elements. These elements are not grand in size, but they accumulate in detail, where even tiny grains of sand can form a tower.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): Amidst these streets and alleys, hidden by a layer of dust and dirt, lie tiny things that, when collected together, can still form a tower.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: One by one, the narrow alleys flow with unexpected items that are meticulously cleaned away. These items are not big things, but rather small and insignificant ones. Even so, they can add up and create something significant.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: Along those longtang alleys the things that one does not expect begin to move; these are not big things, but when gathered up they can form a tower.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: The narrow alleyways are flowing with some unexpected yet tidy items, not big items, but minute and intricate, small enough to form a tower with a pile of sand.
All those tiny, hidden alleys are flowing with all kinds of things that glitter and sparkle, nothing big or important, but when gathered together, can build a tower.

chinese: 她说，女儿建议她去做整容手术。 但是她没时间做。
english: She said her daughter suggested that she have plastic surgery, but she couldn't find time to do it.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: She said her daughter suggested she do a facelift. However, she wasn’t able to.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She said that her daughter had suggested that she do a facelift, but she didn't have the time.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: She said her daughter had suggested that she get a cosmetic operation, but she didn't have time for it.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): She said her daughter had suggested she get plastic surgery, but she didn't have time to get it done.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: She said her daughter had suggested she have plastic surgery, but that she didn't have time.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): She said her daughter had suggested that she get plastic surgery, but she didn't have the time.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: She said that her daughter suggested she get a cosmetic surgery. However, she doesn't have time for it.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: She said her daughter advised her to get some plastic surgery, but she didn't have the time for that.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: She said, her daughter suggested she get plastic surgery. However, she doesn't have the time for it.
She told me that her daughter had advised her to get a face-lift, but she didn't have the time.

chinese: 对我一刻也不能放松。
english: People shouldn't let up on me for a minute.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct: I cannot relax for a moment.
unsloth/Qwen2-0.5B-Instruct(finetuned): I had to be as gentle as I could get.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct: I cannot relax for a moment.
unsloth/Qwen2-1.5B-Instruct(finetuned): Now, I can't relax for a minute.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct: I can never afford to let my guard down.
unsloth/Qwen2-7B-Instruct(finetuned): She couldn't take her eyes off me for a moment.
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3: I can't let go of me for even a moment.</s>
unsloth/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.3(finetun: I couldn't afford to relax for a second.
gradientai/Llama-3-8B-Instruct-Gradient-: Cannot relax even for a moment towards me.
I couldn't relax for a moment.
